title: Healthier Homemade Crunchwrap Supreme
ingredients: ['extra virgin olive oil', 'ground chicken, beef, or turkey', 'yellow onion, chopped', 'chipotle chili powder', 'smoked paprika', 'ground cumin', 'garlic powder', 'crushed red pepper', 'dried oregano', 'kosher salt', 'corn tortillas', 'extra virgin olive oil, for drizzling', 'shredded sharp cheddar cheese', 'cubed Monterey Jack cheese', 'poblano or jalapeño pepper, seeded and finely chopped', 'large (burrito size) whole wheat or gluten-free tortillas', 'mini taco size whole wheat or gluten free tortillas', 'plain Greek yogurt', 'shredded romaine lettuce', 'cherry tomatoes, chopped', 'fresh cilantro, limes, avocado, and hot sauce, for serving']
ingredients with measurement: {'extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'ground chicken, beef, or turkey': '1', 'yellow onion, chopped': '1', 'chipotle chili powder': '2-3', 'smoked paprika': '2', 'ground cumin': '1 1/2', 'garlic powder': '1', 'crushed red pepper': '1/4-1/2', 'dried oregano': '1/2', 'kosher salt': '1', 'corn tortillas': '6', 'extra virgin olive oil, for drizzling': 'seasoning', 'shredded sharp cheddar cheese': '1/2', 'cubed Monterey Jack cheese': '1/2', 'poblano or jalapeño pepper, seeded and finely chopped': '1', 'large (burrito size) whole wheat or gluten-free tortillas': '6', 'mini taco size whole wheat or gluten free tortillas': '6', 'plain Greek yogurt': '1/4', 'shredded romaine lettuce': '2', 'cherry tomatoes, chopped': '1', 'fresh cilantro, limes, avocado, and hot sauce, for serving': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 400° F.', '2. In a large skillet, heat the olive oil over high heat. When the oil shimmers, add the ground meat and onion. Cook, breaking up the meat as it cooks, until the chicken is browned, about 5 minutes. Add the chili powder, paprika, cumin, garlic powder, red pepper flakes, oregano, and salt. Add 3/4 cup water. Reduce the heat to medium and simmer until the sauce has thickened slightly around the chicken, about 10 minutes. Remove from the heat.', '3. Meanwhile, make the tostadas. Line the corn tortillas up on a sheet pan and rub lightly with olive oil. Transfer to the oven and bake 6 minutes. Flip, and bake another 4-5 minutes, until crisped. While warm, sprinkle with sea salt and lime zest or the "Doritos" seasoning blend (recipe in notes) for extra flavor.', '4. To assemble, warm a large tortilla for 20 seconds in the microwave, then brush with water to dampen. Lay flat on a surface. In the center, layer the meat, a sprinkle of cheddar, a few cubes of Monterey Jack, and a sprinkle of peppers. Add 1 tostada on top, spread with yogurt, hot sauce, lettuce, tomatoes, and cilantro. Place 1 small tortilla on top, brush with water, then fold the edges of the large tortilla in, pressing to seal (see above photos). Repeat with the remaining wraps.', '5. Heat a drizzle of olive oil in a skillet, add 1 crunchwrap and cook 2-3 minutes per side until crisp and golden brown. Serve warm with any amount of desired toppings, avocado, hot sauce, yogurt, cilantro, salsa, whatever you love!']

title: 30 Minute Creamy Thai Turmeric Chicken and Noodles.
ingredients: ['boneless skinless chicken thighs or breasts, cubed', 'ground turmeric', 'ground ginger', 'black pepper', 'low sodium soy sauce or tamari', 'honey', 'sesame oil or extra virgin olive oil', 'baby bok choy or 1 bunch kale, chopped', 'medium shallots, chopped', 'garlic, minced or grated', 'fresh ginger, peeled and grated', 'fresh cilantro and or Thai basil, chopped', 'Thai red curry paste, using more or less to taste', 'canned full-fat coconut milk', 'fish sauce', 'rice noodles, thick or thin', 'sliced limes, mixed herbs, and thinly sliced shallots, for serving']
ingredients with measurement: {'boneless skinless chicken thighs or breasts, cubed': '1 1/2', 'ground turmeric': '1', 'ground ginger': '2', 'black pepper': 'seasoning', 'low sodium soy sauce or tamari': '2', 'honey': '1', 'sesame oil or extra virgin olive oil': '3', 'baby bok choy or 1 bunch kale, chopped': '4', 'medium shallots, chopped': '2', 'garlic, minced or grated': '3', 'fresh ginger, peeled and grated': '1', 'fresh cilantro and or Thai basil, chopped': '1/4', 'Thai red curry paste, using more or less to taste': '1/4', 'canned full-fat coconut milk': '2-3', 'fish sauce': '2', 'rice noodles, thick or thin': '8', 'sliced limes, mixed herbs, and thinly sliced shallots, for serving': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. Toss the chicken with turmeric, ground ginger, pinch of pepper, soy sauce, honey, and 1 tablespoon oil. Let sit 5 minutes.', '2. Heat 2 tablespoons oil in a large Dutch oven or braiser over medium-high heat. Add the chicken and sear until browned, about 3 minutes, stirring 2-3 times. Toss in the bok choy and cook 2 minutes more, until just charred on the edges. Transfer everything to a plate.', '3. To the same Dutch oven, add 2 tablespoons oil, the shallots, garlic, fresh ginger, and cilantro/basil, cook 3 minutes, then stir in the curry paste. Cook until fragrant, about 2 minutes. Stir in about 2 cups coconut milk and fish sauce. Slide the chicken and bok choy back into the sauce. If you want more sauce, add the additional coconut milk…I always use 3 cups. Simmer over medium heat until the sauce thickens slightly, 5 minutes.', '4. Meanwhile, cook noodles according to package directions.', '5. Divide the noodles between bowls and ladle the chicken and sauce over. Top each bowl as desired with herbs, shallots, and lime juice.']

title: One Pot Spicy Alla Vodka Pizza Pasta.
ingredients: ['extra virgin olive oil', 'ground spicy Italian chicken sausage', 'garlic minced or grated', 'dried oregano', 'dried thyme', 'fennel seeds', 'crushed red pepper flakes', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'marinara sauce', 'vodka', 'basil pesto, homemade or store-bought', 'dry short cut pasta', 'shredded fontina cheese', 'mozzarella, torn', 'grated parmesan or asiago cheese', 'pepperoni sliced', 'fresh basil, chopped']
ingredients with measurement: {'extra virgin olive oil': '3', 'ground spicy Italian chicken sausage': '3/4', 'garlic minced or grated': '4', 'dried oregano': '1', 'dried thyme': '2', 'fennel seeds': '1-2', 'crushed red pepper flakes': '1', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'marinara sauce': '3', 'vodka': '1/2', 'basil pesto, homemade or store-bought': '1/2', 'dry short cut pasta': '1', 'shredded fontina cheese': '2', 'mozzarella, torn': '8', 'grated parmesan or asiago cheese': '1/2', 'pepperoni sliced': '3', 'fresh basil, chopped': '1/2'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 350° F.', '2. Heat the olive oil in a large pot over high heat. When the oil shimmers, add the chicken sausage (if using) and brown all over, about 5 to 8 minutes. Stir in the garlic, oregano, thyme, fennel, and chili flakes, cook another 3-5 minutes, until very fragrant. Add the marinara sauce, vodka, pesto, and a pinch each of salt and pepper. Then add 2 1/2 cups water and the pasta. Increase the heat to medium-high. Bring the mixture to a boil. Stir frequently until the pasta is al dente, about 8-10 minutes.', '3. If needed, transfer the pasta to a baking dish. Top with the cheeses, then pepperoni. Sprinkle the basil over top.', '4. Transfer the baking dish to the oven and bake 20-25 minutes or until the cheese has melted and is lightly browned on top. Cool 5 minutes before serving. Serve with fresh rosemary. Enjoy!']

title: Smoky Potato and Kale Soup
ingredients: ['extra virgin olive oil', 'smoked Spanish chorizo, regular chorizo, or smoked sausage', 'yellow onion, chopped', 'garlic, chopped or grated', 'smoked paprika', 'cayenne pepper', 'Yukon gold or russet potatoes, chopped', 'low sodium chicken broth', 'juice of 1 lemon', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'Tuscan or curly kale, roughly chopped', 'whole milk, heavy cream, or canned coconut milk', 'grated Manchego cheese, sharp cheddar, or parmesan, plus more for serving', 'fresh oregano, for serving']
ingredients with measurement: {'extra virgin olive oil': '1', 'smoked Spanish chorizo, regular chorizo, or smoked sausage': '3/4', 'yellow onion, chopped': '1', 'garlic, chopped or grated': '6', 'smoked paprika': '2', 'cayenne pepper': '1/4- 1/2', 'Yukon gold or russet potatoes, chopped': '4', 'low sodium chicken broth': '6-8', 'juice of 1 lemon': 'seasoning', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'Tuscan or curly kale, roughly chopped': '4-6', 'whole milk, heavy cream, or canned coconut milk': '1/4', 'grated Manchego cheese, sharp cheddar, or parmesan, plus more for serving': '1/4', 'fresh oregano, for serving': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. Heat the olive oil in a large Dutch oven over medium-high heat. When the oil shimmers, add the chorizo and onions, and brown all over, about 5 to 8 minutes.\xa0Add the garlic, paprika, and cayenne, and cook another 2 minutes. Stir in the potatoes, toss to coat. Add the broth and lemon juice, and season with salt and pepper. Simmer over medium heat for 15-20 minutes, until the potatoes are tender.', '2. Remove about 1/2 cup of the potatoes from the soup and either mash or puree them in a blender, then sir them back into the soup along with the kale, milk, and Manchego. Cook until the kale is wilted, about 10 minutes. Remove from the heat.', '3. Serve the soup topped with fresh oregano, if desired. Enjoy with crusty bread.']

title: 30 Minute Spicy Coconut Butter Chicken
ingredients: ['boneless skinless chicken breasts or thighs, cut into bite-size chunks', 'plain Greek yogurt', 'garlic, minced or grated', 'fresh grated ginger', 'garam masala', 'cumin', 'turmeric', 'cayenne pepper, use to your taste', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'salted butter', 'large yellow onion, chopped', 'crushed red pepper flakes, use to your taste', 'tomato paste', 'full-fat coconut milk', 'fresh cilantro roughly, chopped', 'steamed rice and naan, for serving']
ingredients with measurement: {'boneless skinless chicken breasts or thighs, cut into bite-size chunks': '2', 'plain Greek yogurt': '1/4', 'garlic, minced or grated': '6', 'fresh grated ginger': '2', 'garam masala': '2', 'cumin': '2', 'turmeric': '1', 'cayenne pepper, use to your taste': '1-2', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'salted butter': '4', 'large yellow onion, chopped': '1', 'crushed red pepper flakes, use to your taste': '1-2', 'tomato paste': '1/2', 'full-fat coconut milk': '1', 'fresh cilantro roughly, chopped': '1/2', 'steamed rice and naan, for serving': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. in a bowl, toss together the chicken, yogurt, 3 cloves garlic, 1 tablespoon ginger, 2 teaspoons garam masala, 1 teaspoon cumin, 1/2 teaspoon turmeric, 1/2 - 1 teaspoon cayenne pepper, and 1 teaspoon salt. Let sit 5-10 minutes.', '2. Heat the oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the chicken and sear on both sides until browned, about 2 minutes. Add 1 tablespoon butter and toss to coat the chicken. Remove the chicken from the skillet to a plate.', '3. To the skillet, add the onion and cook 5 minutes, until softened. Add 2 tablespoons butter, 3 cloves garlic, 1 tablespoon ginger, 1 tablespoon garam masala, 1 teaspoon cumin, 1/2 teaspoon turmeric, 1/2 - 1 teaspoon cayenne pepper, and the chili flakes. Season with salt and pepper. Cook until very fragrant, about 5 minutes. Add the tomato paste and continue cooking another 3-4 minutes.', '4. Reduce the heat to low.\xa0Add 1 cup water and the coconut milk. Stir to combine, bring the sauce to a simmer, cook 5 minutes or until the sauce thickens slightly. Stir in 1 tablespoon butter. If the sauce seems thick, thin with 1/2 to 1 cup additional coconut milk. Add the chicken and any juices on the pan and cook, stirring occasionally, until the sauce thickens slightly, about 5 minutes. Remove from the heat and stir in the cilantro. Season with salt and pepper.', '5. Serve the chicken and sauce over bowls of rice with fresh naan. Enjoy!']

title: Creamy Bacon Tortellini with Charred Broccoli
ingredients: ['fresh cheese tortellini', 'thick-cut slices bacon, chopped', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'broccoli florets, roughly chopped', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'salted butter', 'garlic, minced or grated', 'chopped fresh oregano', 'chopped fresh thyme', 'crushed red pepper flakes', 'dry white wine such, as Pinot Grigio or Sauvignon Blanc', 'heavy cream or canned full fat coconut milk', 'cream cheese, at room temperature', 'grated Parmesan cheese']
ingredients with measurement: {'fresh cheese tortellini': '1', 'thick-cut slices bacon, chopped': '4', 'extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'broccoli florets, roughly chopped': '2', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'salted butter': '4', 'garlic, minced or grated': '3', 'chopped fresh oregano': '1', 'chopped fresh thyme': '1', 'crushed red pepper flakes': '1', 'dry white wine such, as Pinot Grigio or Sauvignon Blanc': '1/3', 'heavy cream or canned full fat coconut milk': '1', 'cream cheese, at room temperature': '4', 'grated Parmesan cheese': '1'}
instructions: ['1. Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Cook the tortellini according to package directions until al dente. Drain.', '2. Meanwhile, cook the bacon in a large skillet over medium heat until crisp. Drain onto a paper towel. Add the broccoli and season with salt and pepper. Cook until the broccoli is crisping on the edges, 3 to 4 minutes.\xa0Toss the broccoli, add the olive oil, and cook another 2-3 minutes, until crisp. Remove the broccoli from the skillet to a plate.', '3. To the same skillet, melt the butter over medium heat, cooking until the butter begins to brown, about 3-4 minutes.\xa0Reduce the heat to low, add the garlic, oregano, thyme, and a pinch of crushed red pepper. Cook one minute, then pour in the wine. Simmer 2-3 minutes. Add the cream and cream cheese. Whisk until smooth. Bring the sauce to a gentle simmer and cook 5 minutes, until thickened slightly. Stir in the parmesan. Season with salt and pepper. Toss in the tortellini and cook 2-3 minutes, then remove from the heat.', '4. Divide the tortellini between plates and top with charred broccoli, and bacon. Eat and enjoy immediately.']

title: Slow Cooker Red Wine Braised Short Rib Pasta
ingredients: ['thick-cut bacon, chopped', 'bone-in beef short ribs, chicken breast, or thighs', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'medium yellow onions, chopped', 'garlic, chopped or grated', 'dry red wine, such as Cabernet Sauvignon', 'tomato paste', 'ground allspice', 'bay leaves', 'parmesan rind, plus parmesan, for serving', 'dry pasta', 'fresh basil or parsley, for serving']
ingredients with measurement: {'thick-cut bacon, chopped': '4', 'bone-in beef short ribs, chicken breast, or thighs': '4-5', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'medium yellow onions, chopped': '2', 'garlic, chopped or grated': '8', 'dry red wine, such as Cabernet Sauvignon': '2', 'tomato paste': '2', 'ground allspice': '1', 'bay leaves': '2', 'parmesan rind, plus parmesan, for serving': '1', 'dry pasta': '1', 'fresh basil or parsley, for serving': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. In the bowl of your slow cooker, combine the wine, 2 cups water, the tomato paste, onion, garlic, allspice, and bay leaves. Season heavily with salt and pepper.', '2. Season the short ribs or chicken with salt and pepper. In a large skillet, cook the bacon until crisp. Remove from the skillet, drain excess grease. Add the bacon to the slow cooker. Going back to the same skillet, sear the ribs on both sides over medium-high heat. Transfer the ribs to the slow cooker.\xa0Gently toss everything to combine. Add the parmesan rind. Cover and cook on low for 6-8 hours or on high for 4-6 hours.', '3. Just before serving, bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Boil the pasta according to package directions, until al dente. Reserve 1 cup cooking water, then drain', '4. Remove the bay leaves and parmesan rind. Shred the meat, discard the bones, and toss the meat with the sauce. If needed, thin the sauce with pasta cooking water. Serve the sauce over pasta. Top with lots of parmesan and fresh basil. Enjoy!']

title: Creamy Balsamic Mushroom Chicken Marsala
ingredients: ['chicken cutlets, or 2 boneless chicken breasts, sliced in half horizontally', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'all-purpose flour', 'garlic powder', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'salted butter', 'shiitake or cremini mushrooms, sliced', 'shallots, chopped', 'garlic, chopped or grated', 'fresh thyme leaves', 'balsamic vinegar', 'low sodium chicken broth', 'dry marsala wine', 'heavy cream', 'crushed red pepper flakes']
ingredients with measurement: {'chicken cutlets, or 2 boneless chicken breasts, sliced in half horizontally': '4', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'all-purpose flour': '1/3', 'garlic powder': '1', 'extra virgin olive oil': '3', 'salted butter': '3', 'shiitake or cremini mushrooms, sliced': '3', 'shallots, chopped': '2', 'garlic, chopped or grated': '3', 'fresh thyme leaves': '2', 'balsamic vinegar': '3', 'low sodium chicken broth': '1', 'dry marsala wine': '3/4', 'heavy cream': '3/4', 'crushed red pepper flakes': '1'}
instructions: ['1. Season the chicken with salt and pepper. Place the flour and garlic powder in a shallow bowl and dredge the chicken through the flour mix, pressing to adhere.', '2. Heat 2 tablespoons olive oil in a large skillet set over medium-high heat. When the oil shimmers, add the chicken and sear on both sides until golden, about 3-5 minutes per side. Add 1 tablespoon butter and allow the butter to brown around the chicken, about 2 minutes. Remove the chicken from the skillet.', '3. To the skillet, add 2 tablespoons olive oil and the mushrooms. Cook undisturbed for 5 minutes or until golden.\xa0Add 2 tablespoons butter, the shallots, garlic, thyme, and a pinch each of salt, pepper, and red pepper flakes. Cook 4-5 minutes, until fragrant. Add the balsamic vinegar. Cook another 2-3 minutes, until the mushrooms have caramelized. Spoon half the mushrooms out of the skillet and onto the plate with the chicken.', '4. Pour in the wine and broth. Cook 10-15 minutes until reduced slightly, then pour in the cream. Add the chicken to the skillet and simmer for 5-10 minutes or until warmed through and thickened slightly. Spoon the reserved mushrooms over the chicken.', '5. Serve the chicken and sauce over mashed potatoes, pasta, or steamed rice. Top with fresh thyme or parsley.']

title: Sesame Chicken Dumplings in Spicy Broth with Garlic Crisps
ingredients: ['ground chicken or pork', 'fresh grated ginger', 'garlic, minced or grated', 'roughly chopped spinach or bok choy', 'low sodium soy sauce or tamari', 'black pepper', 'round dumpling or wonton wrappers', 'raw sesame seeds', 'medium shallots, thinly sliced', 'low sodium chicken broth', 'rice vinegar', 'sesame or olive oil', 'Panko breadcrumbs', 'garlic, thinly sliced or smashed', 'crushed red pepper flakes', 'green onions for serving']
ingredients with measurement: {'ground chicken or pork': '1', 'fresh grated ginger': '2', 'garlic, minced or grated': '1', 'roughly chopped spinach or bok choy': '2', 'low sodium soy sauce or tamari': '2', 'black pepper': 'seasoning', 'round dumpling or wonton wrappers': '24-26', 'raw sesame seeds': '1/4', 'medium shallots, thinly sliced': '3-4', 'low sodium chicken broth': '3', 'rice vinegar': '2', 'sesame or olive oil': '5', 'Panko breadcrumbs': '1/2', 'garlic, thinly sliced or smashed': '4', 'crushed red pepper flakes': 'seasoning', 'green onions for serving': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1.\xa0In a medium bowl, combine the raw chicken, bok choy, 1 tablespoon ginger, garlic, 2 tablespoons soy sauce, and a pinch of black pepper.', '2. To assemble, spoon 1 tablespoon of filling onto each wrapper. Brush water around the edges of the wrapper.\xa0Fold the edges of the wrapper up and around the filling and pinch in the center to seal.\xa0Repeat with the remaining wrappers. Place the sesame seeds in a shallow bowl. Brush the bottoms of the dumplings with water and then dredge them in the sesame seeds.', '3. Heat 2 tablespoons of oil in a medium pot. When the oil shimmers, add the shallots and cook until fragrant and caramelized, about 4 minutes. Add 1 tablespoon ginger and cook another minute. Add the broth, 1/4 cup soy sauce, and the rice vinegar. Season to taste with pepper. Bring to a simmer over medium heat. Keep warm.', '4. Heat a few tablespoons of oil in a large skillet set over medium heat. When the oil shimmers, add the dumplings and cook until the bottoms are golden brown, about 2-3 minutes. Carefully pour 1/4 cup of water into the skillet, it will splatter, so stand back. Immediately cover with a tight-fitting lid. Turn heat to medium-low and let the dumplings steam for 5-6 minutes. Remove the dumplings from the skillet to a plate.', '5. In the same skillet, add the remaining 2 tablespoons oil, the Panko, thinly sliced garlic, 1 tablespoon sesame seeds, and a large pinch of red pepper flakes. Cook until lightly toasted, 3 minutes. Watch closely. Spoon the crumbs out of the skillet onto a plate.', '6. Arrange the dumplings in shallow bowls. Ladle the steaming broth over top. Top with garlic crisps, green onions, and\xa0chili oil. Enjoy!']

title: One Pan 4 Cheese Sun-Dried Tomato and Spinach Pasta Bake
ingredients: ['crushed san marzano tomatoes', 'tomato paste', 'chopped oil-packed sun-dried tomatoes', 'frozen spinach, thawed and squeezed of excess liquid', 'garlic, grated', 'dried basil', 'dried oregano', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'crushed red pepper flakes', 'red wine or chicken broth', 'rigatoni pasta', 'cubed fontina cheese', 'grated asiago cheese', 'parmesan cheese', 'shredded provolone', 'fresh basil, parsley, or oregano, for serving']
ingredients with measurement: {'crushed san marzano tomatoes': '1', 'tomato paste': '2', 'chopped oil-packed sun-dried tomatoes': '1/2', 'frozen spinach, thawed and squeezed of excess liquid': '1', 'garlic, grated': '2', 'dried basil': '1', 'dried oregano': '2', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'crushed red pepper flakes': 'seasoning', 'red wine or chicken broth': '1', 'rigatoni pasta': '1', 'cubed fontina cheese': '1', 'grated asiago cheese': '1 1/2', 'parmesan cheese': '1/2', 'shredded provolone': '1', 'fresh basil, parsley, or oregano, for serving': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 375° F. Oil a 9x13 inch baking dish.', '2. To the baking dish, add the tomatoes, tomato paste, sun-dried tomatoes...plus 3 tablespoons of the oil left in the jar, the spinach, garlic, basil, oregano, red wine, and 1 1/2 cups water. Season with red pepper flakes, salt, and pepper. Stir to combine. Add the dry pasta, fontina cheese, asiago, and parmesan, tossing to coat. Push down gently on the pasta to submerge it. Sprinkle the provolone evenly over top.', '3. Rub the underside of a piece of foil with oil. Tightly cover the baking dish with the foil, oiled side facing down. Bake for 40 minutes. Uncover and bake another 15- 20 minutes, or until the cheese is melted and bubbly. Remove from the oven and top with fresh herbs.']

title: Creamy Gnocchi Soup with Rosemary Bacon
ingredients: ['thick cut bacon, chopped', 'fresh chopped rosemary', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'yellow onion, chopped', 'carrots, chopped', 'celery stalks, chopped', 'garlic, minced or grated', 'fresh thyme leaves', 'dried basil', 'fennel seeds', 'crushed red pepper flakes', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'salted butter', 'all-purpose flour', 'low sodium vegetable broth', 'roughly chopped kale', 'canned coconut milk, heavy cream, or whole milk', 'grated parmesan or asiago cheese, plus more for serving', 'fresh potato gnocchi']
ingredients with measurement: {'thick cut bacon, chopped': '4', 'fresh chopped rosemary': '1', 'extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'yellow onion, chopped': '1', 'carrots, chopped': '6', 'celery stalks, chopped': '4', 'garlic, minced or grated': '2-4', 'fresh thyme leaves': '2', 'dried basil': '1', 'fennel seeds': '1-2', 'crushed red pepper flakes': '1', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'salted butter': '2', 'all-purpose flour': '2', 'low sodium vegetable broth': '4-6', 'roughly chopped kale': '4-6', 'canned coconut milk, heavy cream, or whole milk': '1 1/2', 'grated parmesan or asiago cheese, plus more for serving': '1/2', 'fresh potato gnocchi': '1'}
instructions: ["1. Cook the bacon in a large dutch oven over medium heat until crisp, about 5 minutes. During the last minute of cooking, add the rosemary. Remove the bacon. If there's excess bacon grease, drain off all but 1 tablespoon.\xa0Add the olive oil and onion and cook 5 minutes, until golden. Add the carrots, celery, garlic, thyme, basil, fennel, crushed red pepper, and a pinch each of salt and pepper. Cook another 5 minutes, until very fragrant.", '2. Stir in the butter and flour, cook 1 minute. Add 4 cups broth. Simmer over medium heat for 20 minutes, until the carrots are tender.', '3. About 10 minutes before serving, stir in the kale, cream/milk, parmesan, and gnocchi. If the soup is too thick, add additional broth.', '4. Serve the soup topped with the rosemary bacon and parmesan. Enjoy warm...preferably with a crusty piece of bread.']

title: 4 Cheese Sage Pesto Florentine Lasagna
ingredients: ['salted butter', 'garlic, minced or grated', 'chopped fresh sage leaves', 'fresh chopped rosemary', 'crushed fennel seed', 'crushed red pepper flakes', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'all-purpose flour', 'whole milk or canned coconut milk', 'low sodium vegetable or chicken broth', 'ground nutmeg', 'shredded Gruyère or fontina cheese', 'grated parmesan cheese', 'whole milk ricotta', 'shredded provolone', 'frozen spinach, thawed and drained', 'basil pesto', 'large egg', 'box no-boil lasagna noodles']
ingredients with measurement: {'salted butter': '1', 'garlic, minced or grated': '3', 'chopped fresh sage leaves': '2', 'fresh chopped rosemary': '2', 'crushed fennel seed': '1', 'crushed red pepper flakes': '1', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'all-purpose flour': '1/4', 'whole milk or canned coconut milk': '2', 'low sodium vegetable or chicken broth': '2', 'ground nutmeg': '1/4', 'shredded Gruyère or fontina cheese': '1', 'grated parmesan cheese': '1', 'whole milk ricotta': '2', 'shredded provolone': '2', 'frozen spinach, thawed and drained': '2', 'basil pesto': '1/4', 'large egg': '1', 'box no-boil lasagna noodles': '1'}
instructions: ['1.Preheat the oven to 375° F. Butter a 9x13 inch pan.', '2. In a medium saucepan, melt together the butter, garlic, sage, rosemary, fennel, and a pinch of red pepper flakes. Cook 3-4 minutes, until the butter is lightly browning. Whisk in the flour and cook for 1 minute. Add the milk and broth. Season with salt, and pepper. Bring to a boil. Stir in the Gruyère/fontina cheese, 1/2 cup of parmesan cheese, and the nutmeg. Stir until the cheese is melted and the sauce is smooth. Remove from the heat.', '3. In a medium bowl combine the ricotta, provolone, spinach, pesto, and egg. Season with pepper.', "4. Spread 1/4 of the cheese sauce in the bottom of the prepared baking dish. Top with 3-4 lasagna sheets. Spread with 1/2 the ricotta cheese mixture and another 1/4 of the cheese sauce. Repeat the layering. Repeat the layering until all the sauce has been used...don't stress about making it perfect. Top with a 1/2 cup of parmesan.", '5. Bake covered for 30 minutes. Uncover and bake another 15-20 minutes, until the top has bubbled up and browned a bit. Let stand 10 minutes before serving. Enjoy!']

title: Creamy Coconut Chicken Meatball and Noodle Curry
ingredients: ['ground chicken', 'green onions, finely chopped, plus more for serving', 'low sodium soy sauce', 'black pepper', 'extra virgin olive oil or avocado oil', 'cubed butternut squash or sweet potato', 'medium shallots, thinly sliced', 'fresh ginger, grated', 'garlic, minced or grated', 'fresh cilantro, chopped, plus more for serving', 'Thai red curry paste', 'full-fat coconut milk', 'creamy peanut butter', 'fish sauce', 'baby spinach', 'egg or rice noodles', 'pomegranate arils, for serving']
ingredients with measurement: {'ground chicken': '1', 'green onions, finely chopped, plus more for serving': '2', 'low sodium soy sauce': '1/4', 'black pepper': 'seasoning', 'extra virgin olive oil or avocado oil': '5', 'cubed butternut squash or sweet potato': '1', 'medium shallots, thinly sliced': '2-3', 'fresh ginger, grated': '1', 'garlic, minced or grated': '4', 'fresh cilantro, chopped, plus more for serving': '1/2', 'Thai red curry paste': '1/4', 'full-fat coconut milk': '2', 'creamy peanut butter': '2', 'fish sauce': '1', 'baby spinach': '2', 'egg or rice noodles': '8', 'pomegranate arils, for serving': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. Add the chicken, green onions, 2 teaspoons soy sauce, and a pinch of pepper to a bowl. Mix until just combined. Coat your hands with a bit of oil, and roll the meat into tablespoon-size balls (will make 15-20 meatballs).', '2. Heat a large pot over medium-high heat and add 2 tablespoons oil. When the oil shimmers, add the meatballs and sear until crisp, about 4-5 minutes, turning them 2-3 times until cooked through. Transfer to a plate.', '3. To the same pot, add 3 tablespoon oil, the shallots, ginger, and garlic. Cook until fragrant, about 2 minutes. Add the butternut squash and curry paste. Cook another 5 minutes, stirring occasionally. Stir in the coconut milk, 1/2 cup water, 1/4 cup soy sauce, fish sauce, and peanut butter. Slide the meatballs back into the curry. Simmer over medium heat until the meatballs are cooked through, 5-8 minutes. Stir in the spinach. Thin as desired with additional water or broth.', '4. Meanwhile, cook noodles according to package directions.', '5. Divide the noodles between bowls and ladle the curry over. Top each bowl with pomegranate, cilantro, and green onions.']

title: Rosemary Butter Mushroom and Cheese Ravioli.
ingredients: ['extra virgin olive oil', 'shiitake or cremini mushrooms, sliced', 'salted butter', 'garlic, minced or grated', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'chopped fresh rosemary, plus 2 rosemary sprigs', 'dry white wine, such as Pinot Grigio or Sauvignon Blanc', 'low sodium vegetable or chicken broth', 'cheese ravioli, homemade or store-bought', 'torn sourdough bread', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'prosciutto', 'grated Manchego cheese', 'crushed red pepper flakes']
ingredients with measurement: {'extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'shiitake or cremini mushrooms, sliced': '3', 'salted butter': '6', 'garlic, minced or grated': '3', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'chopped fresh rosemary, plus 2 rosemary sprigs': '1', 'dry white wine, such as Pinot Grigio or Sauvignon Blanc': '1/2', 'low sodium vegetable or chicken broth': '1', 'cheese ravioli, homemade or store-bought': '1', 'torn sourdough bread': '2', 'prosciutto': '3', 'grated Manchego cheese': '1/2', 'crushed red pepper flakes': '1/2'}
instructions: ['1. To make the breadcrumbs, preheat oven to 425° F. On a baking sheet, toss the bread, olive oil, manchego, and a pinch of salt. Lay the prosciutto around the bread. Bake 10 minutes, until the prosciutto is crisp. Crumble the bread/prosciutto into fine crumbs using your fingers or pulse in a food processor. Toss with red pepper flakes.', '2. Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Cook the ravioli according to package directions until al dente. Drain the ravioli.', '3. Meanwhile, heat the olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. When the oil shimmers, add the mushrooms. Cook undisturbed for 5 minutes or until golden.\xa0Add the butter, garlic, rosemary, a pinch of crushed red pepper flakes, salt, and pepper. Cook 4-5 minutes, until fragrant. Pour in the wine and broth and bring to a boil. Season with salt and pepper. Cook 5 minutes or until the sauce has reduced slightly.', '4. Drop the ravioli into the sauce, gently toss to combine. Divide the ravioli and sauce between plates. Top with breadcrumbs. Enjoy!']

title: One Pot Baked Spinach and Artichoke Mac and Cheese
ingredients: ['salted butter, at room temperature, plus more for greasing', 'box short-cut pasta, such as macaroni', 'whole milk', 'package cream cheese, cubed', 'shredded sharp cheddar cheese', 'Kosher salt and freshly ground pepper', 'Ground cayenne pepper', 'packed fresh baby spinach, chopped', 'marinated artichokes, drained and roughly chopped', 'crushed Ritz crackers (about 1 sleeve)', 'garlic powder']
ingredients with measurement: {'salted butter, at room temperature, plus more for greasing': '6', 'box short-cut pasta, such as macaroni': '1', 'whole milk': '2', 'package cream cheese, cubed': '1', 'shredded sharp cheddar cheese': '3', 'Kosher salt and freshly ground pepper': 'seasoning', 'Ground cayenne pepper': 'seasoning', 'packed fresh baby spinach, chopped': '2', 'marinated artichokes, drained and roughly chopped': '1', 'crushed Ritz crackers (about 1 sleeve)': '1½', 'garlic powder': '¾'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F. Grease a 9x13 inch baking dish.', '2. In a large saucepan, bring 4 cups of salted water to a boil over high heat. Add the pasta and cook, stirring occasionally, for 8 minutes. Stir in the milk and cream cheese and cook until the cream cheese has melted and the pasta is al dente, about 5 minutes more.', '3. Remove the pan from the heat and stir in 2 cups of the cheddar and 3 tablespoons of the butter. Season with salt, pepper, and cayenne. Stir in the spinach and artichokes. If the sauce feels too thick, add ¼ cup of milk or water to thin it.', '4. Transfer the mixture to the prepared baking dish. Top with the remaining 1 cup of cheddar.', '5. In a medium bowl, stir together the crackers, the remaining 3 tablespoons of butter, and the garlic powder. Sprinkle the crumbs evenly over the mac and cheese.', '6. Bake until the sauce is bubbling and the crumbs are golden, about 20 minutes. Let cool for 5 minutes and serve. Store any leftovers refrigerated in an airtight container for up to 3 days.']

title: Slow Cooker Coq au Vin with Parmesan Mashed Potatoes
ingredients: ['thick-cut bacon, chopped', 'bone in chicken breasts or thighs, skin on or off', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'chopped fresh thyme leaves, plus 4 thyme sprigs', 'yellow onion, chopped', 'garlic, minced or grated', 'tomato paste', 'carrots, chopped', 'cremini mushrooms, halved', 'dry red wine, such as Cabernet Sauvignon', 'low sodium chicken broth', 'bay leaves', 'fresh parsley, chopped', 'small Yukon gold potatoes', 'head garlic', 'whole milk or heavy cream', 'salted butter', 'grated parmesan cheese', 'shredded gruyere cheese']
ingredients with measurement: {'thick-cut bacon, chopped': '4', 'bone in chicken breasts or thighs, skin on or off': '2', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'chopped fresh thyme leaves, plus 4 thyme sprigs': '2', 'yellow onion, chopped': '1', 'garlic, minced or grated': '4', 'tomato paste': '2', 'carrots, chopped': '4', 'cremini mushrooms, halved': '2', 'dry red wine, such as Cabernet Sauvignon': '1 1/2', 'low sodium chicken broth': '1', 'bay leaves': '2', 'fresh parsley, chopped': '1/2', 'small Yukon gold potatoes': '4-5', 'head garlic': '1', 'whole milk or heavy cream': '1/2', 'salted butter': '4', 'grated parmesan cheese': '1/3', 'shredded gruyere cheese': '1/3'}
instructions: ['1. Rub the chicken with thyme and a pinch each of salt and pepper. Cook the bacon in a large skillet over medium heat until crisp, about 5 minutes. Remove the bacon and reserve for later.', '2. To the skillet, add the chicken and sear until golden brown on both sides, about 3 minutes per side. Remove the chicken from the skillet. To the same skillet, add the onion, cook 5 minutes, then remove from the heat and place in the slow cooker. Add the garlic, carrots, mushrooms, tomato paste, red wine, broth, and bay leaves. Season with salt and pepper. Stir to combine.\xa0Add the chicken, skin side facing up.', '3. Slice the top portion of the garlic head off. Poke holes in the potatoes using a fork and place on top of the chicken. Arrange the thyme sprigs and garlic around the potatoes. Cover and cook on low for 5-6 hours or on high for 3-4 hours.', '4. During the last 30 minutes of cooking, remove the potatoes and garlic, let cool slightly.\xa0Continue cooking the chicken with the lid off to thicken the sauce slightly.', '5. Meanwhile, make the potatoes. Peel the potatoes skin away, they should slip right off. Add the potatoes to a bowl with the cream. Squeeze the garlic cloves out into the potatoes, using to your taste. Mash the potatoes and then add the butter and cheeses. Season with salt and pepper.', '6. Remove the bay leaves and thyme from the slow cooker. Stir in the parsley and reserved bacon. Serve the chicken and sauce over the mashed potatoes.']

title: Homemade Cheesy Pizza Rolls
ingredients: ['extra virgin olive oil, for drizzling', 'shredded mozzarella cheese', 'shredded provolone cheese', 'grated parmesan cheese', 'marinara sauce, plus more for serving (warmed)', 'chopped pepperoni', 'garlic, grated', 'dried basil', 'dried oregano', 'dried thyme leaves', 'crushed fennel seed', 'red pepper flakes', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'plain breadcrumbs', 'square wonton wrappers']
ingredients with measurement: {'extra virgin olive oil, for drizzling': 'seasoning', 'shredded mozzarella cheese': '1', 'shredded provolone cheese': '1', 'grated parmesan cheese': '3/4', 'marinara sauce, plus more for serving (warmed)': '3/4', 'chopped pepperoni': '1/3', 'garlic, grated': '1', 'dried basil': '1', 'dried oregano': '1', 'dried thyme leaves': '1', 'crushed fennel seed': '1/2', 'red pepper flakes': '1', 'kosher salt and black pepper': '1', 'plain breadcrumbs': '1/2', 'square wonton wrappers': '36-40'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 425° F. Lightly grease 2 baking sheets.', '2. In a bowl, combine the mozzarella, provolone, 1/4 cup parmesan, marinara, pepperoni, garlic, basil, oregano, thyme, fennel, and a pinch each of red pepper flakes, salt, and pepper.', '3. In a shallow bowl, combine the breadcrumbs and a half cup parmesan.', '4. Fill a bowl with water. Brush 4 wrappers with water, dampening them. Add 1 scant tablespoon of the cheese mix to the center of each wrapper. Fold both sides of the wrapper over the filling (like a letter) overlapping them and pressing gently to seal. Then, flip the 2 ends of the wrapper over the fold, press to seal. Repeat with the remaining wrappers and filling.', '5. Dip each roll in water, letting the excess water drip off back into the bowl, then dredge the roll through the breadcrumbs, tossing to coat. Place the rolls on the prepared baking sheets.', '6. Drizzle each roll with olive oil. Bake for 10-12 minutes, until golden and toasted.', '7. Serve the rolls warm, along with warmed marinara sauce for dipping. Enjoy!']

title: Saucy Coconut Braised Chicken with Rice Noodles and Broccoli
ingredients: ['boneless chicken thighs or breasts', 'ground turmeric', 'Thai Red curry paste', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'kosher salt', 'shallots thinly, sliced', 'zucchini or summer squash, diced', 'roughly chopped broccoli florets', 'garlic, minced or grated', 'fresh ginger, grated', 'full fat coconut milk', 'fish sauce', 'honey', 'rice noodles', 'juice and zest from 1 lime', 'fresh Thai basil, and/or mint']
ingredients with measurement: {'boneless chicken thighs or breasts': '1 1/2', 'ground turmeric': '1', 'Thai Red curry paste': '3-4', 'extra virgin olive oil': '4', 'kosher salt': 'seasoning', 'shallots thinly, sliced': '2', 'zucchini or summer squash, diced': '1', 'roughly chopped broccoli florets': '1 1/2', 'garlic, minced or grated': '2', 'fresh ginger, grated': '1', 'full fat coconut milk': '1', 'fish sauce': '1', 'honey': '2', 'rice noodles': '8', 'juice and zest from 1 lime': 'seasoning', 'fresh Thai basil, and/or mint': '1/4'}
instructions: ['1. Toss the chicken with the turmeric, 1 tablespoon curry paste, and 1 tablespoon oil. Season with salt.', '2. Heat 2 tablespoons oil in a large Dutch oven or a large pot over medium-high heat. Add the chicken and sear on both sides until browned, about 2 minutes. Remove the chicken from the pot.', '3. To the pot, add the\xa0zucchini, shallots, garlic, ginger and a pinch of salt. Cook 5 minutes, until they just begin to soften. Toss in the broccoli, cook another 2-3 minutes. Stir in the curry paste and cook until\xa0fragrant, about 1 minute. Add the coconut milk, 1/2 cup water, the chicken, remaining curry paste, fish sauce, and honey. Stir to combine. Partially cover and simmer for 10-15 minutes, or until the chicken is cooked through. Remove from the heat. Season to taste with salt.', '4. Meanwhile, cook the rice noodles according to package directions.', '5. To serve, divide the noodles among bowls and spoon the curry, vegetables, and chicken over top. Top with fresh basil, mint, and limes.']

title: Instant Pot Crispy Carnitas with Chipotle Peach Salsa
ingredients: ['boneless chicken thighs or cubed pork shoulder', 'garlic, chopped or grated', 'chipotle chili powder', 'smoked paprika', 'dried oregano', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'red pepper flakes', 'Mexican beer, such as Negra Modelo', 'honey', 'juice of 1 lime', 'warmed corn or flour tortillas, for serving', 'creamy corn slaw, for serving, recipe in notes', 'crema, avocado, feta cheese, pickled onion, and cilantro, for serving', 'salsa verde', 'chipotle peppers in adobo', 'chopped ripe peaches', 'kosher salt']
ingredients with measurement: {'boneless chicken thighs or cubed pork shoulder': '2', 'garlic, chopped or grated': '5', 'chipotle chili powder': '1', 'smoked paprika': '2', 'dried oregano': '1', 'kosher salt and black pepper': '1', 'red pepper flakes': '1', 'Mexican beer, such as Negra Modelo': '1', 'honey': '1', 'juice of 1 lime': 'seasoning', 'warmed corn or flour tortillas, for serving': 'seasoning', 'creamy corn slaw, for serving, recipe in notes': 'seasoning', 'crema, avocado, feta cheese, pickled onion, and cilantro, for serving': 'seasoning', 'salsa verde': '1/2', 'chipotle peppers in adobo': '1/4', 'chopped ripe peaches': '1/2', 'kosher salt': '1'}
instructions: ['1.\xa0In the bowl of your instant pot, combine the chicken/pork, garlic, chili powder, paprika, oregano, and a pinch each of salt, pepper, and crushed red pepper flakes. Rub the seasonings into the meat. Add the beer. Cover and cook on high pressure/manual for 8-10 minutes. Once done cooking, use the natural or quick release function to release the steam.', '2. title: Weeknight Sesame Teriyaki Chicken with Ginger Rice
ingredients: ['sesame oil', 'Panko breadcrumbs', 'raw sesame seeds', 'crushed red pepper flakes, using to your taste', 'chopped chives or green onions', 'low sodium soy sauce or tamari', 'honey', 'rice vinegar', 'cucumbers, thinly sliced', 'boneless skinless chicken thighs or breasts, thinly sliced', 'corn starch or flour', 'garlic, minced or grated', 'black pepper', 'fresh ginger, grated', 'red or orange bell peppers, thinly sliced', 'steamed white or brown rice for serving']

title: Oven Fried Coconut Shrimp with Thai Pineapple Chili Sauce

instructions: ['1. In a bowl, whisk together the eggs. Add the shrimp and toss well to coat.', '2. Preheat the oven to 425 degrees F. Rub 2 baking sheets with oil.', '3. To a medium-sized bowl, add the coconut, Panko, flour, sesame seeds, paprika, and a pinch each of salt and pepper. Stir to combine.', '4. Remove each shrimp from the egg, and dredge through the crumbs, pressing gently to adhere. Place on the prepared baking sheet. Repeat until all the shrimp have been used. Make sure not to crowd your pan, if necessary use two baking sheets. Lightly brush/drizzle the shrimp with olive oil. Transfer to the oven and bake for 8-12 minutes, until the shrimp is cooked and the breading crisp.', '5. Meanwhile, make the chili sauce by combining all the ingredients in a bowl.', '6. Serve the shrimp topped with Thai basil, limes, and the pineapple chili sauce for dipping. Add creamy honey mustard or aioli for a little double-dip action. Enjoy!']

title: One Pot 4 Cheese Caprese Mac and Cheese
ingredients: ['salted butter', 'garlic, grated', 'crushed Ritz crackers', 'your favorite short cut pasta', 'cream cheese, cubed', 'milk', 'sharp white cheddar cheese', 'shredded Havarti or fontina cheese', 'Brie, rind removed and chopped', 'basil pesto, homemade or store-bought', 'mustard powder', 'cayenne pepper', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'cherry tomatoes, halved', 'mozzarella cheese', 'regular or heirloom tomatoes, sliced', 'fresh basil, for serving']
ingredients with measurement: {'salted butter': '6', 'garlic, grated': '1-2', 'crushed Ritz crackers': '1', 'your favorite short cut pasta': '1', 'cream cheese, cubed': '2', 'milk': '2', 'sharp white cheddar cheese': '1', 'shredded Havarti or fontina cheese': '1', 'Brie, rind removed and chopped': '4-6', 'basil pesto, homemade or store-bought': '1/4', 'mustard powder': '1/4', 'cayenne pepper': '1/4', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'cherry tomatoes, halved': '1', 'mozzarella cheese': '1', 'regular or heirloom tomatoes, sliced': '1-2', 'fresh basil, for serving': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 375°F. Grease a 9×13-inch baking dish.', '2. In a large pot, bring 4 cups of water to a boil over high heat. Add 1 teaspoon salt and the pasta. Cook, stirring occasionally, for 8 minutes. Do not drain the water. Stir in the milk, cream cheese, mustard, cayenne, and a pinch each of salt and pepper. Cook until the cream cheese has melted and the pasta is al dente, about 4-5 minutes.', '2.\xa0Add the cheddar, Havarti, brie, and 3 tablespoons butter. Stir until melted and creamy. Remove from the heat. Stir in the pesto and cherry tomatoes.', '3. Transfer the mixture to the prepared baking dish. Top with the mozzarella. Lay on the tomato slices. Season with salt and pepper.', '4. In a medium bowl, stir together the crackers, the remaining 3 tablespoons of butter, and the garlic. Sprinkle the crumbs evenly over the mac and cheese. Bake until the sauce is bubbling and the crumbs are golden, about 20 minutes. Eat and enjoy!']

title: Cheesy Zucchini Chicken and Rice Bake
ingredients: ['extra virgin olive oil', 'small/medium zucchini, chopped', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'yellow onion, chopped', 'boneless chicken breasts, cut into cubes', 'salted butter', 'garlic, minced or grated', 'basmati or jasmine rice', 'dry orzo pasta', 'fresh thyme leaves', 'low sodium chicken broth', 'cayenne pepper', 'shredded Havarti cheese', 'shredded sharp cheddar cheese', 'everything bagel spice', 'chopped fresh chives', 'fresh basil, for serving']
ingredients with measurement: {'extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'small/medium zucchini, chopped': '3', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'yellow onion, chopped': '1', 'boneless chicken breasts, cut into cubes': '1', 'salted butter': '2', 'garlic, minced or grated': '2', 'basmati or jasmine rice': '1 1/2', 'dry orzo pasta': '1/2', 'fresh thyme leaves': '2', 'low sodium chicken broth': '3', 'cayenne pepper': '1/2', 'shredded Havarti cheese': '3/4', 'shredded sharp cheddar cheese': '3/4', 'everything bagel spice': '2-4', 'chopped fresh chives': '1', 'fresh basil, for serving': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 425 degrees F.', '2. Heat 1 tablespoon olive oil in a large pot over medium heat. When the oil shimmers, add the zucchini and season with salt and pepper. Cook until the zucchini is golden, 5-8 minutes. Remove the zucchini from the skillet and set aside.', '3. To the skillet, add the remaining oil and the onion. Cook until fragrant, about 5 minutes. Stir in the chicken and season with salt and pepper. Cook until the chicken is seared, 2-3 minutes. Add the butter, garlic, rice, orzo, and thyme, and cook until golden and toasted, 2-3 minutes. Add the broth and bring to a boil over high heat. Add the zucchini back to the skillet. Add the cayenne and a large pinch each of salt and pepper. Bring to a boil, cover, and reduce heat to low. Cook, covered for 15-20 minutes, until the rice is mostly cooked.', '4. Once the rice is cooked, stir in 1/2 cup of the Havarti and 1/2 cup of the cheddar. If needed, transfer the rice to an oven-safe casserole dish. Scatter the remaining 1/4 cup of each cheese overtop the casserole.\xa0Sprinkle on the everything spice and chives.', '5. Transfer to the oven and bake 10-15 minutes, until the cheese is melted. Switch the oven to broil and broil 1-2 minutes, until the cheese on top is becoming crispy. Serve warm with fresh basil.']

title: Prosciutto Balsamic Peach Chicken with Burrata and Basil.
ingredients: ['chicken cutlets or 2 boneless chicken breasts, sliced in half horizontally', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'fig preserves/jam', 'thin slices prosciutto', 'small shallots, halved', 'garlic cloves, smashed', 'peaches, cut into 10-12 wedges', 'fresh thyme leaves', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'salted butter', 'crushed red pepper flakes', 'balsamic vinegar', 'dry white wine, such as Pinot Grigio or Sauvignon Blanc', 'burrata cheese, at room temperature', 'fresh basil']
ingredients with measurement: {'chicken cutlets or 2 boneless chicken breasts, sliced in half horizontally': '4', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'fig preserves/jam': '4', 'thin slices prosciutto': '8', 'small shallots, halved': '2', 'garlic cloves, smashed': '4', 'peaches, cut into 10-12 wedges': '2', 'fresh thyme leaves': '2', 'extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'salted butter': '1', 'crushed red pepper flakes': '1', 'balsamic vinegar': '1/2', 'dry white wine, such as Pinot Grigio or Sauvignon Blanc': '1/4', 'burrata cheese, at room temperature': '2', 'fresh basil': '1/2'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 425 degrees F. Grease an oven-safe skillet with olive oil.', '2. Season the chicken with salt and pepper. Spread each cutlet with 1 tsp fig preserves, then wrap 2 pieces of prosciutto around each cutlet. Transfer the chicken to the prepared skillet. Arrange the shallots, peaches, and thyme around the chicken. Drizzle olive oil over the peaches, season with salt and pepper. Transfer to the oven and roast for 15-20 minutes, until the chicken is cooked.', '3. Switch the oven to broil Remove the peaches from the skillet to a plate. Return the chicken to the oven and broil for 1-2 minutes, until the prosciutto is crisp.\xa0WATCH CLOSELY.\xa0Remove from the oven, place the chicken on the plate with the peaches.', '4. Place the skillet with the shallots and garlic over medium heat. Add the butter and a pinch of red pepper flakes. Add the balsamic vinegar and wine. Bring to a boil over high heat. Boil 3-5 minutes, until reduced by half. Slide the chicken and peaches back into the skillet, simmer 1 minute. Remove from the heat.', '5. Serve the chicken topped with peaches, burrata, and fresh basil. Drizzle over any remaining pan sauce. Serve alongside orzo and crusty bread for soaking up that sauce. Enjoy!']

title: Crispy Sesame Ginger Potstickers with Chive Chili Sauce
ingredients: ['sesame oil', 'shallots, chopped', 'medium zucchini chopped', 'chopped kale, spinach, or bok choy', 'fresh ginger, grated', 'garlic, minced or grated', 'low sodium soy sauce or tamari', 'black pepper', 'round dumpling or wonton wrappers', 'raw sesame seeds', 'toasted sesame oil', 'chili garlic sauce', 'low sodium soy sauce or tamari', 'honey', 'red pepper flakes', 'finely chopped fresh chives', 'roasted peanuts', 'creamy garlic special sauce, for serving']
ingredients with measurement: {'sesame oil': '2', 'shallots, chopped': '2', 'medium zucchini chopped': '3', 'chopped kale, spinach, or bok choy': '2', 'fresh ginger, grated': '1', 'garlic, minced or grated': '4', 'low sodium soy sauce or tamari': '2', 'black pepper': 'seasoning', 'round dumpling or wonton wrappers': '20-22', 'raw sesame seeds': '1/3', 'toasted sesame oil': '1/4', 'chili garlic sauce': '2', 'honey': '2', 'red pepper flakes': '1-2', 'finely chopped fresh chives': '1/4', 'roasted peanuts': '1/4', 'creamy garlic special sauce, for serving': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. Heat the sesame oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. When the oil shimmers, add the shallots and cook until fragrant and lightly caramelized, 2 minutes. Add the zucchini, kale, ginger, and garlic, and cook, stirring occasionally until the zucchini has cooked down, about 5 minutes. Add the soy sauce and a large pinch of pepper. Cook another 2-3 minutes, until the vegetables have soaked up the so sauce. Remove from the heat and let cool.', '2. To assemble, spoon 1 tablespoon of filling onto each wrapper. Brush water around the edges of the wrapper.\xa0Fold the edges of the wrapper up around the filling and pinch in the edges to seal.\xa0Repeat with the remaining wrappers.', '3. Place the sesame seeds in a shallow bowl.  Bring a large pot of water to a boil. Boil the potsticker for 1-2 minutes, until they float. Drain and then dredge in the sesame seeds.', '4. Heat a few tablespoons of oil in a large skillet set over medium heat. When the oil shimmers, add the dumplings and cook until the bottoms are light golden brown, about 2-3 minutes. Once crispy, remove from the pan. Serve warm with the sauces.', '5. To make the sauce, combine all ingredients in a medium bowl. Serve alongside the dumplings.']

title: Everything Cheddar Tomato Bacon Grilled Cheese.
ingredients: ['tomato, thinly sliced', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'sourdough bread', 'shredded sharp cheddar cheese', 'shredded Havarti cheese', 'fresh basil, chopped', 'fresh thyme leaves', 'fresh chopped chives', 'salted butter, at room temperature', 'grated parmesan cheese', 'everything bagel spice', 'cooked crispy bacon']
ingredients with measurement: {'tomato, thinly sliced': '1', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'sourdough bread': '4', 'shredded sharp cheddar cheese': '1', 'shredded Havarti cheese': '1/2', 'fresh basil, chopped': '1/4', 'fresh thyme leaves': '1', 'fresh chopped chives': '1', 'salted butter, at room temperature': '4', 'grated parmesan cheese': '2', 'everything bagel spice': '2-4', 'cooked crispy bacon': '2-4'}
instructions: ['1. Arrange the tomatoes on a cutting board and sprinkle with salt and pepper. Let sit 15 minutes to draw out excess moisture.', '2. In a bowl, combine the cheddar, Havarti, basil, thyme, and chives.', '3. Brush the outside of each slice of bread with butter. Sprinkle the parmesan and everything spice over both buttered sides of the bread, pressing the spice mix gently into the bread to adhere. Heat 1-2 tablespoons olive oil in large skillet over medium heat. Place the sandwiches in the skillet and cook until golden on each side, about 3-5 minutes per side. EAT and ENJOY!']

title: Skillet Creamy Cajun Chicken Lazone with Herby Corn
ingredients: ['large egg, beaten', 'all-purpose flour', 'boneless skinless chicken breast cutlets', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'salted butter', 'corn, kernels removed from the cob', 'garlic, minced or grated', 'fresh thyme leaves', 'dry white wine, such as Pinot Grigio or Sauvignon Blanc', 'canned coconut milk, cream, or whole milk', 'smoked paprika', 'onion powder', 'chili powder', 'cayenne pepper', 'fresh basil', 'lemon wedges, for serving']

title: 15 Minute Garlic Butter Ramen Noodles.
ingredients: ['brown rice ramen noodles', 'salted butter', 'garlic, minced or grated', 'fresh grated ginger', 'small or 1 medium zucchini, grated', 'low sodium soy sauce', 'fresh basil, roughly chopped', 'soft boiled or fried eggs', 'toasted sesame seeds']

instructions: ['1. Bring a large pot of water to a boil. Cook the noodles according to package directions. Drain.', '2. Meanwhile, heat a large skillet over medium-high heat. title: Roasted Tomato Cheddar Tart with Ranch Seasoning

title: Saucy Thai Summer Noodle Stir Fry with Sesame Peanuts
ingredients: ['wide rice noodles', 'sesame or extra virgin olive oil', 'honey', 'raw peanuts', 'raw sesame seeds', 'chili flakes', 'boneless skinless chicken thighs or breasts, thinly sliced', 'low sodium soy sauce or tamari', 'fish sauce', 'Thai red curry paste', 'ketchup', 'garlic, minced or grated', 'fresh ginger, grated', 'zucchini or yellow summer squash, thinly sliced', 'red or orange bell peppers, thinly sliced', 'fresh Thai or regular basil, roughly torn', 'fresh cilantro, roughly chopped', 'limes, for serving']
ingredients with measurement: {'wide rice noodles': '8', 'sesame or extra virgin olive oil': '3', 'honey': '1/4', 'raw peanuts': '1/2', 'raw sesame seeds': '2', 'chili flakes': '1/2', 'boneless skinless chicken thighs or breasts, thinly sliced': '1', 'low sodium soy sauce or tamari': '1/2', 'fish sauce': '1', 'Thai red curry paste': '2-3', 'ketchup': '1', 'garlic, minced or grated': '4', 'fresh ginger, grated': '1', 'zucchini or yellow summer squash, thinly sliced': '1', 'red or orange bell peppers, thinly sliced': '2', 'fresh Thai or regular basil, roughly torn': '1', 'fresh cilantro, roughly chopped': '1/3', 'limes, for serving': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. Cook the rice noodles according to package directions.\xa0Drain.', '2. To make the peanuts. Spoon the peanuts out of the skillet onto a parchment-lined plate. Sprinkle with salt. Set aside.', '3. To make the sauce. title: Brown Butter Corn and Feta Orzo with Crispy Prosciutto

title: Sheet Pan Chipotle Cheddar Corn Chicken Enchiladas
ingredients: ['boneless skinless chicken tenders or small breasts', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'chipotle chilies in adobo, finely chopped', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'ears corn', 'poblano pepper', 'yellow onion, quartered', 'whole garlic cloves, peeled', 'salsa verde', 'fresh cilantro, chopped, plus more for serving', 'corn or flour tortillas', 'shredded cheddar cheese', 'shredded pepper jack cheese', 'avocado, yogurt/sour cream, crumbled cotija/feta, and limes, for serving']
ingredients with measurement: {'boneless skinless chicken tenders or small breasts': '1', 'extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'chipotle chilies in adobo, finely chopped': '2-4', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'ears corn': '3', 'poblano pepper': '1', 'yellow onion, quartered': '1', 'whole garlic cloves, peeled': '4', 'salsa verde': '3', 'fresh cilantro, chopped, plus more for serving': '1/2', 'corn or flour tortillas': '10-12', 'shredded cheddar cheese': '1', 'shredded pepper jack cheese': '1/2', 'avocado, yogurt/sour cream, crumbled cotija/feta, and limes, for serving': 'seasoning'}

title: Greek Salmon with Lemon Feta and Orzo Summer Salad.
ingredients: ['salmon fillets', 'balsamic vinegar', 'smoked paprika', 'chopped fresh oregano (or 1 tablespoon dried oregano)', 'shallot, chopped', 'garlic, minced or grated', 'red pepper flakes, kosher salt, and black pepper', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'lemons, sliced and seeds removed - use to your taste', 'feta cheese, crumbled', 'fresh basil, dill, and or mint, chopped', 'cooked orzo', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'fresh basil, dill, and or chives, chopped', 'roasted red pepper, chopped', 'chickpeas', 'cherry tomatoes, halved', 'green olives', 'cucumber', 'avocado, diced']
ingredients with measurement: {'salmon fillets': '4', 'balsamic vinegar': '1', 'smoked paprika': '2', 'chopped fresh oregano (or 1 tablespoon dried oregano)': '2', 'shallot, chopped': '1', 'garlic, minced or grated': '4', 'red pepper flakes, kosher salt, and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'extra virgin olive oil': '1/3', 'lemons, sliced and seeds removed - use to your taste': '1-2', 'feta cheese, crumbled': '8', 'fresh basil, dill, and or mint, chopped': '1/2', 'cooked orzo': '3', 'fresh basil, dill, and or chives, chopped': '1', 'roasted red pepper, chopped': '1', 'chickpeas': '1', 'cherry tomatoes, halved': '2', 'green olives': '1/2', 'cucumber': '1/2', 'avocado, diced': '1'}
instructions: ['1. Place the salmon in a 9x13 inch baking dish. Add 3 tablespoons olive oil, the balsamic vinegar, paprika, oregano, shallot, garlic, and a pinch each of crushed red pepper, salt, and pepper. Rub the seasonings and oil evenly into flesh. Toss the lemon slices into the oil.', '2. To make the salad. Add the orzo, olive oil, juice of 1 lemon, herbs, and a pinch each of crushed red pepper flakes, salt, and pepper to a large serving bowl. Add the chickpeas, red peppers, tomatoes, olives, and avocado, toss to combine.', '3. Heat your grill, grill pan, or skillet to medium high heat. Place the salmon on the grill, skin side down. Add the lemon slices. Cover and cook until skin is lightly charred, 4-5 minutes, flip the salmon and lemons, grill another 3-4 minutes until opaque. Remove everything from the grill.', '4. Finely chop the lemon slices and mix them with the herbs, crumbled feta, and 3 tablespoons olive oil. Add a couple of spoonfuls of the feta to the orzo salad.', '5. Divide the salad between plates. Add the salmon and sprinkle with lemon feta. Top with lots of fresh herbs, and an extra squeeze of lemon, if desired. Enjoy!']

title: Mac and Cheese Stuffed Oven Fried Zucchini Bites
ingredients: ['elbow pasta', 'salted butter', 'all-purpose flour', 'whole milk', 'shredded sharp cheddar cheese', 'shredded fontina cheese', 'shredded havarti cheese', 'mustard powder', 'cayenne pepper', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'panko bread crumbs', 'grated parmesan cheese', 'paprika', 'large eggs, beaten', 'medium zucchini, cut into 1/4 inch rounds', 'extra virgin olive oil, for drizzling']
ingredients with measurement: {'elbow pasta': '1/2', 'salted butter': '2', 'all-purpose flour': '4', 'whole milk': '1 1/2', 'shredded sharp cheddar cheese': '1 1/4', 'shredded fontina cheese': '1/2', 'shredded havarti cheese': '1/2', 'mustard powder': '1/4', 'cayenne pepper': '1/4', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'panko bread crumbs': '1 1/2', 'grated parmesan cheese': '1', 'paprika': '1/2', 'large eggs, beaten': '3', 'medium zucchini, cut into 1/4 inch rounds': '2-3', 'extra virgin olive oil, for drizzling': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. In a large saucepan, melt the butter over medium heat. Whisk in 2 tablespoons flour. Reduce the heat to medium-low and cook for 1 minute, stirring to avoid burning—it will bubble. Gradually whisk in the milk and 1 cup of water, then stir in the macaroni. Increase the heat to medium-high and bring the mixture to a boil. Stir frequently until the macaroni is just al dente, 8 to 10 minutes. If the sauce thicken too quickly, add 1/2 additional water.', '2. When the macaroni is al dente, remove the pan from the heat and stir in the cheddar, fontina, Havarti, mustard, and cayenne. Season with salt and pepper. Stir until the cheeses have fully melted. Let cool. Transfer to the fridge to chill 2 hours or place in the freezer 30-45 minutes, until cold.', '3. Preheat the oven to 425 degrees F. Line 2 baking sheets with parchment paper.', '4. Place the panko, parmesan, 2 tablespoons flour, and the paprika in a shallow bowl. Add the eggs to a separate bowl. Scoop out 1 tablespoon of mac and cheese and pack it into a ball. Sandwich the mac and cheese between 2 zucchini slices, secure with 2 toothpicks.', '5. Dredge the stuffed zucchini bites through the egg, and then through the panko mix, tossing to coat entirely. Place onto the prepared baking sheet. Repeat until all the bites are breaded. Make sure not to crowd your pans.', "6. Brush/drizzling the bites with olive oil. Transfer to the oven and bake for 15-20 minutes or until golden and crisp. Some of the bite may break in half, it's OK, they will still be delicious. Serve while hot with your favorite dipping sauces and or fresh herbs."]

title: 20 Minute Florentine Butter Chicken with Burst Cherry Tomatoes
ingredients: ['large egg, beaten', 'all-purpose flour', 'boneless skinless chicken breast cutlets', 'kosher salt and pepper', 'cold salted butter, cubed', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'cherry tomatoes', 'garlic, smashed', 'fresh chopped thyme', 'crushed red pepper flakes', 'buffalo or regular mozzarella, torn', 'fresh lemon juice', 'fresh basil, torn']
ingredients with measurement: {'large egg, beaten': '1', 'all-purpose flour': '1/4', 'boneless skinless chicken breast cutlets': '4', 'kosher salt and pepper': 'seasoning', 'cold salted butter, cubed': '10', 'extra virgin olive oil': '4', 'cherry tomatoes': '2 1/2', 'garlic, smashed': '4', 'fresh chopped thyme': '2', 'crushed red pepper flakes': '1', 'buffalo or regular mozzarella, torn': '4', 'fresh lemon juice': '3', 'fresh basil, torn': '1/2'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the broiler. Place the egg and flour in separate shallow bowls.', '2. Season the chicken with salt and pepper. Dredge both sides of the chicken through the egg, and then through the flour, tossing to coat. Place the chicken on a plate.', '3. In an oven safe skillet set over medium heat, add 2 tablespoons olive oil. When the oil shimmers, add the tomatoes, garlic, 1 tablespoon thyme, and a pinch each of salt, pepper, and red pepper flakes. Cook until the tomatoes begin to pop, about 4-5 minutes. Turn off the heat and transfer the tomatoes to a plate.', '4. In the same skillet, melt together 4 tablespoons butter and 2 tablespoons olive oil. When the oil shimmers, add the chicken and cook until the bottom side is golden brown, about 3-4 minutes. Flip the chicken and add 6 tablespoons butter and 1 tablespoon thyme, swirling the butter around the chicken. Cook, basting the chicken in butter until the chicken is cooked and golden brown, about 4 to 5 minutes.', '5. Remove from the heat, add the mozzarella around the chicken. Spoon the tomatoes and lemon juice over top. Transfer to the oven, broil 1 minute, until the cheese is melted. Serve topped with lots of fresh basil. Enjoy!']

title: 20 Minute Lemon Butter Pasta with Ricotta and Spicy Breadcrumbs
ingredients: ['extra virgin olive oil', 'Panko breadcrumbs', 'drained capers', 'crushed red pepper flakes', 'angel hair pasta', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'cold salted butter', 'lemon, sliced, seeds removed', 'fresh basil, chopped', 'zucchini or yellow summer squash, very thinly sliced', 'garlic, minced or grated', 'fresh thyme leaves', 'ricotta cheese, whipped, if desired']
ingredients with measurement: {'extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'Panko breadcrumbs': '1', 'drained capers': '2', 'crushed red pepper flakes': '1/2-1', 'angel hair pasta': '3/4', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'cold salted butter': '6', 'lemon, sliced, seeds removed': '1', 'fresh basil, chopped': '1', 'zucchini or yellow summer squash, very thinly sliced': '1', 'garlic, minced or grated': '3-4', 'fresh thyme leaves': '2', 'ricotta cheese, whipped, if desired': '8'}
instructions: ['1. Heat a large skillet over medium heat. Add the olive oil, the breadcrumbs, capers, and crushed red pepper flakes. Cook, stirring occasionally until the breadcrumbs are toasted all over and the capers fried, about 4 minutes. Remove the breadcrumbs from the skillet. Season with salt.', '2. Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Cook the pasta according to package directions until al dente. Drain.', '3. Meanwhile, set your skillet over medium-high heat. Add the 2 tablespoons butter and lemon slices. Sear until the lemon is caramelized, about 1 minute per side. Remove the lemon from the skillet. Finely chop the lemon slices and mix with the basil.', '4. To the skillet, add the remaining butter, zucchini, garlic, and thyme. Season with salt and pepper. Cook until the zucchini is golden, 5 minutes. Watch the garlic closely. Remove from the heat, stir in the pasta and 1/2 of the lemon/basil.', '5. Spread the ricotta into bowls. Add the pasta. Top with breadcrumbs and additional lemon/basil. Twirl the pasta up with the cheese. EAT and ENJOY.']

title: Crispy BBQ Beer Battered Cauliflower Nuggets
ingredients: ['large head cauliflower, cut into florets', 'all-purpose flour', 'smoked paprika', 'cayenne pepper, using more or less to your taste', 'baking powder', 'kosher salt', 'of your favorite beer, or use sparkling water', 'oil for frying', 'of your favorite BBQ sauce, plus more for serving', 'dijon mustard', 'honey', 'sour cream, plain Greek yogurt, or olive oil based mayo', 'juice of 1/2 a lemon', 'BBQ or Cajun seasoning', 'cayenne pepper', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'ketchup', 'honey', 'molasses', 'apple cider vinegar', 'Worcestershire sauce', 'Dijon mustard', 'smoked paprika', 'garlic powder', 'onion powder', 'cayenne pepper', 'kosher salt', 'pepper']
ingredients with measurement: {'large head cauliflower, cut into florets': '1', 'all-purpose flour': '3/4', 'smoked paprika': '1', 'cayenne pepper, using more or less to your taste': '1/2-1', 'baking powder': '1', 'kosher salt': '1 1/2', 'of your favorite beer, or use sparkling water': '3/4', 'oil for frying': 'seasoning', 'of your favorite BBQ sauce, plus more for serving': '3/4', 'dijon mustard': '1/4', 'honey': '3/4', 'sour cream, plain Greek yogurt, or olive oil based mayo': '1/4', 'juice of 1/2 a lemon': 'seasoning', 'BBQ or Cajun seasoning': '1', 'cayenne pepper': '1/2', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'ketchup': '1 1/4', 'molasses': '1/4', 'apple cider vinegar': '1/4', 'Worcestershire sauce': '1', 'Dijon mustard': '1', 'garlic powder': '1', 'onion powder': '1', 'pepper': '1'}
instructions: ['1. In a large bowl, mix the flour, paprika, cayenne, baking powder, and a pinch of salt. Add the beer, mixing until just combined. Add the cauliflower and toss well to evenly coat all the florets.', '2. To Fry: Heat 1-2 inches of oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Fry the cauliflower in batches for 4-5 minutes or until golden and crisp on all sides. Remove and drain on a wire rack with paper towels underneath. This will keep the cauliflower crisp.', "3. title: Spicy Coconut Basil Chicken Curry with Garden Vegetables.
ingredients: ['boneless skinless chicken thighs or breasts, thinly sliced', 'yellow curry powder', 'ground turmeric', 'cayenne pepper', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'sesame oil or extra virgin olive oil', 'zucchini or summer squash, diced', 'sweet corn, kernels removed from the cob', 'medium shallots, chopped', 'garlic, minced or grated', 'fresh ginger, grated', 'crushed red pepper flakes', 'coconut milk', 'juice and zest from 1/2 a lemon', 'fresh cilantro, chopped', 'fresh basil, roughly torn', 'cooked basmati rice', 'toasted sesame seeds']
ingredients with measurement: {'boneless skinless chicken thighs or breasts, thinly sliced': '1', 'yellow curry powder': '1 1/2', 'ground turmeric': '1', 'cayenne pepper': '1/4-1/2', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'sesame oil or extra virgin olive oil': '3', 'zucchini or summer squash, diced': '2', 'sweet corn, kernels removed from the cob': '2', 'medium shallots, chopped': '2-3', 'garlic, minced or grated': '2', 'fresh ginger, grated': '1', 'crushed red pepper flakes': '1', 'coconut milk': '1', 'juice and zest from 1/2 a lemon': 'seasoning', 'fresh cilantro, chopped': '1/4', 'fresh basil, roughly torn': '1/4', 'cooked basmati rice': '2', 'toasted sesame seeds': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. In a medium bowl, toss together the chicken, curry powder, turmeric, cayenne, 1 tablespoon oil, and a pinch each of salt and pepper.', '2. Heat the remaining 2 tablespoons of oil in a large skillet over medium heat. When the oil shimmers, add the chicken and brown all over, about 5 minutes. Add the zucchini, corn, shallots, garlic, and ginger. Season with crushed red pepper flakes, salt, and pepper. Cook the veggies another 5-10 minutes or until they just begin to soften.', '3. Stir in the coconut milk and 1/3-1/2 cup water. Stir to combine, bring the mixture to a simmer over medium heat, cook 5-10 minutes or until the sauce thickens slightly. If the sauce thickens too much, add additional water to thin. Remove from the heat and stir in the lemon juice and zest, cilantro, and basil.', '4. To serve, divide the rice among bowls and spoon the curry overtop. Top with sesame seeds and fresh herbs. Enjoy!']

title: 25 Minute Korean Bulgogi BBQ Chicken with Spicy Garlic Butter Corn

title: Chipotle BBQ Shrimp Tacos with Creamy Ranch Slaw.

title: Garden Greens Goddess Pizza.

instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 450 degrees F. Grease a large baking sheet with olive oil.', '2. Make the pesto, if using homemade. title: Skillet Cheesy Pizza Chicken
ingredients: ['plain Greek yogurt or buttermilk', 'Panko bread crumbs', 'shredded parmesan cheese', 'boneless skinless chicken breasts', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'dry mozzarella cheese, torn', 'fresh basil, plus more for serving', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'garlic, minced or grated', 'dried oregano', 'crushed red pepper flakes', 'tomato paste', 'vodka', 'fresh cherry tomatoes', 'pepperoni']
ingredients with measurement: {'plain Greek yogurt or buttermilk': '1/4', 'Panko bread crumbs': '1 1/3', 'shredded parmesan cheese': '2/3', 'boneless skinless chicken breasts': '2', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'dry mozzarella cheese, torn': '8', 'fresh basil, plus more for serving': '1/2', 'extra virgin olive oil': '4', 'garlic, minced or grated': '2', 'dried oregano': '2', 'crushed red pepper flakes': '1', 'tomato paste': '2', 'vodka': '1/2', 'fresh cherry tomatoes': '2 1/2', 'pepperoni': '3'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 425 degrees F. Place the yogurt in shallow bowl. Add the Panko and parmesan to a separate shallow bowl. Season the crumbs with salt and pepper.', '2. Slice the chicken through the middle horizontally to within a 1/2 inch of the other side. Open the two sides and spread them out like an open book.\xa0Layer a handful of mozzarella on 1 side, then place a basil leaf over the cheese. Close the chicken sides like a book, covering the filling (see above photos). Dredge both sides of the chicken through the yogurt and then through the Panko, pressing gently to adhere. Place the chicken on a plate.', '3. Heat 2 tablespoons of oil in a large skillet over medium-high. When the oil shimmers, add the chicken and cook until the bottom side is golden brown, about 3-4 minutes. Carefully flip the chicken and cook until golden brown on the other side, 3-4 minutes.
