Whisk together the reserved sun-dried tomato oil (or 1/3 cup extra virgin olive oil), lemon juice, vinegar, and honey. Season with salt, pepper, and crushed red pepper flakes.', '4. To make the vinaigrette. Whisk together the reserved sun-dried tomato oil (or 1/3 cup extra virgin olive oil), lemon juice, vinegar, and honey. Season with salt, pepper, and crushed red pepper flakes.', '5. Pour the vinaigrette over the salad, tossing to combine. Top the salad with crispy chickpeas, feta, and avocado. Enjoy!']

title: Spinach and Artichoke Stuffed Soft Pretzels.
ingredients: ['warm water', 'light brown sugar', 'active dry yeast', 'wheat beer, at room temperature', 'salted butter', 'sea salt or kosher salt', 'all-purpose flour', 'baking soda', 'egg, beaten', 'Coarse sea salt', 'cream cheese', 'shredded mozzarella cheese', 'grated parmesan cheese', 'garlic, minced or grated', 'crushed red pepper flakes', 'frozen chopped spinach, thawed and squeezed dry of excess water', 'jar marinated artichokes, chopped']
ingredients with measurement: {'warm water': '1/2', 'light brown sugar': '2', 'active dry yeast': '2 1/4', 'wheat beer, at room temperature': '1', 'salted butter': '1', 'sea salt or kosher salt': '1 1/2', 'all-purpose flour': '4 1/2', 'baking soda': '2/3', 'egg, beaten': '1', 'Coarse sea salt': 'seasoning', 'cream cheese': '4', 'shredded mozzarella cheese': '1/2', 'grated parmesan cheese': '1/2', 'garlic, minced or grated': '1', 'crushed red pepper flakes': '1/2', 'frozen chopped spinach, thawed and squeezed dry of excess water': '1/2', 'jar marinated artichokes, chopped': '1'}
instructions: ['1. Combine the water, brown sugar and yeast in the bowl of a stand mixer and mix with the dough hook until combined. Let sit for 5 minutes.', '2. Add the beer, melted butter, salt, and flour to the mixture and mix on low-speed until combined. Increase the speed to medium and continue kneading until the dough is smooth and begins to pull away from the sides of the bowl, about 3 to 4 minutes. If the dough appears too wet, add additional flour, 1 tablespoon at a time. Remove the dough from the bowl, place on a flat surface and knead into a ball with your hands. Coat a large bowl with oil, add the dough and turn to coat with the oil. Cover with a clean towel or plastic wrap and place in a warm spot until the dough doubles in size. This will take about 1 hour.', '3. Meanwhile, make the dip.\xa0In a medium bowl, combine the cream cheese, mozzarella, parmesan, garlic, and a pinch of crushed red pepper and salt. Stir in the spinach and artichokes.', '4. Preheat the oven to 425 degrees F. Bring a large pot of water to a boil.', '5.\xa0Divide the pretzel dough into 8 equal balls and roll each out into a rectangle (about 11x3 inches). Spread about 1 1/2 tablespoons spinach and artichoke dip along the length of each piece. Starting with the opposite side, roll the dough up into a log, enclosing the toppings inside. Pinch the seams together and then very gently roll the dough with your hands to form an even cylinder and fully enclose the filling (see above photos).', '6.\xa0To shape into pretzels, take the right side and cross over to the left. Cross right to left again and flip up. Slowly add the baking soda to the boiling water. Boil the pretzels in the water, 2 at a time for 30 seconds, splashing the tops with the warmed water using a spoon. Remove with a large flat slotted spatula or a spider. Line two baking sheets with parchment paper placing 4 pretzels on each. Brush the tops with the beaten egg wash and season liberally with sea salt. Bake for 15 to 18 minutes or until pretzels are golden brown.', '7.\xa0Remove pretzels from oven and let cool 5 minutes. Serve and enjoy! If needed, the pretzels can be reheated in a 350 degrees F. for 15 minutes.']

title: Mini Mozzarella in Carrozza with Pomegranate Honey
ingredients: ['soft brioche bread', 'low moisture mozzarella, thinly sliced', 'havarti cheese, shredded', 'eggs, beaten', 'Panko bread crumbs', 'grated parmesan cheese', 'extra virgin olive oil, for frying', 'honey', 'arils from 1 pomegranate', 'fresh thyme, for serving', 'flaky salt']

Heat a few tablespoons olive oil in a large skillet set over medium high heat. When the oil shimmers, place one sandwich at a time in the skillet and cook for 2-3 minutes, carefully flip and cook another 3-4 minutes, until the cheese is melted and the crust is golden. Remove and place on the prepared baking sheet. Repeat with the remaining\xa0sandwiches, keeping them warm in the oven as you work. The sandwiches can be kept in the oven for up to 30 minutes.', 'lace one sandwich at a time in the skillet and cook for 2-3 minutes, carefully flip and cook another 3-4 minutes, until the cheese is melted and the crust is golden. Remove and place on the prepared baking sheet. Repeat with the', 'remaining', 'sandwiches, keeping them warm in the oven as you work. The sandwiches can be kept in the oven for up to 30 minutes.', '4. Mix together\xa0the honey and pomegranates.', '4. Mix', 'the honey and pomegranates.', '5. To serve, slice each sandwich into 4 pieces. Drizzle or dip into the pomegranate honey sauce. Serve with thyme and flaky salt.']

title: Instant Pot Pasta e Fagioli

title: Pesto Bolognese Lasagna
ingredients: ['extra virgin olive oil', 'medium yellow onion, chopped', 'red bell pepper, chopped', 'garlic, minced or grated', 'ground spicy Italian sausage', 'lean ground beef', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'chopped tomatoes', 'tomato paste', 'dried oregano', 'bay leaf', 'whole milk', 'shredded provolone cheese', 'whole milk ricotta cheese', 'basil pesto, homemade or store bought', 'fresh mozzarella, torn', 'no-boil lasagna noodles', 'grated parmesan and fresh basil, for serving']
ingredients with measurement: {'extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'medium yellow onion, chopped': '1', 'red bell pepper, chopped': '1', 'garlic, minced or grated': '2', 'ground spicy Italian sausage': '3/4', 'lean ground beef': '1/2', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'chopped tomatoes': '1', 'tomato paste': '1/4', 'dried oregano': '2', 'bay leaf': '1', 'whole milk': '1', 'shredded provolone cheese': '2', 'whole milk ricotta cheese': '2', 'basil pesto, homemade or store bought': '1/2', 'fresh mozzarella, torn': '6', 'no-boil lasagna noodles': '1', 'grated parmesan and fresh basil, for serving': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. Heat the olive oil in a large soup pot over medium heat. When the oil shimmers, add the onion and season with salt and pepper. Cook 5 minutes or until the onion is fragrant and beginning to caramelize. Add the bell pepper, garlic, sausage, and beef, brown all over, breaking up the meat as you go, about 10 minutes.', '2. Add the tomatoes, tomato paste, oregano, bay leaves, milk, and 1 cup of water. Season with salt and pepper. Stir to combine. Cook over medium for 30 minutes, until the sauce has thickened slightly. Or cook, covered, for up to 3 hours over low heat, stirring occasionally. The longer you can cook, the more flavorful.\xa0Remove the bay leaves and discard.\xa0If your sauce seems thick, add 1/2 cup additional water to thin.', '4.\xa0In a medium bowl combine the ricotta and pesto.', '5. Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F. Grease a 9x13 inch pan. Spread 1/4 of the Bolognese sauce onto the bottom of the dish. Top with 3-4 lasagna sheets. Spread with 1/2 the ricotta cheese mixture, another 1/4 of the Bolognese sauce, and half of the provolone. Place another 3-4 lasagna noodles on top. Then top with the remaining ricotta cheese mixture, another 1/4 of the Bolognese sauce, and the remaining provolone. Add the remaining lasagna noodles and pour the remaining Bolognese sauce over top. Top with mozzarella and parmesan cheese. Bake uncovered for 45 minutes or until the top has bubbled up and browned a bit. Let stand 10 minutes before serving.']

title: Rosemary Beef Tenderloin with Wild Mushroom Cream Sauce
ingredients: ['beef tenderloin, cut into 6 steaks', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'fresh chopped rosemary', 'garlic, finely chopped', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'salted butter', 'shallots thinly, sliced', 'wild mushrooms, torn', 'dijon mustard', 'dry white wine', 'heavy cream or whole milk', 'grated parmesan', 'kosher salt and pepper', 'crushed red pepper flakes']
ingredients with measurement: {'beef tenderloin, cut into 6 steaks': '1', 'extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'fresh chopped rosemary': '2', 'garlic, finely chopped': '3', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'salted butter': '2', 'shallots thinly, sliced': '2', 'wild mushrooms, torn': '12', 'dijon mustard': '2', 'dry white wine': '1/2', 'heavy cream or whole milk': '1', 'grated parmesan': '1/3', 'kosher salt and pepper': 'seasoning', 'crushed red pepper flakes': '1'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F.', '2. Rub the steaks with rosemary, and garlic. Season each side with salt and pepper.', '3. Heat the olive oil in a large skillet over high heat. When the oil shimmers, add the steaks and sear each side, about 2 minutes per side. Transfer the steaks to a baking sheet sheet and then place in the oven. Roast until the meat registers 120 to 125 degrees F. on a meat thermometer. For medium-rare/rare, about 8-12 minutes.\xa0Remove from the oven, cover tightly with foil, and allow to rest for 10 minutes.', '4. Meanwhile, make the sauce. Melt the butter in a skillet set over medium high heat.\xa0Add the shallots and mushrooms and season with salt and pepper. Cook undisturbed for 5 minutes or until golden, stir and continue cooking until the mushrooms have caramelized, 3-5 minutes. Remove the mushrooms from the skillet to a plate.', '4. Add the wine and scrape up any browned bits off the pan. Simmer 3-5 minutes or until the wine has reduced by about 1/3. Slowly pour in the cream and mustard. Bring the sauce to a boil. Reduce the heat to low and simmer 5 minutes or until the sauce has thickened slightly. Remove from the heat and stir in the parmesan. Season the sauce with salt and pepper and crushed red pepper. Stir in the mushrooms.', '5. Serve the steaks with flaky salt and pour the sauce overtop. Enjoy!']

title: Ginger Peanut Chicken Noodle Soup
ingredients: ['sesame oil', 'bone in, skin on, chicken breast', 'fresh ginger, grated', 'shallot, chopped', 'garlic, minced or grated', 'low sodium chicken broth', 'low sodium soy sauce', 'fish sauce', 'honey', 'baby bok choy or baby spinach, roughly chopped', 'egg noodles', 'roasted peanuts, roughly chopped', 'jalapeños, green onions, and lime, for serving']

title: Broccoli Cheese Wild Rice Casserole

title: Roasted Mushroom Kale Pizza
ingredients: ['shredded Tuscan kale', 'mixed wild mushrooms, torn', 'garlic, grated', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'balsamic vinegar', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'fresh thyme leaves, plus more for serving', 'pizza dough, homemade or store-bought', 'fig preserves', 'fresh sage leaves, chopped', 'crushed red pepper flakes', 'crumbled goat cheese', 'shredded havarti cheese', 'salted butter, thinly sliced into 3 pieces']
ingredients with measurement: {'shredded Tuscan kale': '2', 'mixed wild mushrooms, torn': '8', 'garlic, grated': '2', 'extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'balsamic vinegar': '2', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'fresh thyme leaves, plus more for serving': '2', 'pizza dough, homemade or store-bought': '1/2', 'fig preserves': '1', 'fresh sage leaves, chopped': '4', 'crushed red pepper flakes': '1', 'crumbled goat cheese': '3', 'shredded havarti cheese': '1', 'salted butter, thinly sliced into 3 pieces': '1'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 450 degrees F. Grease a large baking sheet with olive oil.', '2. In a medium bowl, combine the kale, mushrooms, garlic, olive oil, balsamic vinegar, thyme, and a pinch each of salt and pepper. Massage the kale and mushrooms with your hands for 1 minute.', '3. On a lightly floured surface, push/roll the dough out until it is pretty thin (about a 10-12 inch circle). Transfer the dough to the prepared baking sheet.', '4. Spread the dough with preserves. Add the sage, crushed red pepper, and goat cheese, then layer the kale and mushrooms over the cheese. Top with havarti and thin slices of butter.', '5. Transfer to the oven and bake for 10-15 minutes or until the crust is golden and the cheese has melted.', '6. Top the pizza with fresh thyme. ENJOY!']

title: Ginger Sesame Chicken Potstickers with Sweet Chili Pomegranate Sauce
ingredients: ['raw ground chicken, turkey, or pork', 'shredded kale', 'fresh ginger, grated', 'garlic, grated', 'green onions, chopped', 'carrots, shredded', 'low sodium soy sauce', 'sesame oil, plus more for cooking', 'black pepper', 'round wonton wrappers', 'raw sesame seeds', 'sweet Thai chili sauce', 'pomegranate juice', 'low sodium soy sauce', 'pomegranate arils']
ingredients with measurement: {'raw ground chicken, turkey, or pork': '1', 'shredded kale': '1', 'fresh ginger, grated': '1', 'garlic, grated': '2', 'green onions, chopped': '2', 'carrots, shredded': '2', 'low sodium soy sauce': '2', 'sesame oil, plus more for cooking': '2', 'black pepper': 'seasoning', 'round wonton wrappers': '40', 'raw sesame seeds': '1/3', 'sweet Thai chili sauce': '1/2', 'pomegranate juice': '1/4', 'pomegranate arils': '1/2'}
instructions: ['1.\xa0In a medium bowl, combine the raw ground chicken, kale, carrots, ginger, garlic, green onions, soy sauce, sesame oil, and a pinch of black pepper, to taste.', '2. Working with 1 wonton wrapper at a time, spoon 1 tablespoon of filling into the center of each wrapper. Brush water around the edge of the wrapper. Fold the dough over the filling to create a half moon shape, pinching the edges to seal. Repeat with the remaining wrappers.', '3. Place the sesame seeds in a shallow bowl. Brush the bottoms of the potstickers with water and then dredge them in the sesame seeds.', '4. Heat a few tablespoons of oil in a large skillet set over medium heat. When the oil shimmers, add the potstickers and cook until the bottoms are light golden brown, about 2-3 minutes. Carefully pour 1/4 cup of water into the skillet, it will splatter, so stand back. Immediately cover with a tight-fitting lid. Turn heat to medium-low and let the dumplings steam for 5-6 minutes, until the filling is cooked through inside. Serve right away with sauce (see below).', '5. To make the sauce, combine all ingredients in a medium bowl. Serve alongside the potstickers.']

title: Turkey and Wild Rice Pot Pie
ingredients: ['extra virgin olive oil', 'salted butter', 'small shallots, chopped', 'fresh thyme leaves', 'all-purpose flour', 'low sodium chicken broth', 'dry white wine, such as Sauvignon Blanc or Pinot Grigio', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'parmesan rind', 'carrots, chopped', 'roughly chopped kale or spinach', 'cooked wild rice', 'cooked shredded turkey or chicken', 'zest of 1 lemon', 'pie crust rounds', 'egg, beaten']
ingredients with measurement: {'extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'salted butter': '3', 'small shallots, chopped': '2', 'fresh thyme leaves': '2', 'all-purpose flour': '1/3', 'low sodium chicken broth': '4', 'dry white wine, such as Sauvignon Blanc or Pinot Grigio': '1', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'parmesan rind': '1', 'carrots, chopped': '6', 'roughly chopped kale or spinach': '1', 'cooked wild rice': '1', 'cooked shredded turkey or chicken': '1-2', 'zest of 1 lemon': 'seasoning', 'pie crust rounds': '2', 'egg, beaten': '1'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat oven to 375 degrees F.', '2. Melt the butter with the olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add the shallot, and thyme and cook, stirring often, until shallot is fragrant and golden, about 4 minutes. Add the flour and cook 1-2 minutes, until golden.', '3. Gradually whisk in the broth and wine, and season with salt and pepper. Add the parmesan rind. Bring to a boil, then reduce the heat and simmer, whisking occasionally, until mixture thickens slightly, about 10 minutes. Stir in the carrots and kale, and cook until just tender, about 5 minutes.', '4. Remove from the heat and add the turkey, wild rice, and lemon zest, season with salt, and pepper. Remove the parmesan rind and discard.', '5. Transfer mixture to a shallow 2-qt. baking dish or to 6 (8 ounce) ramekins. Alternately, if using a cast iron skillet, you can bake the pie in the skillet.', '6. Gently roll out the pie crust on a lightly floured surface to just the size of your baking dish. If using ramekins, cut crust into smaller circles to fit. Place over the baking dish. Brush with beaten egg, and cut 2 or 3 slits into the pastry with a sharp knife.', '7. Place the pies on a baking sheet. Transfer to the oven and bake until the crust is golden brown, 30-40 minutes. Serve with fresh thyme.']

title: Red Wine Cranberry Braised Short Ribs
ingredients: ['bone in, beef short ribs', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'medium yellow onion, thinly sliced', 'shallots, thinly sliced', 'carrots, chopped', 'dry red wine, such as Cabernet Sauvignon', 'low sodium beef broth', 'tomato paste', 'brown sugar or honey', 'fresh thyme', 'fresh rosemary', 'bay leaves', 'fresh cranberries', 'mashed potatoes, for serving']
ingredients with measurement: {'bone in, beef short ribs': '5', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'medium yellow onion, thinly sliced': '1', 'shallots, thinly sliced': '2', 'carrots, chopped': '4', 'dry red wine, such as Cabernet Sauvignon': '2', 'low sodium beef broth': '2', 'tomato paste': '2', 'brown sugar or honey': '1', 'fresh thyme': '4', 'fresh rosemary': '2', 'bay leaves': '2', 'fresh cranberries': '2', 'mashed potatoes, for serving': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. Season the short ribs with salt and pepper. Heat the olive oil in a large oven safe skillet, sear the ribs on both sides. Remove the ribs and transfer to the slow cooker.', '2. To the slow cooker, add the onions, shallots, and carrots. Add the wine, broth, tomato paste, brown sugar, thyme, rosemary, and bay leaves. Season with salt and pepper, gently stir to combine. Cover and cook on low for 6-8 hours. During the last 2 hours of cooking, add the cranberries.', '3. Remove the thyme, rosemary, and bay leaves. Serve the ribs over a bed of mashed potatoes. Drizzle with the pan sauce. Enjoy!']

title: Golden Sweet Potato Soup with Burrata and Sage Pesto
ingredients: ['extra virgin olive oil', 'fresh sage leaves, chopped', 'Tuscan kale, chopped', 'shelled roasted pistachios', 'grated parmesan cheese', 'kosher salt and crushed red pepper flakes', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'shallots, thinly sliced', 'fresh thyme, chopped', 'salted butter', 'low-sodium chicken or veggie broth', 'peeled, cubed sweet potatoes', 'nutmeg', 'cayenne, to your taste', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'full fat coconut milk', 'burrata cheese']
ingredients with measurement: {'extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'fresh sage leaves, chopped': '1/2', 'Tuscan kale, chopped': '1', 'shelled roasted pistachios': '1/4', 'grated parmesan cheese': '1/4', 'kosher salt and crushed red pepper flakes': 'seasoning', 'shallots, thinly sliced': '2', 'fresh thyme, chopped': '2', 'salted butter': '3', 'low-sodium chicken or veggie broth': '4', 'peeled, cubed sweet potatoes': '3', 'nutmeg': '1/4', 'cayenne, to your taste': '1', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'full fat coconut milk': '1', 'burrata cheese': '8'}
instructions: ['1. To make the pesto. Heat 2 tablespoons olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat. When the oil shimmers, add the sage and cook 2 minutes, until fragrant and crisp. Remove from heat.', '2. In a food processor, pulse together the remaining 1/3 cup olive oil, kale, pistachios, and parmesan until finely chopped. Add the sage and season to taste with salt and crushed red pepper flakes, pulse to combine.', '3. Make the soup. Heat the olive oil in a large pot over medium heat. When the oil shimmers, add the shallots and cook until soft, about 5 minutes. Add the thyme and butter, cook another 30 seconds. Pour in the broth. Add the sweet potatoes, cayenne, nutmeg, and a pinch each of salt and pepper. Bring the soup to a boil over medium-high heat and then reduce the heat to medium-low. Cover and simmer for 15 to 20 minutes, until the potatoes are fork-tender.', '4. Using an immersion blender, blend the soup directly in the pot until smooth. Stir in the coconut milk and 2 tablespoons sage pesto, cook another 5 minutes. If the soup is thick, thin with addition broth.', '5. To serve, ladle the soup into bowls. Swirl each bowl of soup with pesto. Break the burrata and spoon some over top the soup. Enjoy!']

title: Stuffed Spaghetti Squash 4 Cheese Pesto Lasagna

ingredients with measurement: {'medium spaghetti squash, halved and seeds removed': '2', 'whole milk or heavy cream': '1', 'basil pesto, homemade or store-bought': '1/3', 'dried oregano': '1', 'frozen chopped spinach, thawed and squeezed dried': '8', 'whole milk ricotta cheese': '1/2', 'shredded fontina cheese': '1 1/2', 'shredded provolone cheese': '1', 'crushed red pepper flakes': '1', 'kosher salt and pepper': 'seasoning', 'fresh oregano, for serving': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 425 degrees F.', '2. Place the squash on a plate and microwave 3 minutes. Let cool slightly, then cut in half lengthwise, scoop out the seeds and discard.', '3. Meanwhile, in a medium bowl, mix together the milk, pesto, oregano, spinach, and ricotta cheese. Season with red pepper flakes, salt and pepper. title: Cheddar Apple Butternut Squash Soup with Cinnamon Pecan Crumble

Remove from the heat and add the cilantro.', '4. To serve, divide the rice among bowls and ladle the soup overtop. Garnish with cilantro. Serve with Naan on the side. Enjoy!']

title: Sweet Potato Gnocchi with Herbed White Wine Pan Sauce
ingredients: ['medium sweet potatoes', 'whole milk ricotta', 'large egg', 'all-purpose flour', 'kosher salt', 'salted butter', 'shallot, chopped', 'fresh thyme leaves, homegrown Burpee Tasty Thyme', 'chopped fresh rosemary, homegrown Burpee Rockin’ Rosemary', 'dry white wine, such as Pinot Grigio or Sauvignon Blanc', 'cayenne pepper', 'kosher salt and pepper', 'shaved manchego or parmesan cheese']
ingredients with measurement: {'medium sweet potatoes': '2', 'whole milk ricotta': '1/2', 'large egg': '1', 'all-purpose flour': '2-3', 'kosher salt': '1', 'salted butter': '6', 'shallot, chopped': '1', 'fresh thyme leaves, homegrown Burpee Tasty Thyme': '2', 'chopped fresh rosemary, homegrown Burpee Rockin’ Rosemary': '2', 'dry white wine, such as Pinot Grigio or Sauvignon Blanc': '1/2', 'cayenne pepper': '1', 'kosher salt and pepper': 'seasoning', 'shaved manchego or parmesan cheese': '1/2'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat your oven to 400 degrees F.', '2. Poke a few holes in the sweet potatoes and bake for 45 minutes or until soft and tender. When the sweet potatoes are cooked, slice them in half, allow to cool, and finely mash or puree them.', '3. In a large bowl, mix together the sweet potatoes, ricotta, egg, salt, and flour. Stir the mixture until just combined. If the dough seems wet, add a tablespoon of flour at a time, until it can be formed into a ball. The dough should be sticky.', '4. Generously flour a clean counter and scrape the dough out onto it. Cut the dough into four equal pieces. Working with one piece of dough at a time, roll the dough into a rope about 1 inch thick and cut into bite size pieces. Repeat this process with the other pieces of dough and place the gnocchi on a baking sheet that has been dusted with flour. At this point, the gnocchi can be kept covered in the fridge for up to 1 day, and then boiled just before you are ready to eat. Or boiled right away.', '5. To make the sauce. Heat the butter and shallot in a large skillet over medium-high heat and cook until the shallot is fragrant and the butter begins to brown, about 3-5 minutes. Stir in the thyme and rosemary and cook 1 minute. Add the wine and cayenne, and season with salt and pepper. Simmer the sauce for 3-5 minutes. Keep warm over low heat.', '6. Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Boil the gnocchi until they float to the top and are cooked through, about 3-4 minutes. Remove the gnocchi using a slotted spoon or spider strainer and drop right into the sauce, gently tossing to combine. If the sauce thickens up, add a splash of the gnocchi cooking water to thin it a bit.', '7. Divide the gnocchi among bowls. Top with manchego. EAT!']

title: Homemade Broccoli Cheddar Cobbler
ingredients: ['extra virgin olive oil', 'butter', 'yellow onion, diced', 'carrot, diced', 'all-purpose flour', 'low sodium veggie or chicken broth', 'broccoli florets, roughly chopped', 'bay leaves', 'freshly grated nutmeg', 'cayenne, more or less to taste', 'kosher salt and pepper', 'whole milk', 'shredded sharp cheddar cheese', 'fresh thyme leaves, plus more for serving', 'all purpose flour', 'baking powder', 'black pepper', 'grated parmesan cheese', 'cold butter, grated on a box grater just like cheese', 'cold buttermilk']
ingredients with measurement: {'extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'butter': '3', 'yellow onion, diced': '1', 'carrot, diced': '1', 'all-purpose flour': '1/3', 'low sodium veggie or chicken broth': '3', 'broccoli florets, roughly chopped': '4', 'bay leaves': '2', 'freshly grated nutmeg': '1/4', 'cayenne, more or less to taste': '1/4', 'kosher salt and pepper': 'seasoning', 'whole milk': '2', 'shredded sharp cheddar cheese': '2', 'fresh thyme leaves, plus more for serving': '2', 'all purpose flour': '2', 'baking powder': '2', 'black pepper': '1/2', 'grated parmesan cheese': '1/2', 'cold butter, grated on a box grater just like cheese': '1', 'cold buttermilk': '1/2'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F.', '2. Heat the olive oil and butter in a large pot over medium heat. When the oil shimmers, add the onion and carrot and cook until fragrant, about 10 minutes. Whisk in the flour and cook until golden, about 1 minute, then gradually whisk in the broth until smooth. Add the broccoli, bay leaves, nutmeg, cayenne, and a large pinch each of salt and pepper. Bring to a simmer, reduce the heat to medium and cook, uncovered, until the broccoli is tender, about 10 minutes.', '3. Remove the bay leaves and discard. Stir in the milk and cheese until melted and creamy. Add the thyme and cook another 10 minutes or until the mixture has thickened. Remove from the heat and transfer the mix to a medium size casserole dish.', '4. Make the biscuits.\xa0In a mixing bowl, combine the flour, baking powder, parmesan, and pepper. Add the butter and toss with the flour. Add the buttermilk, and mix until just combined, adding more buttermilk if needed.', 'In a mixing bowl, combine the flour, baking powder, parmesan, and pepper. Add the butter and toss with the flour. Add the buttermilk, and mix until just combined, adding more buttermilk if needed.', '5. Roll the dough out into a 1 inch thick rectangle and cut into 6 biscuits. Place the biscuits on top of the broccoli casserole. Brush each with buttermilk. Transfer to the oven and bake until the broccoli is bubbling and the biscuits are golden brown, 25-30 minutes. Top with fresh thyme and enjoy!']

title: Healthy Slow Cooker Turkey and White Bean Chili
ingredients: ['extra virgin olive oil', 'yellow onions, chopped', 'garlic, minced or grated', 'ground turkey or chicken', 'red peppers, seeded and chopped', 'chipotle peppers in adobo, finely chopped', 'chili powder', 'smoked paprika', 'ground cumin', 'ground cinnamon', 'salt', 'low sodium chicken broth', 'crushed tomatoes', 'tomato paste', 'apple butter', 'bay leaves', 'white beans, drained', 'cheddar cheese, avocado, green onions, and cilantro for serving']
ingredients with measurement: {'extra virgin olive oil': '1', 'yellow onions, chopped': '2', 'garlic, minced or grated': '4', 'ground turkey or chicken': '2', 'red peppers, seeded and chopped': '2', 'chipotle peppers in adobo, finely chopped': '2', 'chili powder': '2', 'smoked paprika': '1', 'ground cumin': '2', 'ground cinnamon': '1', 'salt': '1 1/2', 'low sodium chicken broth': '2-3', 'crushed tomatoes': '1', 'tomato paste': '1/4', 'apple butter': '1', 'bay leaves': '2', 'white beans, drained': '1', 'cheddar cheese, avocado, green onions, and cilantro for serving': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. Heat the olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat. When the oil shimmers, add the onion and cook about 5 minutes or until it begins to caramelize around the edges. Stir in the garlic and cook another minute. Add the turkey and brown all over, breaking up the meat as you go, about 5 minutes. Remove the skillet from the heat.', '2. Transfer the turkey to the bowl of your slow cooker. Add in the red bell peppers, chipotle peppers, chili powder, smoked paprika, cumin, cinnamon, and salt. Stir in 2 cups chicken broth, the tomatoes, tomato paste, apple butter, and bay leaves, stir to combine. Cover and cook on low for 6-8 hours or high for 4-5 hours. During the last hour of cooking, stir in the beans. If your chili is too thick, add the remaining broth to thin as desired.', '3. Remove the bay leaves and ladle the chili into bowls. Top with cheddar cheese, avocado, and green onions. Eat!']

title: Thyme Roasted Chicken with Grapes and Burrata
ingredients: ['boneless, skinless chicken breasts or thighs (skin on or off, I prefer skin off)', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'fresh chopped thyme, plus more for serving', 'cayenne pepper', 'kosher salt and pepper', 'all-purpose flour', 'thick cut bacon, cut into quarters', 'shallots, thinly sliced', 'balsamic vinegar', 'apple cider vinegar', 'red grapes', 'honey', 'burrata cheese or fresh mozzarella', 'flaky sea salt']
ingredients with measurement: {'boneless, skinless chicken breasts or thighs (skin on or off, I prefer skin off)': '1 1/2', 'extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'fresh chopped thyme, plus more for serving': '2', 'cayenne pepper': '1/2', 'kosher salt and pepper': 'seasoning', 'all-purpose flour': '1/4', 'thick cut bacon, cut into quarters': '4', 'shallots, thinly sliced': '2', 'balsamic vinegar': '1/2', 'apple cider vinegar': '1/2', 'red grapes': '2', 'honey': '1', 'burrata cheese or fresh mozzarella': '2', 'flaky sea salt': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 425 degrees', '2. Rub the chicken all over with 1 tablespoon olive oil, thyme, cayenne, and season generously with salt and pepper. Sprinkle the flour evenly over the chicken and toss to coat, adding more flour if needed.', '3. Heat a large skillet over medium high heat and cook the bacon until crisp. Remove the bacon from the pan and drain onto paper towels.', '4. Add the chicken to the pan and sear on both sides until golden, about 5 minutes per side. Remove the chicken from the pan.', '5. Add the remaining 1 tablespoon olive oil. When the oil shimmers, add the shallots and cook until fragrant, about 3 minutes.\xa0Reduce the heat to medium low and pour in 1/2 cup water, the balsamic vinegar and apple cider vinegar.\xa0Slide the chicken back into the pan.', 'Reduce the heat to medium low and pour in 1/2 cup water, the balsamic vinegar and apple cider vinegar.', 'Slide the chicken back into the pan.', '6.\xa0Transfer to the oven and roast for 15 minutes. Remove from the oven, add the grapes and drizzle the grapes with honey. Return to the oven for another 10-15 minutes or until the chicken is cooked through.', '6.', 'Transfer to the oven and roast for 15 minutes. Remove from the oven, add the grapes and drizzle the grapes with honey. Return to the oven for another 10-15 minutes or until the chicken is cooked through.', '7. Add the bacon back to the skillet. Break the burrata over the chicken. Let the chicken rest 5 minutes and serve with the sauce drizzled over the chicken with the burrata and roasted grapes. Enjoy!']

title: Homemade Chicken Noodle Casserole
ingredients: ['extra virgin olive oil', 'yellow onion, chopped', 'kosher salt and pepper', 'salted butter', 'garlic, chopped', 'carrots, chopped', 'fresh thyme leaves', 'cayenne pepper', 'all purpose flour', 'low sodium chicken broth', 'whole milk', 'fresh parsley, roughly chopped', 'eggs, beaten', 'cubed whole grain bread', 'uncooked egg noodles', 'cooked shredded or cubed chicken', 'crushed Kettle Brand potato chips']

title: One Pan Zucchini and 3 Cheese Lasagna
ingredients: ['extra virgin olive oil', 'ground spicy Italian sausage', 'small sweet onion, diced', 'medium heirloom tomatoes (or regular), roughly chopped', 'cherry tomatoes', 'fresh thyme leaves', 'fresh chopped oregano', 'kosher salt and pepper', 'red wine', 'fresh basil, roughly chopped, plus more for serving', 'no boil lasagna noodles', 'medium zucchini, sliced into 1/8 inch slices', 'whole milk ricotta cheese', 'fresh mozzarella cheese, torn', 'grated parmesan cheese']
ingredients with measurement: {'extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'ground spicy Italian sausage': '1', 'small sweet onion, diced': '1', 'medium heirloom tomatoes (or regular), roughly chopped': '4', 'cherry tomatoes': '2', 'fresh thyme leaves': '2', 'fresh chopped oregano': '1', 'kosher salt and pepper': 'seasoning', 'red wine': '1/2', 'fresh basil, roughly chopped, plus more for serving': '1/4', 'no boil lasagna noodles': '6-8', 'medium zucchini, sliced into 1/8 inch slices': '3', 'whole milk ricotta cheese': '1', 'fresh mozzarella cheese, torn': '1', 'grated parmesan cheese': '1/2'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 425 degrees F.', '2. Heat a large, oven safe skillet over medium high heat. Add the sausage and onion and cook until the sausage is browned all over, about 8 minutes. Stir in the tomatoes and any juices left on the cutting board. Add the cherry tomatoes, thyme, and oregano, season generously with salt and pepper. Pour in the wine and 1 1/2 cups water. Cover and simmer 10 minutes or until the tomatoes are soft and have released their juices. Remove from the heat and stir in the basil.', '3. Break the lasagna noodles in half and press half of them into the tomato sauce. Dollop on the ricotta cheese, then add half the zucchini in an even layer, pressing it into the sauce and submerging it. Add the remaining noodles, submerging them into the sauce. Add half the mozzarella and then arrange the remaining zucchini on top in an even layer. Season with salt and pepper. Top with mozzarella and parmesan.', '4. Transfer to the oven and bake for 25-30 minutes or until the cheese is golden and the sauce has thickened slightly. Serve warm topped with fresh basil.']

title: Skillet Balsamic Peach Pork Chops with Feta and Basil
ingredients: ['bone-in pork chops', 'Kosher salt and black pepper', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'balsamic vinegar', 'honey', 'chopped fresh oregano or thyme leaves', 'peaches, sliced', 'feta cheese, cubed or crumbled', 'fresh basil', 'crushed red pepper flakes']

title: Greek Orzo Stuffed Red Peppers with Lemony Basil Tomatoes

title: Garlic Butter Creamed Corn Chicken

title: Buttery Mushroom and Clam Pasta
ingredients: ['bucatini or other long cut pasta', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'mixed wild mushrooms', 'kosher salt and pepper', 'yellow corn, kernels removed', 'butter', 'garlic, smashed', 'fresh thyme leaves', 'fresh chopped oregano', 'dry white wine', 'balsamic vinegar', 'little neck clams, rinsed and scrubbed', 'manchego cheese, grated', 'parsley, roughly chopped', 'crushed red pepper, to taste']
ingredients with measurement: {'bucatini or other long cut pasta': '3/4', 'extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'mixed wild mushrooms': '1', 'kosher salt and pepper': 'seasoning', 'yellow corn, kernels removed': '1', 'butter': '4', 'garlic, smashed': '2', 'fresh thyme leaves': '2', 'fresh chopped oregano': '1', 'dry white wine': '3/4', 'balsamic vinegar': '2', 'little neck clams, rinsed and scrubbed': '12', 'manchego cheese, grated': '1/4', 'parsley, roughly chopped': '1/3', 'crushed red pepper, to taste': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1.\tBring a large pot of salted water to a boil and cook pasta according to package directions until al dente. Just before draining, reserve 3/4 cup of the pasta cooking water. Drain.', '2. Meanwhile, heat the olive oil in a large skillet over high heat. When the oil shimmers, add the mushrooms and season lightly with salt and pepper. Cook undisturbed for 5 minutes or until golden, stir and continue cooking until the mushrooms have caramelized, 3-5 minutes. Reduce the heat to medium. Add the butter, corn, garlic, thyme, and oregano. Cook, stirring occasionally until the garlic is caramelized and fragrant, about 5 minutes.', '3. Add the reserved pasta cooking water, the wine and the balsamic vinegar. Stir in the clams. Bring the mixture to a simmer over medium heat. Cover the pot with a lid and cook until all the clams have opened, about 5 to 8 minutes. Discard any unopened clams. Stir the pasta and manchego cheese. Remove from the heat and stir in the parsley, discard the garlic cloves.', '4. Divide among bowls and top with fresh herbs and crushed red pepper. Enjoy!']

Roast both the chicken and potatoes for 25-30 minutes, tossing halfway through cooking until the chicken is cooked throughout and the potatoes tender.', '4. In a medium bowl, stir together the avocados, remaining lime juice and a pinch of salt.', '5. In a large salad bowl, toss together the lettuce, mango, feta, fries, and chicken. Dollop the avocado over the salad. Drizzle with vinaigrette (recipe follows).', '1. Add all ingredients to a blender and blend until combined. Taste and adjust seasonings as needed. The vinaigrette can be made a few days in advance and kept in the fridge.']

title: Greek Lamb Meatballs with Avocado Goddess Sauce

title: Cacio e Pepe with Arugula and Lemon
ingredients: ['bucatini pasta', 'salted butter', 'freshly cracked black pepper', 'freshly grated parmesan cheese', 'fresh grated pecorino cheese', 'couple handfuls baby arugula', 'fresh basil and lemon zest, for serving']
ingredients with measurement: {'bucatini pasta': '1', 'salted butter': '4', 'freshly cracked black pepper': '1 1/2', 'freshly grated parmesan cheese': '1', 'fresh grated pecorino cheese': '1/2', 'couple handfuls baby arugula': 'seasoning', 'fresh basil and lemon zest, for serving': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1.\tBring a large pot of salted water to a boil and cook pasta according to package directions until al dente. Just before draining, reserve 3/4 cup of the pasta cooking water. Drain.', '2.\tMelt 2 tablespoons butter in a large skillet over medium heat. Add the pepper and cook 30 second to 1 minute, until toasted.', '3.\tAdd the reserved pasta water and bring to a simmer over medium heat. Add the pasta and remaining butter. Reduce the heat to low and add the parmesan and pecorino, tossing until melted. Remove from the heat, add the arugula, toss until the greens are wilted and the sauce coats the pasta, adding in more pasta water if needed to thin the sauce. Transfer to a bowl and serve topped with fresh basil and lemon zest. Enjoy!']

ingredients with measurement: {'dried oregano': '2', 'raw sesame seeds': '1', 'fresh grated lemon zest': '1', 'ground cumin': '1', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'homemade or store-bought pizza dough, at room temperature': '1/2', 'extra virgin olive oil, for drizzling': 'seasoning', 'basil pesto': '1/3', 'medium potato, very thinly sliced': '1', 'burrata cheese': '8', 'fresh lemon micro basil or basil leaves': '1/2', 'crushed red pepper flakes': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 450 degrees F. Grease a large baking sheet with olive oil.', '2. In a small bowl, combine the oregano, sesame seeds, lemon zest, cumin, an a generous pinch of both salt and pepper.', "3. On a lightly floured surface, push/roll the dough out until it is pretty thin (about a 10-12 inch circle). Transfer the dough to the prepared baking sheet. Rub the dough with olive oil and sprinkle with the seed mix, using as little or as much as you'd like. Dollop the dough with pesto and layer on the sliced potatoes, drizzling them lightly with olive oil, salt and pepper.", '4. Transfer the pizza to the oven and bake for 10-15 minutes or until the crust is golden and the potatoes are crisp. Remove from the oven and top with burrata. Allow the burrata to sit on the pizza and warm through, about 5 minutes. Sprinkle on the basil, and crushed red pepper flakes. Slice and enjoy!']

title: Meal Prep Tropical Jerk Chicken and Gingered Broccoli

On the opposite side, toss the broccoli and edamame with the remaining 1 tablespoon ginger, and 1 tablespoon sesame oil. Meanwhile, transfer the remaining\xa0teriyaki sauce to small sauce pan and bring to a boil over high heat. Simmer 3-5 minutes or until the sauce thickens slightly.', '5.\xa0Divide the rice among 4-6 storage containers and arrange the chicken, and veggies on top. Drizzle the chicken with the\xa0teriyaki sauce.\xa0Alternately, you can store the rice, chicken, and veggies in separate containers and assemble when ready. Food will keep in the fridge for up to 1 week.', 'Divide the rice among 4-6 storage containers and arrange the chicken, and veggies on top. Drizzle the chicken with the', 'teriyaki sauce.', 'Alternately, you can store the rice, chicken, and veggies in separate containers and assemble when ready. Food will keep in the fridge for up to 1 week.', '7. Before serving, warm each bowl, if desired, and top with pineapple salsa and fresh lemon or lime juice.']

title: Crockpot Tuscan White Bean and Lemon Soup
ingredients: ['low-sodium chicken or veggie stock', 'uncooked quinoa', 'small sweet onion, chopped', 'carrots, chopped', 'basil pesto', 'crushed red pepper flakes', 'sage leaves', 'kosher salt and pepper', 'parmesan rind', 'lemons juice + 1 tablespoon lemon zest', 'roughly torn Tuscan kale', 'cans cannelloni beans, drained', 'grated parmesan, for serving']

instructions: ['1. In the bowl of your crockpot, combine the chicken stock, quinoa, onion, carrots, pesto, red pepper flakes, sage, and a pinch each of salt and pepper. Add the parmesan rind. title: One Skillet Lemon Butter Chicken and Orzo
ingredients: ['extra virgin olive oil', 'chicken breasts or small thighs', 'kosher salt and pepper', 'Meyer or regular lemon, sliced', 'butter', 'garlic, minced or grated', 'orzo pasta', 'white wine', 'low sodium chicken broth', 'kale, roughly torn', 'juice of 1 lemon', 'chopped fresh dill']
ingredients with measurement: {'extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'chicken breasts or small thighs': '1', 'kosher salt and pepper': 'seasoning', 'Meyer or regular lemon, sliced': '1', 'butter': '2', 'garlic, minced or grated': '1', 'orzo pasta': '1', 'white wine': '1/3', 'low sodium chicken broth': '2 1/2', 'kale, roughly torn': '1/2', 'juice of 1 lemon': 'seasoning', 'chopped fresh dill': '1'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F.', '2. Heat the olive oil in a large dutch oven or cast iron skillet set over medium high heat. Season the chicken all over with salt and pepper. When the oil is shimmering, add the chicken and sear on both sides until golden, about 3-5 minutes per side. Remove the chicken from the skillet.', '3.\xa0To the same skillet, add the butter and lemon slices. Sear the lemon until golden on each side, about 1 minute. Remove the lemon from the pan and add to the plate with the chicken.', '4. To the same skillet, add the garlic and orzo. Cook until the garlic is fragrant and the orzo toasted, about 2-3 minutes. Add the wine to the skillet and de-glaze the pan. Add the chicken broth, kale, and lemon juice. Bring to a boil over high heat and stir. Slide the chicken, lemon slices, and any juices left on the pan back into the skillet.\xa0Transfer to the oven and roast, uncovered for 15 minutes or until the chicken is cooked through.', '4. Serve the chicken topped with fresh dill and lemon zest. EAT!']

title: Easiest Tomato Basil Penne with Spicy Italian Chickpeas
ingredients: ['chickpeas, drained and rinsed', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'smoked paprika', 'crushed red pepper flakes', 'fennel seeds', 'mustard seeds', 'onion powder', 'kosher salt and pepper', 'san marzano tomatoes', 'basil pesto, homemade or store bought', 'penne', 'burrata cheese, torn', 'basil, for serving']

instructions: ['1. Heat a large pot over medium high heat, add the chickpeas, olive oil, paprika, crushed red pepper flakes, fennel, mustard seeds, onion powder, and a pinch of salt. To the same pot, add the tomatoes - crushing them by hand as you add them, add the pesto, and a large pinch each of salt and pepper. Cook the pasta according\xa0to packages directions until al dente. Drain and then toss the pasta in the red sauce.', '4. Divide the pasta among bowls. Top with chickpeas and burrata. Garnish with basil.']

title: Roasted Greek Chicken and Farro Salad with Fries.

title: Quick Cleansing Kale and Mushroom Pho.
ingredients: ['extra virgin olive oil', 'shiitake mushrooms, sliced', 'onion, quartered', 'garlic, smashed', 'ginger, sliced in half', 'star anise', 'cinnamon sticks', 'whole cloves', 'beef bone broth', 'fish sauce', 'chili paste', 'bunch Tuscan kale, roughly torn', 'kosher salt and pepper', 'rice noodles', 'sirloin steak or London broil, sliced thinly', 'bean sprouts, mint, basil, chile peppers, green onions, carrots, and limes, for serving']
ingredients with measurement: {'extra virgin olive oil': '1', 'shiitake mushrooms, sliced': '4', 'onion, quartered': '1', 'garlic, smashed': '4', 'ginger, sliced in half': '1', 'star anise': '2', 'cinnamon sticks': '2', 'whole cloves': '5', 'beef bone broth': '8', 'fish sauce': '1', 'chili paste': '1', 'bunch Tuscan kale, roughly torn': '1', 'kosher salt and pepper': 'seasoning', 'rice noodles': '4-8', 'sirloin steak or London broil, sliced thinly': '1/2', 'bean sprouts, mint, basil, chile peppers, green onions, carrots, and limes, for serving': 'seasoning'}

title: French Onion Potato Soup
ingredients: ['butter', 'sweet onions, thinly sliced', 'garlic, minced or grated', 'brown sugar', 'all-purpose flour', 'red wine', 'low sodium beef broth', 'Worcestershire sauce', 'bay leaves', 'fresh thyme sprigs, plus more for serving', 'of black pepper', 'mini baby potatoes, halved if large', 'french bread', 'shredded Gruyere cheese']
ingredients with measurement: {'butter': '6', 'sweet onions, thinly sliced': '4', 'garlic, minced or grated': '2', 'brown sugar': '1', 'all-purpose flour': '3', 'red wine': '1 1/2', 'low sodium beef broth': '2', 'Worcestershire sauce': '1', 'bay leaves': '2', 'fresh thyme sprigs, plus more for serving': '3-4', 'of black pepper': 'seasoning', 'mini baby potatoes, halved if large': '1', 'french bread': '6', 'shredded Gruyere cheese': '1 1/2'}
instructions: ['1. Melt the butter in a large soup pot over medium-high heat. Add the onions, garlic and brown sugar and cook about 10 minutes, stirring frequently, until softened. Continue cooking, stirring often, until the onions are deep golden in color and caramelized, 15 minutes. During the last 5 minutes of cooking, stir in the potatoes.', '1. Melt the butter in a large soup pot over medium-high heat. Add the onions, garlic and brown sugar and cook about 10 minutes, stirring frequently, until softened. Continue cooking, stirring often, until the onions are deep golden in color and caramelized, 15 minutes. During the last 5 minutes of cooking, stir in the potatoes.', '2. Reduce the heat to low and sprinkle the flour over the onions and potatoes, stirring for 3-5 minutes, until the raw flour taste is eliminated. Add the wine, beef broth, Worcestershire sauce, bay leaves, and thyme. Increase the heat to medium-high and return the soup to a simmer, simmer for 20 minutes or until the potatoes are fork tender. Remove the thyme sprigs and bay leaves from the soup. Season, to taste with salt and pepper.', '4. Preheat the broiler to high.', '5. Ladle the soup into oven safe bowls. Add a slice of bread to each and top evenly with cheese. Place each soup bowl on a baking sheet and transfer to the oven, broil until bubbly and golden brown, 3 to 5 minutes. Eat!']

title: Homemade Cheddar Pierogies
ingredients: ['all-purpose flour', 'kosher salt', 'butter, melted', 'plain full fat greek yogurt', 'egg', 'russet potatoes, peeled and quartered', 'shredded sharp cheddar cheese, plus more for topping', 'butter, at room temperature', 'onion powder', 'kosher salt and pepper', 'stick butter', 'garlic, minced or grated', 'chopped fresh rosemary']
ingredients with measurement: {'all-purpose flour': '2', 'kosher salt': '1', 'butter, melted': '2', 'plain full fat greek yogurt': '1', 'egg': '1', 'russet potatoes, peeled and quartered': '4', 'shredded sharp cheddar cheese, plus more for topping': '2', 'butter, at room temperature': '2', 'onion powder': '1/2', 'kosher salt and pepper': 'seasoning', 'stick butter': '1', 'garlic, minced or grated': '1-2', 'chopped fresh rosemary': '1'}
instructions: ['1. To make the dough. In a medium bowl, combine the flour, salt, butter, yogurt, and egg, and mix until combined. Knead the dough for 2-3 minutes. Cover and let sit 30 minutes.', '2. To make the filling.\xa0In a large pot of cold water, bring the potatoes to a boil. Salt the water and cook until the potatoes are tender, about 20 to 30 minutes.', 'In a large pot of cold water, bring the potatoes to a boil. Salt the water and cook until the potatoes are tender, about 20 to 30 minutes.', '3. Drain the potatoes, return the potatoes to the pot and mash over low heat, or mash in the bowl of a stand mixer fitted with the paddle attachment, adding the butter and cheddar cheese. Season to taste with salt and pepper.', '4. Roll the dough out onto a floured surface to 1/8 inch thickness. Using a biscuit cutter, cut out 3-inch circles.\xa0Spoon 2 teaspoons of filling into the center of each round. Brush the edges with water and fold half of the dough over the filling to enclose it. Press down the edges to seal, pressing out all the air. Be sure to keep the dough covered as you work work to prevent from drying out. At this point, the\xa0Pierogies can be flash frozen on a baking sheet for 30 minutes, then transferred to a freezer bag and frozen for up to 3 months.', '5. When ready too cook, bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Boil the Pierogies in batches for 1-2 minutes, or until they float. Drain.', '6. To make the butter sauce. In a large skillet, brown the butter over medium heat, stirring often until the butter is golden and toasted. Add the rosemary and garlic and cook 30 seconds to a minute or until fragrant. Remove from the heat. Season\xa0with salt and pepper.', '6. To make the butter sauce. In a large skillet, brown the butter over medium heat, stirring often until the butter is golden and toasted. Add the rosemary and garlic and cook 30 seconds to a minute or until fragrant. Remove from the heat.', 'with salt and pepper.', '7. Divide the Pierogies among plates and spoon the butter over the Pierogies. Top with cheddar and parsley. EAT!']

title: Easy Coq au Riesling
ingredients: ['skin on, bone in chicken breasts', 'kosher salt and pepper', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'butter', 'sweet onion, diced', 'garlic, minced or grated', 'carrots, chopped', 'mixed mushrooms, halved', 'white wine', 'heavy cream', "Sir Kensington's Dijon Mustard", 'grated parmesan cheese', 'fresh thyme']
ingredients with measurement: {'skin on, bone in chicken breasts': '2', 'kosher salt and pepper': 'seasoning', 'extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'butter': '2', 'sweet onion, diced': '1', 'garlic, minced or grated': '3', 'carrots, chopped': '2', 'mixed mushrooms, halved': '1', 'white wine': '2', 'heavy cream': '1', "Sir Kensington's Dijon Mustard": '2', 'grated parmesan cheese': '1/2', 'fresh thyme': '4'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F. Season the chicken with salt and pepper.', '2. Heat the olive oil in a large dutch oven or cast iron skillet set over medium high heat. When the oil begins to shimmer, add the chicken and sear on both sides until golden, about 3-5 minutes per side. Remove the chicken from the skillet. To the skillet, add the butter, onions, garlic, carrots, and mushrooms. Cook, stirring occasionally until the onions have caramelized, about 5-10 minutes.', '3. Add the wine, cream, mustard, and parmesan. Season with salt and pepper. Bring to a boil over high heat and then reduce to low. Slide the chicken back into the skillet, skin side up, it should be mostly submerged. Add the thyme and transfer to the oven and roast for 25-30 minutes or until the chicken is cooked through. Serve the chicken topped with fresh thyme.']

title: The Cheese-Maker’s Mac and Cheese
ingredients: ['unsalted butter', 'all-purpose flour', '2% or whole milk', 'elbow macaroni', 'garlic clove, minced or grated', 'crushed Ritz Crackers', 'cream cheese, cut into cubes', 'shredded sharp white cheddar cheese', 'shredded fontina cheese', 'shredded Havarti cheese', 'shredded smoked Gouda cheese', 'cayenne', 'Kosher salt and freshly ground pepper', 'Fresh basil leaves, for topping']
ingredients with measurement: {'unsalted butter': '7', 'all-purpose flour': '¼', '2% or whole milk': '3', 'elbow macaroni': '1', 'garlic clove, minced or grated': '1', 'crushed Ritz Crackers': '1½', 'cream cheese, cut into cubes': '4', 'shredded sharp white cheddar cheese': '1¼', 'shredded fontina cheese': '1¼', 'shredded Havarti cheese': '1', 'shredded smoked Gouda cheese': '1', 'cayenne': '¼', 'Kosher salt and freshly ground pepper': 'seasoning', 'Fresh basil leaves, for topping': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1.\tPreheat the oven to 350°F. Spray a 9 x 13-inch baking dish with cooking spray.', '2.\tIn a large saucepan, melt 4 tablespoons of the butter over medium heat. Whisk in the flour. Reduce the heat to medium-low and cook for 1 minute, stirring once to avoid burning—it will bubble. Gradually whisk in the milk and 2 cups of water, then stir in the macaroni. Increase the heat to medium-high and bring the mixture to a boil. Stir frequently until the macaroni is just al dente, 8 to 10 minutes.', '3.\tMeanwhile, in a medium skillet, melt the remaining 3 tablespoons of butter over medium-low heat. Add the garlic and cook for 30 seconds, or until fragrant. Add the crushed crackers and toss to coat. Toast the crumbs until browned, stirring frequently to avoid burning, for 3 to 5 minutes. Remove the pan from the heat and set aside.', '4.\tWhen the macaroni is al dente, remove the pan from the heat and stir in the cream cheese, cheddar, fontina, Havarti, Gouda, and cayenne and season with salt and pepper. Stir until the cheeses have fully melted. Transfer the mixture to the prepared baking dish.', '5.\tEvenly sprinkle the toasted cracker crumbs over the mac and cheese and place the baking dish on a baking sheet. Bake for 15 to 20 minutes, or until the crumbs are golden brown and the sauce is bubbling. Remove from the oven and let sit for 5 minutes (yeah, right). Garnish with fresh basil. Dig in!']

title: Sweet and Sticky Vegetable Stir Fry
ingredients: ['low sodium soy sauce', 'rice wine vinegar', 'honey', 'sesame oil', 'boneless, skinless chicken breasts, cubed', 'baby bok choy, roughly chopped', 'bell pepper, thinly sliced', 'fresh ginger, thinly sliced', 'garlic, thinly sliced', 'red chile, sliced and seeded', 'green onions, thinly sliced', 'cooked rice or egg noodles', 'fresh basil, roughly chopped', 'seeds (arils) from 1 pomegranate']

title: 6 Ingredient Creamy Roasted Tomato Soup
ingredients: ['heirloom tomatoes, quartered', 'small sweet onion, quartered', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'fresh thyme leaves', 'kosher salt and pepper', 'canned coconut milk, nut/seed milk, or whole milk, plus more to thin as needed', 'basil pesto, homemade or store-bought', 'parmesan, for serving (optional)']
ingredients with measurement: {'heirloom tomatoes, quartered': '6-8', 'small sweet onion, quartered': '1', 'extra virgin olive oil': '3', 'fresh thyme leaves': '2', 'kosher salt and pepper': 'seasoning', 'canned coconut milk, nut/seed milk, or whole milk, plus more to thin as needed': '1', 'basil pesto, homemade or store-bought': '1/3', 'parmesan, for serving (optional)': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 425 degrees F.', '2. In a large oven safe pot, combine the tomatoes, onion, olive oil, thyme, and a pinch each of salt and pepper. Transfer to the oven and roast for 20-30 minutes or until the tomatoes just begin to char and release their juices. Let cool slightly.', '3. Transfer the roasted tomatoes and their juices to a blender and add the milk. Puree until smooth. Return the soup to the pot and place over medium heat on the stove. Stir in the pesto and season the soup with salt and pepper. Thin with more milk if desired.', '4. To serve, ladle the soup among bowls and top with parmesan and basil. Serve with a grilled cheese on the side.']

title: Avocado Zucchini Carbonara
ingredients: ['bucatini pasta', 'avocado, halved', 'egg', 'fresh basil, plus more for serving', 'kosher salt and pepper', 'thick cut bacon, chopped', 'zucchini, cut into ribbons', 'chopped fresh thyme or oregano', 'crushed red pepper flakes, or to taste', 'grated parmesan cheese, plus more for serving']

title: Peachy Chipotle Chicken Tortilla and Avocado Rice Salad with Pan Fried Halloumi

title: Creamed Corn Pasta with Fried Herbs
ingredients: ['pasta', 'butter', 'sweet corn, kernels removed from the cob', 'kosher salt and pepper', 'chopped fresh thyme', 'garlic, minced or grated', 'crushed red pepper flakes', 'whole milk or heavy cream', 'grated parmesan cheese', 'extra virgin olive oil, for drizzling', 'fresh basil leaves', 'fresh thyme']
ingredients with measurement: {'pasta': '1', 'butter': '4', 'sweet corn, kernels removed from the cob': '3', 'kosher salt and pepper': 'seasoning', 'chopped fresh thyme': '2', 'garlic, minced or grated': '2', 'crushed red pepper flakes': '1', 'whole milk or heavy cream': '1/3-2/3', 'grated parmesan cheese': '3/4', 'extra virgin olive oil, for drizzling': 'seasoning', 'fresh basil leaves': '1/4', 'fresh thyme': '4'}
instructions: ['1. Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Cook the pasta according to package directions until al dente. Just before draining, remove 1 cup of the pasta cooking water. Drain the pasta.', '2.\xa0Add the butter to a large skillet set over medium-high heat. Add the corn and season with salt and pepper. Cook 5-8 minutes or until the corn has browned lightly and caramelized. Stir in the chopped thyme, garlic, and crushed red pepper flakes, and cook 1 minute more. Add the milk and simmer until warmed.', '3. Add the pasta, parmesan, and splash of the pasta cooking water and toss to combine. Cook for 2-3 minutes or until the pasta is warmed throughout. If needed, thin the sauce with more cream or water. Remove from the heat and stir in a handful of basil. Season with salt and pepper.', '4. Add a drizzle of olive oil to a small skillet set over medium high heat. When the oil sizzles, add the basil leaves and thyme sprigs and fry 30 seconds or until crisp. Remove the skillet from the heat.', '5. Divide the pasta among plates and top with fried herbs. Eat!']

title: Opened Faced Tomato and Goat Cheese Sandwich with Hot Bacon Vinaigrette
ingredients: ['goat cheese', 'chopped fresh dill', 'chopped fresh basil, plus more for serving', 'lemon juice', 'kosher salt and pepper', 'whole grain or sourdough bread', 'heirloom tomatoes, sliced', 'bacon, chopped', 'red wine vinegar', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'crushed red pepper flakes', 'salt and pepper']

instructions: ['1.\xa0Preheat your grill to high heat or preheat your oven to 400 degrees F.', '2. Place the bread on the grill and grill both for about 2-3 minutes per side or until lightly chard. Remove from the grill.', '4. Spread the goat cheese over the bread and top with tomatoes. Season the tomatoes lightly with salt and pepper.', '5. Heat a large skillet over medium high heat and cook the bacon until crisp. Drain off all but 1 tablespoon of bacon grease. title: 3 Cheese Zucchini "Ravioli" with Roasted Tomato Basil Sauce

Sprinkle the zucchini with salt.', 'In a medium bowl, combine the cheeses, basil, and a pinch each of salt and pepper.', 'Grab 4 zucchini "noodles" and layer them to make a star. title: Summer Tomato and Zucchini Halloumi Bake

ingredients with measurement: {'extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'ground spicy sausage': '1', 'small sweet onion, diced': '1', 'medium zucchini, thinly sliced into rounds': '2', 'medium heirloom tomatoes or regular, roughly chopped': '4-5', 'paprika': '2', 'kosher salt and pepper': 'seasoning', 'red wine': '1/2', 'fresh baby spinach': '1-2', 'fresh basil, roughly chopped': '1/4', 'halloumi cheese, sliced': '1', 'heirloom or regular cherry tomatoes': '1', 'toasted ciabatta bread, for serving': 'seasoning'}

title: Simple Coconut Mango Chicken and Broccoli Curry
ingredients: ['ghee or coconut oil', 'small sweet onion, diced', 'boneless skinless chicken breast, cubed', 'yellow curry powder', 'cayenne pepper, or to taste', 'kosher salt and pepper', 'garlic, minced or grated', 'ginger, grated', 'medium summer squash and or zucchini, sliced into rounds', 'broccoli, cut into florets', 'full fat coconut milk', 'fresh cilantro, chopped', 'mango, diced', 'juice + zest of lime', 'rice, fresh naan, and roasted cashews, for serving']

title: Arugula Peach Ricotta Pizza with Crispy Bacon.

Add the onions, honey, and season with salt and pepper. Cook, stirring, occasionally until golden and caramelized. Add the bacon and cook until crisp, about 5 minutes. Stir in the thyme and cook another minute. Remove from the heat and drain off any excess grease from the bacon.', '3.\xa0On a lightly floured surface, push/roll the dough out until it is pretty thin (about a 10-12 inch circle). Transfer the dough to the prepared baking sheet. Spread the dough with the onions and bacon and then top with fontina cheese, half the ricotta cheese, and fresh basil. Arrange the peaches over the cheese and season with salt and pepper. Dollop with the remaining ricotta.', '4. Transfer to the oven and bake for 10-15 minutes or until the crust is golden and the cheese has melted.', '5. Meanwhile, make the vinaigrette. Whisk together the remaining 1/4 cup olive oil, the balsamic vinegar, and a pinch each of salt, pepper, and crushed red pepper flakes.', '6. Remove the pizza from the oven, top with fresh arugula and drizzle with the vinaigrette. Garnish with basil and seeds. Slice and eat!']

title: Italian Tortellini Pasta Salad
ingredients: ['extra virgin olive oil', 'bell peppers, sliced', 'cherry tomatoes', 'garlic, smashed', 'fresh oregano leaves', 'Zest of 1 lemon', 'of crush red pepper flakes', 'of kosher salt', 'tortellini, cheese or spinach', 'red wine vinegar', 'fresh arugula', 'fresh basil, roughly torn', 'Dijon mustard (a grainy type is preferred)', 'provolone (cubed)', 'fresh mozzarella balls', 'salami, roughly chopped']
ingredients with measurement: {'extra virgin olive oil': '1/3', 'bell peppers, sliced': '2', 'cherry tomatoes': '1', 'garlic, smashed': '2', 'fresh oregano leaves': '1', 'Zest of 1 lemon': 'seasoning', 'of crush red pepper flakes': 'seasoning', 'of kosher salt': 'seasoning', 'tortellini, cheese or spinach': '16', 'red wine vinegar': '2', 'fresh arugula': '2', 'fresh basil, roughly torn': '1/2', 'Dijon mustard (a grainy type is preferred)': '1', 'provolone (cubed)': '1/2', 'fresh mozzarella balls': '1/2', 'salami, roughly chopped': '3-4'}
instructions: ['1. Heat a medium skillet over medium heat. Add the olive oil, bell peppers, tomatoes, garlic, oregano, lemon zest, and a pinch of both crushed red pepper and salt. Cook until the tomatoes just begin to burst and the garlic is fragrant, about 15-20 minutes. Remove from the heat and let cool slightly.', '2. Meanwhile, bring a large pot of salted water to a boil and cook the tortellini according to package directions until al dente. Drain and then add the tortellini to a large salad bowl.', '3. Pour the olive oil over the tortellini. Add the red wine vinegar and mustard and toss to combine. Add the arugula, basil, provolone, mozzarella, and salami and toss.', '4. Serve the salad warm or cold. It will keep in the fridge for up to 5 days.']

title: Grilled Thai Satay Chicken
ingredients: ['boneless chicken breast or small thighs', 'canned unsweetened coconut milk', 'low sodium soy sauce', 'honey', 'Thai red curry paste', 'quinoa or rice, for serving', 'fresh cilantro or thai basil, for serving', 'limes, mango, peanuts and chili peppers for serving', 'can unsweetened coconut milk', 'creamy peanut butter', 'fish sauce', 'low sodium soy sauce', 'Thai red curry paste', 'tamarind', 'juice of lime']
ingredients with measurement: {'boneless chicken breast or small thighs': '2', 'canned unsweetened coconut milk': '1/2', 'low sodium soy sauce': '2', 'honey': '1/4', 'Thai red curry paste': '2', 'quinoa or rice, for serving': 'seasoning', 'fresh cilantro or thai basil, for serving': 'seasoning', 'limes, mango, peanuts and chili peppers for serving': 'seasoning', 'can unsweetened coconut milk': '1', 'creamy peanut butter': '1/2', 'fish sauce': '2', 'tamarind': '2', 'juice of lime': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. Whisk together the coconut milk, soy sauce, Thai red curry paste, and honey, in a small bowl. Remove 1/4 cup of the marinade and reserve for cooking. Add the chicken to a large ziplock bag and pour the remaining marinade over the chicken. Let sit for 30 minutes or up to overnight in the fridge.', '2. Meanwhile, make the peanut sauce. In a small sauce pan, combine all the ingredients and set over medium low heat, cook stirring often until the sauce is smooth and drizzle-able. Stir in the lime juice. If the sauce seem thick, add water to thin. Keep sauce warm.', '3. Preheat an outdoor grill or grill pan to medium heat. Oil the grates.', '4. Add the chicken and grill for 5-8 minutes per side, brushing the chicken with the reserved coconut milk mixture until the chicken is cooked through. Remove from the grill and arrange on a serving plate. Drizzle the peanut sauce over the chicken.', '5. Serve the chicken over top of a bed of quinoa or rice with fresh mango, limes, and cilantro. Enjoy!']

title: Garden Fresh Herb, Olive, and Parmesan Pasta with Pistachio Breadcrumbs
ingredients: ['roughly torn ciabatta bread', 'shelled roasted pistachios', 'olive oil', 'garlic, smashed', 'crushed red pepper flakes or 2-3 chili peppers', 'fresh oregano', 'fresh thyme', 'the rind of one lemon, thinly sliced', 'kosher salt and pepper', 'pitted green olives, halved', 'bucatini pasta or other long cut pasta', 'white wine', 'fresh grated parmesan', 'fresh basil, chopped', 'fresh dill, chopped', 'sliced tomatoes or 1 cup cherry tomatoes, for serving']
ingredients with measurement: {'roughly torn ciabatta bread': '2', 'shelled roasted pistachios': '1/4', 'olive oil': '1/2', 'garlic, smashed': '4', 'crushed red pepper flakes or 2-3 chili peppers': '1-3', 'fresh oregano': '2', 'fresh thyme': '2', 'the rind of one lemon, thinly sliced': 'seasoning', 'kosher salt and pepper': 'seasoning', 'pitted green olives, halved': '1', 'bucatini pasta or other long cut pasta': '1', 'white wine': '1/4', 'fresh grated parmesan': '1', 'fresh basil, chopped': '1/4', 'fresh dill, chopped': '2', 'sliced tomatoes or 1 cup cherry tomatoes, for serving': '2'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F.', '2. On a baking sheet, combine the bread crumbs, pistachios, 2 tablespoons olive oil, and large pinch of both salt and pepper. Toss well to coat. Transfer to the oven and cook 8-10 minutes or until the breadcrumbs are golden. Remove from the oven.', '3. To a large skillet with sides, add the remaining olive oil (about 1/3 cup), the crushed red pepper flakes, garlic, oregano, thyme, lemon rind, and a pinch each of salt and pepper. Set over medium heat and cook, stirring occasionally for 10 minutes or until the garlic is caramelized and fragrant. Reduce the heat to low and then stir in the olives and cook another 5 minutes.', '4. Meanwhile, bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Add the pasta and cook according to package directions until al dente. Just before draining, remove 1 cup of the pasta cooking water. Drain.', '5. Add the hot pasta right into the skillet with oil and seasonings. Add the wine and toss to combines. Cook for 5 minutes. Remove from the heat and add the parmesan, basil, and dill, tossing to combine. If needed, thin the pasta with a little of the reserve cooking water.', '6. Divide the pasta among each plate. Top with tomatoes, breadcrumbs and fresh basil. EAT.']

ingredients: ['tomatillos, husked', 'olive oil', 'small sweet onion, chopped', 'Chopped Green Chiles', 'canned chipotle peppers in adobo, about 2-3 chiles', 'diced fire roasted tomatoes', 'Mexican beer or chicken broth', 'chopped fresh oregano', 'bay leaves', 'kosher salt', 'boneless skinless chicken tenders', 'fresh cilantro, chopped', 'corn tortillas', 'shredded pepper jack cheese', 'shredded cheddar cheese', 'fried eggs optional']
ingredients with measurement: {'tomatillos, husked': '2', 'olive oil': '2', 'small sweet onion, chopped': '1', 'Chopped Green Chiles': '2', 'canned chipotle peppers in adobo, about 2-3 chiles': '1/4', 'diced fire roasted tomatoes': '1', 'Mexican beer or chicken broth': '1', 'chopped fresh oregano': '1', 'bay leaves': '2', 'kosher salt': '3/4', 'boneless skinless chicken tenders': '1', 'fresh cilantro, chopped': '1/4', 'corn tortillas': '6', 'shredded pepper jack cheese': '1', 'shredded cheddar cheese': '1/2', 'fried eggs optional': '4'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F.', '2. Heat a large oven safe skillet over high heat. Add the tomatillos and cook, turning often until they begin to char and become soft. Remove from the skillet. Let cool and then give them a rough chop.', '3. Return the skillet to medium heat and add the olive oil and onion. Cook for 5 minutes or until the onion is fragrant. Stir the chopped tomatillos, green chiles, and chipotle chiles and cook another minute. Add the tomatoes, beer, oregano, bay leaves, and salt. Bring to a simmer over medium heat. ingredients with measurement: {'tomatillos, husked': '6', 'cans Old El Paso Chopped Green Chiles': '2', 'garlic': '2', 'chili powder': '1', 'kosher salt and pepper': 'seasoning', 'boneless skinless chicken breast': '1', 'shredded pepper jack cheese': '1', 'poblano pepper, sliced': '1', 'olive oil': '2'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the broiler to high.', '2. Place the tomatillos in a large skillet and transfer to the oven. Broil for 3-5 minutes, turning halfway through cooking until the tomatillos begin to char all over. Remove from the oven and reduce the oven temperature to 400 degrees F.', '3. Transfer the tomatillos to a blender. Add the diced green chiles, garlic, chili powder, and a pinch each of salt and pepper. Pulse until just combined and a sauce forms.', '3. Slice the chicken through the middle horizontally to within a 1/2 inch of the other side. Open the two sides and spread them out like an open book. Stuff the cheese and few poblano pepper slices inside and then close like a book over the filling. Place the chicken in the skillet. Add the remaining poblano pepper and drizzle both lightly with olive oil. Sprinkle with salt and pepper. Transfer to the oven and bake for 10 minutes. Add the tomatillo sauce and continue baking for another 10 minutes or until the chicken is cooked through. Serve with rice or tortillas. Enjoy!']

title: Baked Thai Coconut Shrimp with Lemongrass Guacamole
ingredients: ['shrimp peeled and deveined', 'Thai red curry paste', 'fish sauce', 'eggs beaten', 'flaked unsweetened coconut', 'panko bread crumbs', 'kosher salt and pepper', 'avocados, halved and pitted', 'juice of 1 lime', 'finely chopped lemongrass or lemongrass paste', 'fresh basil, chopped', 'pinch of kosher salt', 'fresno or jalapeño pepper, seeded and chopped', 'pomegranate arils', 'chopped strawberries']
ingredients with measurement: {'shrimp peeled and deveined': '1', 'Thai red curry paste': '2', 'fish sauce': '1', 'eggs beaten': '2', 'flaked unsweetened coconut': '1', 'panko bread crumbs': '3/4', 'kosher salt and pepper': 'seasoning', 'avocados, halved and pitted': '2', 'juice of 1 lime': 'seasoning', 'finely chopped lemongrass or lemongrass paste': '1', 'fresh basil, chopped': '1/4', 'pinch of kosher salt': 'seasoning', 'fresno or jalapeño pepper, seeded and chopped': '1', 'pomegranate arils': '1/2', 'chopped strawberries': '1/2'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 425 degrees F. Lightly grease a baking sheet.', '2. Combine the Thai curry paste and fish sauce in a medium bowl. Add the shrimp and toss to evenly coat.', '3. Add the eggs to another bowl. Add the coconut and panko to a another bowl, mixing them to combine.', '4. Working in an assembly line, dip the shrimp through the egg and then dredge it through the coconut crumbs, pressing gently to adhere. Place on the prepared baking sheet and repeat with the remaining shrimp. Season lightly with salt and pepper. Lightly brush the shrimp with olive oil or cooking spray. Transfer to the oven and bake 10-12 minutes or until the shrimp is lightly golden. Serve warm alongside the guacamole (below).']

title: California Chicken, Avocado and Goat Cheese Salad

title: Breakfast Tacos Al Pastor
ingredients: ['olive oil', 'ground chicken or pork', 'sweet onion, chopped', 'garlic, minced or grated', 'chili powder', 'paprika', 'kosher salt', 'chipotle peppers in adobo, chopped', "not-from-concentrate Florida's Natural® Brand Orange Juice", 'fresh pineapple chunks', 'fresh cilantro, chopped', 'fresh basil, chopped', 'jalapeño, seeded and chopped', 'juice of 1 lime', 'corn or flour tortillas, warmed', 'fried eggs', 'sliced avocado, for serving', 'feta or cheddar cheese, for serving']
ingredients with measurement: {'olive oil': '2', 'ground chicken or pork': '1', 'sweet onion, chopped': '1/2', 'garlic, minced or grated': '2', 'chili powder': '2', 'paprika': '1', 'kosher salt': '1', 'chipotle peppers in adobo, chopped': '2', "not-from-concentrate Florida's Natural® Brand Orange Juice": '1/2', 'fresh pineapple chunks': '2', 'fresh cilantro, chopped': '1/4', 'fresh basil, chopped': '1/4', 'jalapeño, seeded and chopped': '1', 'juice of 1 lime': 'seasoning', 'corn or flour tortillas, warmed': '6-8', 'fried eggs': '4-6', 'sliced avocado, for serving': 'seasoning', 'feta or cheddar cheese, for serving': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. In a large skillet, heat the olive oil over high heat. When the oil shimmers, add the ground chicken and onion. Cook, stirring often and breaking up the meat as it cooks, until the chicken is browned, about 5 minutes. Add the garlic, chili powder, paprika, salt, chipotle peppers, Florida’s Natural orange juice, 1/4 cup water, and 1 cup pineapple. Reduce the heat to medium and simmer until the sauce has thickened slightly around the chicken, about 10-15 minutes. Remove from the heat and stir in the cilantro.', '2. Meanwhile, in a bowl, combine the remaining 1 cup pineapple, the basil, jalapeño, lime juice, and a pinch of salt.', '3. To serve, divide the fried eggs among tortillas and top with the chicken. Add the pineapple-basil-salsa, avocado, and cheese. EAT!']

title: Greek Lemon Garlic Roasted Broccoli Pasta Salad
ingredients: ['heads broccoli, florets roughly chopped', 'pine nuts', 'olive oil', 'garlic, minced or grated', 'kosher salt and pepper', 'short cut pasta', 'jar oil packed sun-dried tomatoes', 'pitted kalamata olives', 'zucchini thinly, sliced', 'red bell pepper, sliced', 'Persian cucumbers, chopped', 'fresh oregano, chopped', 'fresh basil, chopped', 'chopped fresh dill', 'juice and zest of 1 lemon', 'feta cheese, cubed']
ingredients with measurement: {'heads broccoli, florets roughly chopped': '2', 'pine nuts': '1/3', 'olive oil': '2', 'garlic, minced or grated': '2-4', 'kosher salt and pepper': 'seasoning', 'short cut pasta': '1', 'jar oil packed sun-dried tomatoes': '1', 'pitted kalamata olives': '1/2', 'zucchini thinly, sliced': '1', 'red bell pepper, sliced': '1', 'Persian cucumbers, chopped': '2', 'fresh oregano, chopped': '1/4', 'fresh basil, chopped': '1/4', 'chopped fresh dill': '2', 'juice and zest of 1 lemon': 'seasoning', 'feta cheese, cubed': '8'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 425 degrees F.', '2. On a large baking sheet, toss together the broccoli, pine nuts, 2 tablespoons olive oil, garlic, and a large pinch of both salt and pepper. Transfer to the oven and roast for 20-25 minutes or until the broccoli is just beginning to char.', '3. Meanwhile, bring a large pot of salted water to a boil over high heat. Cook the pasta according to package directions until al dente. Drain and add back to the hot pot.', "4. While the pasta is still warm, add the roasted broccoli, sun-dried tomatoes - plus the oil in the jar, olives and 3 tablespoons of the olive brine (the liquid surrounding the olives), the zucchini, red pepper, cucumbers, oregano, basil, dill, lemon juice and zest. Toss until well combined and the pasta is coated in oil, if needed drizzle in little olive oil over if there doesn't seem to be enough. Add the feta and gently toss. Serve warm or at room temperature. The pasta can be made up to 1 day in advance."]

title: Farro Tabbouleh with Burrata and Hummus

title: Cauliflower Rice Carne Asada Bowls with Mango Salsa

title: Cheesy Chipotle Adobo Chicken Quesadillas

title: Springtime Chicken Soup

title: Coconut Lime Chicken Curry with Rice Noodles
ingredients: ['sweet onion, quartered', 'stalks lemongrass, roughly chopped', 'red fresno pepper, seeded', 'piece fresh ginger, peeled', 'garlic, chopped', 'Thai red or green curry paste', 'peanut or sesame oil', 'boneless chicken breasts, cut into bite size pieces', 'Almond Breeze Unsweetened Original Almondmilk Coconutmilk Blend', 'fish sauce', 'broccoli, ends trimmed', 'rice noodles', 'juice of 2 limes', 'fresh cilantro, chopped', 'fresh basil, chopped, plus more for serving', 'persian cucumbers, sliced', 'sprouts, shredded coconut, shredded carrots, for serving']
ingredients with measurement: {'sweet onion, quartered': '1/2', 'stalks lemongrass, roughly chopped': '2', 'red fresno pepper, seeded': '1', 'piece fresh ginger, peeled': '1', 'garlic, chopped': '2', 'Thai red or green curry paste': '2', 'peanut or sesame oil': '2', 'boneless chicken breasts, cut into bite size pieces': '1', 'Almond Breeze Unsweetened Original Almondmilk Coconutmilk Blend': '2-3', 'fish sauce': '2', 'broccoli, ends trimmed': '1', 'rice noodles': '8', 'juice of 2 limes': 'seasoning', 'fresh cilantro, chopped': '1/4', 'fresh basil, chopped, plus more for serving': '1/4', 'persian cucumbers, sliced': '2', 'sprouts, shredded coconut, shredded carrots, for serving': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. In a blender or food processor, combine the onion, lemongrass, fresno pepper, ginger, garlic, and curry paste and pulse until a paste forms.', '2. Heat the oil in a large pot set over medium heat. When the oil shimmers, add the curry paste mixture and cook until fragrant, about 2-3 minutes. Stir in the chicken and cook another 2-3 minutes until browned.', '3. Pour in the Coconut Almondmilk. Add the fish sauce and broccoli.
