title: Greek Chicken Tzatziki Bowls
ingredients: ['full-fat plain Greek yogurt', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'boneless skinless chicken breasts or thighs, cubed', 'garlic cloves, chopped', 'shallots, chopped', 'smoked paprika', 'chopped fresh oregano', 'chili flakes, Kosher salt, and black pepper', 'Persian cucumbers, chopped', 'avocado, diced', 'lemon juice', 'fresh dill, chopped', 'crumbled feta cheese', 'Tzakiki sauce', 'lettuce, peperoncini, onion, tomatoes, and pitas, for serving', 'tahini', 'grated ginger', 'garlic, grated', 'tamari', 'lemon juice', 'honey']
ingredients with measurement: {'full-fat plain Greek yogurt': '1/3', 'extra virgin olive oil': '1/4', 'boneless skinless chicken breasts or thighs, cubed': '1 1/2', 'garlic cloves, chopped': '6', 'shallots, chopped': '2', 'smoked paprika': '1', 'chopped fresh oregano': '1', 'chili flakes, Kosher salt, and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'Persian cucumbers, chopped': '2', 'avocado, diced': '1', 'lemon juice': '1', 'fresh dill, chopped': '1/4', 'crumbled feta cheese': '6', 'Tzakiki sauce': '1-2', 'lettuce, peperoncini, onion, tomatoes, and pitas, for serving': 'seasoning', 'tahini': '1/2', 'grated ginger': '2', 'garlic, grated': '1', 'tamari': '2', 'honey': '2'}
instructions: ['1. In a bowl, combine the yogurt, olive oil, cubed chicken, garlic, shallots, paprika, oregano, chili flakes, and a large pinch each of salt and pepper. Let marinate for 15 minutes at room temperature or up to overnight in the refrigerator.', '2. Preheat the oven to 425° F. Arrange the chicken on a baking sheet. If needed, add water to thin the sauce as desired. Season to taste with salt.', '5. To assemble, add lettuce to a bowl. title: Honey Garlic Butter Shrimp In Coconut Milk with Fried Plantains.

ingredients with measurement: {'raw tail on shrimp': '1', 'olive oil': '1/4', 'honey': '2', 'garlic': '4-6', 'fresh grated ginger': '1', 'jalapenos': '2', 'cayenne pepper (use less for less heat': '1', 'cumin': '1', 'fresh cilantro': '1/4', 'butter': '4', 'canned coconut milk': '1/4', 'fresh basil': '2', 'kosher salt + pepper': 'seasoning', 'steamed white rice + black beans + sliced avocado': 'seasoning', 'yellow plantains': '4', 'oil': 'seasoning', 'flaky sea salt': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['Heat a large skillet over medium heat. Once hot use a slotted spoon to scoop the shrimp out of the marinade, reserving the marinade, and into the hot skillet, season with salt and pepper. Cook the shrimp until pink, about 2-3 minutes per side. Add the reserved marinade, the butter and 1 teaspoon pepper (or more or less to your taste) to the skillet. Continue to cook the shrimp in the butter until the garlic begins to caramelize and turn LIGHT golden brown, about another minute or two. Be careful not to burn the garlic. Remove from the heat and stir in the coconut milk and basil.']

title: My Favorite Slow Roasted Pork Carnitas.
ingredients: ['pork shoulder', 'garlic powder', 'chipotle chili powder', 'kosher salt and pepper', 'Mexican beer or low sodium chicken broth', 'orange juice', 'bay', 'juice from 2 limes', 'cilantro']
ingredients with measurement: {'pork shoulder': '3', 'garlic powder': '1', 'chipotle chili powder': '2', 'kosher salt and pepper': 'seasoning', 'Mexican beer or low sodium chicken broth': '1', 'orange juice': '1/2', 'bay': '2', 'juice from 2 limes': 'seasoning', 'cilantro': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['Heat a large dutch oven over medium high heat. Sear the pork on all sides. If needed, sear the pork in batches if your dutch oven is not large enough. Reduce the heat low and pour in the beer, orange juice and 1/2 cup water (there should be just enough liquid to cover the sides of the meat). Add the bay leaves. Bring the mixture to a boil and then reduce the heat, cover and simmer for 1 1/2 hours on LOW. After 1 1/2  hours the pork should be falling apart. Remove the lid and continue cooking another 30 minutes. The Coca-Cola will caramelize and the liquid will evaporate almost completely.']

title: Korean Pineapple Pork Lettuce Wraps.
ingredients: ['Smithfield Boneless Netted Fresh Pork Shoulder', 'salt', 'brown sugar', 'soy sauce', 'rice wine vinegar', 'fresh grated ginger', 'finely diced pineapple', 'sriracha', 'green onions', 'water', 'a pineapple', 'brown sugar', 'heads butter lettuce', 'shredded carrots + sliced cucumbers', 'greens onions + fresno chiles', 'sliced limes + sesame seeds', 'steamed [coconut rice | https://www.halfbakedharvest.com/hawaiian-hula-pork-fajitas-pineapple-slaw-coconut-rice/] or regular rice', 'sesame oil', 'gochujang or sriracha']
ingredients with measurement: {'Smithfield Boneless Netted Fresh Pork Shoulder': '3-4', 'salt': '2', 'brown sugar': '2', 'soy sauce': '1', 'rice wine vinegar': '1/4', 'fresh grated ginger': '2', 'finely diced pineapple': '1/4', 'sriracha': '2', 'green onions': '4', 'water': '2', 'a pineapple': '1/2', 'heads butter lettuce': '1-2', 'shredded carrots + sliced cucumbers': 'seasoning', 'greens onions + fresno chiles': 'seasoning', 'sliced limes + sesame seeds': 'seasoning', 'steamed [coconut rice | https://www.halfbakedharvest.com/hawaiian-hula-pork-fajitas-pineapple-slaw-coconut-rice/] or regular rice': 'seasoning', 'sesame oil': '1/4', 'gochujang or sriracha': '1'}
instructions: ['In a bowl, whisk together the soy sauce, rice wine vinegar, ginger, diced pineapple, green onions, and sriracha. Remove a 1/3 cup of the marinade and set aside for later. Now add 2 cups of water to the marinade. Pour the marinade over the pork. Cover the pork tightly with foil or the dutch oven lid. Roast for 3-4 hours or until the pork shreds easily. Towards the end of cooking, check the pork and make sure the sauce is not getting too low. If the sauce is thickening too much, add water to keep the pork moist. You want the pork submerged in liquid at least 1/3 a way up the pot.']

title: Curried Thai Beef with Peanut Sauce
ingredients: ['creamy peanut butter', 'tamari/soy sauce', 'Thai red curry paste', 'chopped pickled ginger', 'toasted sesame oil', 'flank steak, thinly sliced', 'black pepper', 'cornstarch or arrowroot powder', 'Thai red curry paste', 'salted butter', 'garlic, chopped', 'lemongrass paste', 'chopped pickled ginger', 'tamari/soy sauce', 'sweet Thai chili sauce', 'chopped mango', 'jalapeño pepper, seeded and sliced', 'fresh cilantro, chopped', 'green onions, chopped', 'sesame seeds', 'chopped peanuts', 'lime juice']
ingredients with measurement: {'creamy peanut butter': '1/2', 'tamari/soy sauce': '1/3', 'Thai red curry paste': '1/4', 'chopped pickled ginger': '2', 'toasted sesame oil': '1', 'flank steak, thinly sliced': '1 1/2', 'black pepper': '1', 'cornstarch or arrowroot powder': '2', 'salted butter': '3', 'garlic, chopped': '4', 'lemongrass paste': '1', 'sweet Thai chili sauce': '2', 'chopped mango': '1', 'jalapeño pepper, seeded and sliced': '1', 'fresh cilantro, chopped': '1/2', 'green onions, chopped': '2', 'sesame seeds': '2', 'chopped peanuts': '2', 'lime juice': '2'}
instructions: ['1. To make the peanut sauce. Add all ingredients to a glass jar or blender and blend to combine, adding water as needed to thin the sauce.', '2. In a bowl, toss together the beef, a pinch of pepper, and the cornstarch (or arrowroot powder).', '3. Melt one tablespoon of butter in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the beef and curry paste. Cook until the beef becomes crispy, about 5 minutes. Add two tablespoons of butter, the garlic, lemongrass, and ginger. Cook until the garlic is lightly crisping, 1 minute. Reduce the heat to low. Add the tamari/soy sauce and Thai chili sauce. Cook for 2-3 minutes until the meat is caramelized.', '4. In a bowl, mix the mango, jalapeño, cilantro, green onion, sesame seeds, peanuts, and lime juice.', '5. Spoon the mango salsa over the bowls of rice. Add the beef, then pour the peanut sauce on top. Enjoy!']

title: Crockpot Buffalo Chicken Chili
ingredients: ['medium yellow onion, chopped', 'boneless skinless chicken breasts or thighs', 'hot sauce', 'garlic powder', 'smoked paprika', 'chipotle chili powder, use to your taste', 'fire roasted diced tomatoes', 'poblano peppers, seeded and chopped', 'jalapeño pepper, chopped, and seeded if desired', 'chopped celery', 'bone or chicken broth', 'salted butter', 'salt and black pepper', 'plain Greek yogurt or cream cheese, melted', 'fresh cilantro, chopped', 'avocado, cheddar cheese, and Greek yogurt, for serving']
ingredients with measurement: {'medium yellow onion, chopped': '1', 'boneless skinless chicken breasts or thighs': '2', 'hot sauce': '1/2', 'garlic powder': '1', 'smoked paprika': '1', 'chipotle chili powder, use to your taste': '1', 'fire roasted diced tomatoes': '1', 'poblano peppers, seeded and chopped': '2', 'jalapeño pepper, chopped, and seeded if desired': '1', 'chopped celery': '3/4', 'bone or chicken broth': '2-4', 'salted butter': '4', 'salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'plain Greek yogurt or cream cheese, melted': '1/2', 'fresh cilantro, chopped': '1/2', 'avocado, cheddar cheese, and Greek yogurt, for serving': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. In the bowl of your crockpot, combine the onion, chicken, hot sauce, garlic powder, paprika, chipotle chili powder, diced tomatoes, poblano peppers, jalapeños and celery. Stir in 2 cups broth. Add the butter slices. Season with salt and pepper.', '2. Cover and cook on low for 5-6 hours or high for 3-4 hours.', '3. Shred the chicken using two forks. Stir in the cream cheese/yogurt, and cilantro.', '4. Ladle the chili into bowls. Top, as desired with Greek yogurt, cheese, avocado, cilantro, and green onions. We add extra buffalo sauce and tortilla chips too! Eat and enjoy!']

title: 20 Minute Korean Gochujang Beef Bowls
ingredients: ['ground beef (or chicken or pork)', 'butter', 'bell peppers, sliced', 'shallots, sliced', 'garlic, chopped', 'pickled ginger', 'tamari or soy sauce', 'Gochujang', 'ginger juice', 'maple or honey', 'toasted sesame seeds', 'chopped roasted peanuts', 'Persian cucumbers, chopped', 'Gochujang', 'chopped green onion/ Thai basil', 'ginger juice or rice vinegar']
ingredients with measurement: {'ground beef (or chicken or pork)': '1 1/2', 'butter': '2', 'bell peppers, sliced': '2', 'shallots, sliced': '3', 'garlic, chopped': '4', 'pickled ginger': '1/4', 'tamari or soy sauce': '1/2', 'Gochujang': '1', 'ginger juice': '2', 'maple or honey': '2', 'toasted sesame seeds': '1/4', 'chopped roasted peanuts': '1/3', 'Persian cucumbers, chopped': '4', 'chopped green onion/ Thai basil': '1/4', 'ginger juice or rice vinegar': '2'}
instructions: ['1. In a large skillet, combine the beef and a pinch of black pepper. Cook over medium heat, breaking up the meat as it cooks until browned, about 5 minutes. Add the butter, peppers, garlic, shallots, and ginger. Cook 2 minutes.', '2. Pour over the tamari, add the Gochujang, ginger juice, and 1/3 cup water. Cook until the sauce coats the beef, 2-3 minutes. Mix in the maple/honey and cook another 1-2 minutes until the beef is caramelized. Remove from the heat. Toss with sesame seeds.', '3. Meanwhile, In a bowl, mix the cucumbers with 1 teaspoon salt, the chile flakes, ginger juice, and green onions. Let sit 5 minutes.', '4. Serve the beef and peppers over bowls of rice. Serve with the cucumber salad and top with peanuts. Add spicy mayo if desired. Enjoy!']

title: Sheet Pan Chili Orange Chicken and Broccoli
ingredients: ['chicken breasts or thighs cut into cubes', 'orange zest', 'black pepper', 'flour or gluten-free flour', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'broccoli florets', 'green onions + sesame seeds, for serving', 'fresh orange juice + 2 tablespoons zest', 'tamari or soy sauce', 'rice vinegar', 'honey', 'garlic, grated', 'fresh grated ginger', 'chili paste (gochjang)', 'toasted sesame oil', 'cornstarch or flour']
ingredients with measurement: {'chicken breasts or thighs cut into cubes': '2', 'orange zest': '2', 'black pepper': 'seasoning', 'flour or gluten-free flour': '1/4', 'extra virgin olive oil': '4', 'broccoli florets': '3', 'green onions + sesame seeds, for serving': 'seasoning', 'fresh orange juice + 2 tablespoons zest': '1', 'tamari or soy sauce': '1/3', 'rice vinegar': '2', 'honey': '3', 'garlic, grated': '4', 'fresh grated ginger': '1', 'chili paste (gochjang)': '3-4', 'toasted sesame oil': '1', 'cornstarch or flour': '1'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 450° F. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper or rub with oil.', '2. On the sheet pan, mix the chicken, orange zest, and pepper. Add the flour and toss again. Add 2 tablespoons olive oil, tossing to coat. Arrange the chicken to one side of the baking sheet. Add the broccoli to the other side. Toss with olive oil, salt, and pepper. Bake for 15-20 minutes until the chicken is cooked through.', '3. Meanwhile, make the sauce. In a saucepan, combine all ingredients, then set over medium heat. Bring to a boil for 3-4 minutes, until the sauce bubbles and begins to thicken. Remove from the heat.', '4. Remove the broccoli from the sheet pan. Then pour the orange sauce over the chicken and toss the chicken up in the sauce. Bake for another 5 minutes, until the sauce is baked onto the chicken.', "5. Serve the chicken, broccoli, and orange sauce with green onions and toasted sesame seeds. I love this over rice, but it's also great as an appetizer too!"]

title: Baked Crunchy Honey Buffalo Chicken
ingredients: ['cornflakes', 'grated parmesan cheese', 'smoked paprika', 'onion powder', 'garlic powder', 'large eggs, beaten', 'hot sauce', 'chicken breast or skinless thighs', 'extra virgin olive oil, for drizzling', 'blue cheese or ranch dressing, for serving', 'sliced green onions, for serving', 'hot sauce', 'salted butter', 'seasoned salt', 'chipotle chili powder', 'cayenne pepper', 'honey']
ingredients with measurement: {'cornflakes': '6', 'grated parmesan cheese': '1/4', 'smoked paprika': '1', 'onion powder': '1', 'garlic powder': '1', 'large eggs, beaten': '2', 'hot sauce': '1/2', 'chicken breast or skinless thighs': '2', 'extra virgin olive oil, for drizzling': 'seasoning', 'blue cheese or ranch dressing, for serving': 'seasoning', 'sliced green onions, for serving': 'seasoning', 'salted butter': '6', 'seasoned salt': '1-2', 'chipotle chili powder': '3/4', 'cayenne pepper': '1/2', 'honey': '2'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 425° F. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.', '2. In a food processor, combine the cornflakes, parmesan, paprika, onion powder, garlic powder, and a pinch of salt. Pulse until you have fine crumbs. Alternatively, you can crush the crumbs in a ziplock bag by stepping on them. Dump the crumbs into a shallow bowl.', '3. Beat the eggs in a bowl, add the hot sauce and chicken, and toss well to coat.', '4. Dredge the chicken through the crumbs, covering fully. Place on the prepared baking sheet. For a thicker coating, dip the chicken back through the eggs, then through the crumbs a second time. Place on the prepared baking sheet. Drizzle with olive oil. Bake for 20-25 minutes, until crisp all around.', '5. Meanwhile, make the sauce. In a saucepan set over medium heat, melt together the hot sauce, butter, seasoned salt, and cayenne. Stir until melted and combined. Remove from the heat and mix in the honey.', "6. Drizzle the buffalo sauce over the chicken. Top with green onions and blue cheese/ranch dressing. I love this over rice, but it's also great with french fries. Enjoy!"]

title: Chipotle Cheddar Chicken Burgers
ingredients: ['ground chicken', 'panko bread crumbs', 'chopped chipotle in adobo', 'smoked paprika', 'chili powder', 'sea salt and black pepper', 'cheddar cheese', 'buns, toasted', 'fresh cilantro chopped,', 'ears grilled corn, kernels removed from the cob', 'lime juice', 'sliced/mashed avocado', 'mayo', 'chopped chipotle in adobo', 'sweet Thai chili sauce']
ingredients with measurement: {'ground chicken': '1', 'panko bread crumbs': '1/2', 'chopped chipotle in adobo': '1-2', 'smoked paprika': '1', 'chili powder': '1', 'sea salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'cheddar cheese': '4', 'buns, toasted': '4', 'fresh cilantro chopped,': '1/2', 'ears grilled corn, kernels removed from the cob': '2', 'lime juice': '2', 'sliced/mashed avocado': 'seasoning', 'mayo': '1/2', 'sweet Thai chili sauce': '2'}

Rub the burger with olive oil.', '2. Heat your grill or grill pan. Grill the burgers for 8-10 minutes on each side until cooked through and crisp. Add a cheese slice to each, cook until melted, 1-2 minutes.', '3. In a bowl, mix the cilantro, corn, lime juice, 1/2 teaspoon chili powder, and sea salt.', '4. For the mayo, combine all ingredients in a bowl.', '5. To assemble, layer your toasted buns with mayo, the cheesy burgers, avocado, and corn. Add the top bun and enjoy with lots of extra mayo.']

title: Chopped Honey Buffalo Chicken Skewer Salad

title: Picnic Style Pesto Turkey and Avocado Bacon Sandwich
ingredients: ['Caesar dressing', 'basil pesto', 'ciabatta bread, halved, lightly toasted', 'Gouda or Havarti cheese', 'avocado, sliced', 'thinly sliced turkey or roasted chicken', 'cooked bacon', 'shredded lettuce', 'sliced dill pickles and or peperoncini', 'mayo', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'lemon juice', 'Dijon mustard', 'Worcestershire sauce', 'garlic, grated', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'grated parmesan']

title: These Chipotle Pineapple Bang Bang Chicken Skewers:

title: Creamy Broccoli Cheddar Casserole with Garlic Butter Pretzels
ingredients: ['warm water', 'instant yeast', 'salted butter, melted', 'all-purpose flour', 'baking soda', 'egg, beaten', 'pretzel salt (for sprinkling)', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'salted butter', 'yellow onion, chopped', 'all-purpose flour', 'garlic, chopped, 1 clove, grated', 'paprika', 'cayenne, more or less to taste', 'fresh thyme leaves', 'low sodium veggie or chicken broth', 'broccoli florets, chopped', 'kosher salt and black', 'whole milk', 'shredded sharp cheddar cheese']
ingredients with measurement: {'warm water': '3/4', 'instant yeast': '2 1/4', 'salted butter, melted': '4', 'all-purpose flour': '1/4', 'baking soda': '1/4', 'egg, beaten': '1', 'pretzel salt (for sprinkling)': 'seasoning', 'extra virgin olive oil': '3', 'salted butter': '1', 'yellow onion, chopped': '1', 'garlic, chopped, 1 clove, grated': '3', 'paprika': '1', 'cayenne, more or less to taste': '1/4', 'fresh thyme leaves': '2', 'low sodium veggie or chicken broth': '3', 'broccoli florets, chopped': '4', 'kosher salt and black': 'seasoning', 'whole milk': '2', 'shredded sharp cheddar cheese': '2 1/2'}
instructions: ['1. Combine the flour and instant yeast in the bowl of a stand mixer. Add the water and 3 tablespoons butter. Mix on medium speed until the dough is smooth and begins to pull away from the sides of the bowl, about 3 to 4 minutes. If the dough is too wet, add additional flour, 1 tablespoon at a time. Cover the bowl and place in a warm spot 15-20 minutes.', '2. Meanwhile, make the casserole. Preheat the oven to 425° F.', '3. Heat the olive oil, butter, and onion in a large, oven-safe skillet with sides. Cook until fragrant, about 5 minutes. Whisk in the flour, garlic, paprika, and cayenne and cook until golden, 2 minutes. Gradually whisk in the broth until smooth. Add the broccoli and a large pinch each of salt and pepper. Bring to a simmer, reduce the heat to medium and cook, uncovered, until the broccoli is tender, about 10 minutes.', '4. Stir in the milk and 2 cups of cheese until melted and creamy. Let cook 5-10 minutes, until slightly thickened. Remove from the heat. If needed transfer the mix to a casserole dish.\xa0Top with 1/2 cup cheese.', '5. Bring a large pot of water to a boil.', '6. Remove the pretzel dough from the bowl and place on a floured surface. Divide the dough into 8 equal balls. Add the baking soda to the boiling water. Boil the pretzels, 4 at a time, for 30 seconds. Remove with a large slotted spoon, then place on top of the broccoli. Brush each roll with a beaten egg, sprinkle with salt. Bake until the broccoli is bubbling and the pretzels are golden, 25 minutes.', '7. In a bowl mix 1 tablespoon melted butter with 1 clove grated garlic and  the thyme. Brush the rolls with garlic butter. Top enjoy!']

title: One Skillet Buffalo Ranch Chicken Enchiladas
ingredients: ['extra virgin olive oil', 'ground chicken', 'fajita seasoning', 'yellow onion, sliced', 'poblano peppers, chopped', 'kosher salt', 'black pepper', 'beer', 'buffalo sauce', 'salsa verde', 'chopped cilantro', 'cream cheese, room temp', 'plain greek yogurt', 'dried parsley', 'dried chives', 'dried dill', 'smoked paprika', 'shredded Mexican cheese blend', 'tortillas, warmed', 'avocado, limes, and cilantro, for serving']
ingredients with measurement: {'extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'ground chicken': '1', 'fajita seasoning': '1', 'yellow onion, sliced': '1', 'poblano peppers, chopped': '2', 'kosher salt': 'seasoning', 'black pepper': 'seasoning', 'beer': '1', 'buffalo sauce': '1', 'salsa verde': '1/2', 'chopped cilantro': '1/2', 'cream cheese, room temp': '4', 'plain greek yogurt': '1/4', 'dried parsley': '1', 'dried chives': '1', 'dried dill': '2', 'smoked paprika': '1', 'shredded Mexican cheese blend': '1 1/2', 'tortillas, warmed': '6', 'avocado, limes, and cilantro, for serving': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 400°.', '2. In a large oven-safe skillet, combine the olive oil, chicken, onion, and peppers. Cook, breaking up the meat as it cooks, until browned, about 5 minutes.\xa0Add the fajita seasoning, then pour in the beer, the buffalo sauce, and the salsa. Simmer 5-8 minutes. Remove from the heat and stir in the cilantro.', '3. In a bowl, combine the cream cheese, yogurt, parsley, chives, dill, paprika, and a pinch each of salt and pepper.\xa0Stir in half of the shredded cheese.', '4. Spoon the cream cheese mix down the center of each tortilla, tuck, and roll. Place the tortillas, seam side down, into the skillet overtop of the chicken. Top with the remaining shredded cheese. Bake for 15-20 minutes, until the cheese has melted.', '5. Serve warm, drizzled with yogurt mixed with lime and salt. Top with avocado, cilantro, and jalapeños. Add extra buffalo sauce. Enjoy!']

title: Cider Braised Chicken with Caramelized Onions
ingredients: ['chicken, thighs or breasts', 'all-purpose flour', 'kosher salt', 'black pepper', 'salted butter', 'yellow onions, thinly sliced', 'apple cider', 'sliced mushrooms', 'garlic, chopped', 'chopped fresh thyme', 'chopped fresh sage', 'chicken broth or dry white wine']
ingredients with measurement: {'chicken, thighs or breasts': '2', 'all-purpose flour': '3', 'kosher salt': 'seasoning', 'black pepper': 'seasoning', 'salted butter': '1', 'yellow onions, thinly sliced': '4', 'apple cider': '2', 'sliced mushrooms': '2', 'garlic, chopped': '4', 'chopped fresh thyme': '2', 'chopped fresh sage': '1', 'chicken broth or dry white wine': '1'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 400° F.', '2. Season the chicken with salt and pepper, then rub with flour to coat. Heat a large oven-safe skillet with sides over high heat, and sear the chicken on 1 side. Remove the chicken to a plate.', '3. Add the butter and onions and cook 5 minutes, until softened. Add a 1/2 cup apple cider, season with salt and pepper, and continue cooking another 5-8 minutes, until the cider has evaporated and the onions are lightly golden. Add the mushrooms, garlic, thyme, and sage, then add the chicken back to the pot. Add the remaining 1 1/2 cups cider, and wine. Roast for 30 minutes or until the chicken is falling apart. Watch the sauce, if it begins to thicken too much, cover the dish.', '3. Serve the chicken with wild rice pilaf and bread. Drizzle with any remaining pan sauce and onions. Enjoy!']

title: One Pot Creamy Sun-Dried Tomato Orzo
ingredients: ['ground spicy Italian chicken sausage', 'shallot, chopped', 'garlic, chopped', 'dried oregano', 'dried thyme', 'oil-packed sun-dried tomatoes, chopped', 'low sodium chicken broth', 'dijon mustard', 'dry orzo pasta', 'small zucchini, shredded', 'fresh baby spinach', 'canned coconut milk or heavy cream', 'grated parmesan', 'fresh basil']
ingredients with measurement: {'ground spicy Italian chicken sausage': '3/4', 'shallot, chopped': '1', 'garlic, chopped': '2', 'dried oregano': '1', 'dried thyme': '1', 'oil-packed sun-dried tomatoes, chopped': '1/2', 'low sodium chicken broth': '4', 'dijon mustard': '2', 'dry orzo pasta': '1', 'small zucchini, shredded': '2', 'fresh baby spinach': '2', 'canned coconut milk or heavy cream': '1/2', 'grated parmesan': '1', 'fresh basil': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. In a large skillet set over medium heat, brown the chicken sausage over medium heat, about 5 to 8 minutes. Add the shallots, garlic, oregano, and thyme, and cook until fragrant, 3 minutes. Mix in the sun-dried tomatoes and cook another 2 minutes.', '2. Pour in the broth. Add the dijon, then bring to a boil. Add the orzo and zucchini and cook, stirring often, until the pasta is al dente, 6 minutes. Mix in the spinach, pour in the milk, and sprinkle over the parmesan.', '3. Stir until creamy, then remove from the heat. Serve topped with fresh basil. Enjoy!']

title: Brown Butter Brussels Sprout and Bacon Fettuccine Alfredo
ingredients: ['fettuccine pasta', 'thick-cut slices bacon, chopped', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'Brussels sprouts, thinly sliced or halved, if small', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'salted butter', 'garlic, minced or grated', 'chopped fresh oregano', 'chopped fresh sage', 'crushed red pepper flakes', 'whole milk or canned coconut milk', 'heavy cream or canned coconut milk', 'cream cheese, at room temperature', 'grated Parmesan or Pecorino Romano', 'ground nutmeg']
ingredients with measurement: {'fettuccine pasta': '1', 'thick-cut slices bacon, chopped': '4', 'extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'Brussels sprouts, thinly sliced or halved, if small': '3/4', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'salted butter': '4', 'garlic, minced or grated': '3', 'chopped fresh oregano': '1', 'chopped fresh sage': '1', 'crushed red pepper flakes': '1', 'whole milk or canned coconut milk': '2', 'heavy cream or canned coconut milk': '1/2', 'cream cheese, at room temperature': '2', 'grated Parmesan or Pecorino Romano': '1 1/2', 'ground nutmeg': '1/4'}
instructions: ['1. Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Cook the pasta according to package directions until al dente. Drain.', '2. Meanwhile, cook the bacon in a large skillet over medium heat until crisp. Drain onto a paper towel. Add the Brussels sprouts, cut side down, and season with salt and pepper. Cook until the sprouts are crisping on the edges, 3 to 4 minutes.\xa0Toss the sprouts, add the olive oil and cook another 2-3 minutes, until crisp. Remove the Brussels sprouts from the skillet to a plate.', '3. To the same skillet, melt the butter over medium heat, cooking until the butter begins to brown, about 3-4 minutes.\xa0Reduce the heat to low, add the garlic, oregano, sage, and a pinch of crushed red pepper. Cook 1 minute, then pour in the milk and cream. Add the cream cheese. Whisk until smooth. Bring the sauce to a gentle simmer and cook 5-8 minutes, until thickened slightly. Stir in the parmesan and nutmeg. Season with salt + pepper. Toss in the pasta and cook 3-5 minutes, then remove from the heat.', '4. Divide the fettuccine between plates and top with crispy Brussels sprouts, and bacon. Eat and enjoy immediately.']

title: Slow Cooker Chipotle Chicken Tortilla Soup with Salty Lime Chips
ingredients: ['extra virgin olive oil', 'medium yellow onion, chopped', 'garlic, minced or grated', 'poblano peppers, seeded and chopped', 'chipotle peppers in adobo, finely chopped', 'smoked paprika', 'ground cumin', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'boneless skinless, chicken breast', 'fire-roasted diced tomatoes', 'low-sodium chicken broth', 'juice of 2 limes, plus lime zest for serving', 'fresh cilantro, chopped, plus more for serving', 'sliced avocado, cheddar, and yogurt, for serving', 'salty lime chips']
ingredients with measurement: {'extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'medium yellow onion, chopped': '1', 'garlic, minced or grated': '4', 'poblano peppers, seeded and chopped': '2', 'chipotle peppers in adobo, finely chopped': '2-4', 'smoked paprika': '1', 'ground cumin': '2', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'boneless skinless, chicken breast': '1', 'fire-roasted diced tomatoes': '2', 'low-sodium chicken broth': '4', 'juice of 2 limes, plus lime zest for serving': 'seasoning', 'fresh cilantro, chopped, plus more for serving': '1/2', 'sliced avocado, cheddar, and yogurt, for serving': 'seasoning', 'salty lime chips': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. In the bowl of your crockpot, combine the olive oil, onion, garlic, poblano peppers, chipotle peppers, paprika, cumin, and a pinch each of salt and pepper. Stir to combine. Add the chicken, then stir in the tomatoes and broth. Season with salt and pepper. Cover and cook on low for 6-7 hours or high for 4-5 hours.', '2. Shred the chicken using two forks. Stir in the lime juice, and cilantro.', '3. Ladle the soup into bowls. Top, as desired, with yogurt/sour cream, cheese, avocado, cilantro, green onions, and tortilla chips. Zest a lime over each bowl. Eat and enjoy!']

title: Ginger Coconut Sweet Potato and Rice Stew with Spiced Chili Oil
ingredients: ['extra virgin olive oil', 'yellow onion, chopped', 'fresh ginger, grated', 'garlic, minced or grated', 'sweet potatoes, peeled and cubed', 'garam masala', 'turmeric', 'cayenne pepper', 'fresh cilantro, chopped, plus more for serving', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'coconut milk', 'chopped kale', 'cooked basmati rice', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'garlic lightly smashed', 'raw sesame seeds', 'crushed red pepper flakes', 'ground cumin seed', 'paprika']
ingredients with measurement: {'extra virgin olive oil': '1/3', 'yellow onion, chopped': '1', 'fresh ginger, grated': '2', 'garlic, minced or grated': '4', 'sweet potatoes, peeled and cubed': '2', 'garam masala': '2', 'turmeric': '1', 'cayenne pepper': '1/4- 1/2', 'fresh cilantro, chopped, plus more for serving': '1/3', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'coconut milk': '1', 'chopped kale': '3', 'cooked basmati rice': '2', 'garlic lightly smashed': '4', 'raw sesame seeds': '1', 'crushed red pepper flakes': '2-3', 'ground cumin seed': '1', 'paprika': '1'}
instructions: ['1. Heat the olive oil in a large pot over medium heat. When the oil shimmers, add the onion and cook 5 minutes until soft. Add the ginger, garlic, and sweet potatoes and cook until fragrant, about 2 minutes. Stir in the garam masala, turmeric, and cayenne and cook another minute.', '2. Add 3 cups water. Season generously with salt. Bring the mix to a boil over high heat, then reduce the heat to low. Cover and simmer 15-20 minutes, until the sweet potatoes are tender.', '3. Stir in the coconut milk and kale, cook 5 minutes. Remove from the heat and add the cilantro.', '4. Meanwhile, make the chili oil. Heat the olive oil and garlic in a small saucepan over medium-low heat. Cook, stirring occasionally until the garlic is fragrant, 5 minutes. Stir in the sesame seeds, chili flakes, and cumin seeds, cook 30 seconds. Remove from the heat and\xa0stir in the paprika. Season the oil with salt. Let cool.', '4. To serve, divide the rice among bowls and ladle the stew overtop. Spoon over the chili oil and top with cilantro. Serve with Naan on the side. Enjoy!']

title: Sheet Pan Sticky Pomegranate Chicken and Honey Roasted Squash.
ingredients: ['acorn or kabocha squash seeded and sliced into half rounds', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'honey', 'egg, beaten', 'boneless chicken breasts, cut into 2 inch cubes', 'shredded unsweetened coconut', 'Panko breadcrumbs', 'sweet Thai chili sauce', 'pomegranate juice', 'low sodium soy sauce', 'rice vinegar', 'fresh ginger, grated', 'garlic cloves, grated', 'arils from 1 pomegranate', 'coconut rice, for serving']
ingredients with measurement: {'acorn or kabocha squash seeded and sliced into half rounds': '1', 'extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'honey': '1', 'egg, beaten': '1', 'boneless chicken breasts, cut into 2 inch cubes': '1 1/2', 'shredded unsweetened coconut': '1 1/2', 'Panko breadcrumbs': '1/2', 'sweet Thai chili sauce': '1/2', 'pomegranate juice': '1/2', 'low sodium soy sauce': '3', 'rice vinegar': '2', 'fresh ginger, grated': '1', 'garlic cloves, grated': '2', 'arils from 1 pomegranate': 'seasoning', 'coconut rice, for serving': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 450 degrees F. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper or grease with oil.', '2. On the prepared baking sheet, toss the squash with olive oil, and a pinch each of salt and pepper. Bake 10 minutes.', '3. Meanwhile, add the chicken, egg, and a pinch of pepper to a bowl. Toss to combine. Add the coconut, Panko, and a pinch of pepper to a medium-sized bowl. Stir to combine. Dredge the chicken in batches through the coconut mix, tossing to coat. Remove the squash from the oven and arrange to one side of the pan. On the other side, arrange the chicken. Drizzle with 2 tablespoons oil. Bake for 12 minutes. Toss the squash, flip the chicken, and return to the oven another 3-5 minutes, until the chicken is cooked through. Reduce the oven temp to 425 degrees F.', '4. Meanwhile, combine the chili sauce, pomegranate juice, soy sauce, rice vinegar, garlic, and ginger in a medium saucepan and set over medium-high heat. Bring the sauce to a boil for 5 minutes, until the sauce thickens and reduces by about 1/3. Remove from the heat.', '5. Pour 2/3 of sauce over the chicken, tossing to combine. Toss the squash with the honey and a pinch of red pepper flakes. Return everything to the oven for 3 minutes, until the sauce coats the chicken.', '6. Serve the chicken and sauce over bowls of coconut rice. Top the chicken pomegranate arils and cilantro. Serve the squash on the side.']

title: Sheet Pan Sticky Ginger Sesame Chicken and Crispy Brussels Sprouts
ingredients: ['boneless chicken breasts, cut into 2 inch cubes', 'egg, beaten', 'all-purpose', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'brussels sprouts, halved', 'extra virgin olive oil or sesame oil', 'low sodium soy sauce', 'pomegranate juice', 'honey', 'balsamic vinegar', 'apple cider vinegar', 'molasses or pomegranate molasses', 'creamy peanut butter', 'garlic, minced or grated', 'fresh ginger, grated', 'crushed red pepper flakes, use more or less to taste', 'rice, sesame seeds, and green onions, for serving']
ingredients with measurement: {'boneless chicken breasts, cut into 2 inch cubes': '1 1/2', 'egg, beaten': '1', 'all-purpose': '1/4', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'brussels sprouts, halved': '3/4', 'extra virgin olive oil or sesame oil': '6', 'low sodium soy sauce': '2/3', 'pomegranate juice': '1/3', 'honey': '1/4', 'balsamic vinegar': '2', 'apple cider vinegar': '2', 'molasses or pomegranate molasses': '1', 'creamy peanut butter': '1', 'garlic, minced or grated': '2', 'fresh ginger, grated': '1', 'crushed red pepper flakes, use more or less to taste': '1', 'rice, sesame seeds, and green onions, for serving': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 475 degrees F. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper or grease with oil.', '2. Add the chicken, egg, and a pinch of pepper to a bowl. Toss to combine. Add the flour to another bowl. Dredge the chicken in batches through the flour, tossing to coat. Place the chicken on one side of the prepared baking sheet. Drizzle with 2 tablespoons oil. Add the brussels sprouts to the other side of the pan and toss with 2 tablespoon oil, salt, and pepper. Arrange cut side down. Bake for 12 minutes. Toss the sprouts, flip the chicken and return to the oven another 3-5 minutes, until the chicken is cooked through. Reduce the oven temp to 400 degrees F.', '3. Meanwhile, combine the soy sauce, pomegranate juice, honey, balsamic vinegar, apple cider vinegar, molasses, peanut butter, garlic, ginger, and crushed red pepper flakes in a medium saucepan. Set over medium-high heat and bring the sauce to a boil. Boil 5-8 minutes, until the sauce thickens and reduces by about 1/3. Remove from the heat.', '4. Pour half the sauce over the chicken, tossing to combine. Toss the sprouts with 1 tablespoon oil. Return everything to the oven for 3 minutes, until the sauce coats the chicken, watch close the sauce can burn.', '5. Serve the chicken and sauce over bowls of rice topped with additional green onions, pomegranate arils, and sesame seeds. Serve the brussels sprouts on the side.']

title: One Pot Lemon Rosemary Dijon Chicken and Butter Toasted Rice Pilaf
ingredients: ['boneless chicken breasts or thighs', 'smoked paprika', 'juice and zest of 1 lemon', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'shallots, chopped', 'carrots, chopped', 'mushrooms, chopped', 'salted butter', 'wild rice blend', 'dry orzo pasta', 'garlic, minced or grated', 'chopped fresh rosemary', 'fresh thyme leaves, plus more for serving', 'small honeycrisp apple, chopped', 'apple cider (not vinegar)', 'dry white wine such, as Pinot Grigio or Sauvignon Blanc', 'Dijon mustard']
ingredients with measurement: {'boneless chicken breasts or thighs': '1 1/2', 'smoked paprika': '1', 'juice and zest of 1 lemon': 'seasoning', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'shallots, chopped': '2', 'carrots, chopped': '4', 'mushrooms, chopped': '1 1/2', 'salted butter': '3', 'wild rice blend': '1 1/2', 'dry orzo pasta': '1/2', 'garlic, minced or grated': '4', 'chopped fresh rosemary': '1', 'fresh thyme leaves, plus more for serving': '1', 'small honeycrisp apple, chopped': '1', 'apple cider (not vinegar)': '2', 'dry white wine such, as Pinot Grigio or Sauvignon Blanc': '1', 'Dijon mustard': '2'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 425 degrees F. Season the chicken with paprika, lemon zest, and a pinch each of salt and pepper.', '2. Heat the olive oil in a large skillet/braiser set over medium heat. When the oil shimmers, add the chicken and cook on both sides until golden, about 5 minutes per side. Remove the chicken from the pan.', '3. To the skillet, add the shallots, carrots, and mushrooms. Cook 5 minutes, until just caramelized. Add the butter, wild rice, orzo, garlic, rosemary, thyme, and apple, if using. Cook 5 minutes, until lightly toasted and golden. Add the apple cider, wine, dijon, lemon juice, and 1/2 cup of water. Season with salt and pepper. Bring to a boil over high heat.', '4. Slide the chicken back into the pan. Add the rosemary sprig. Bake, covered, for 30-40 minutes, until the liquid is absorbed and the rice is cooked. During the last 10-15 minutes of cooking remove the lid and allow the chicken to crisp, if needed, add in 1/4 cup additional water or chicken broth to keep the rice from getting dry.', '5. To serve, fluff the rice with a fork and serve the chicken, rice, and veggies together.\xa0Enjoy!']

title: One Skillet Cheesy Broccoli Cheddar Orzo Bake
ingredients: ['extra virgin olive oil', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'yellow onion, chopped', 'roughly chopped mushrooms', 'salted butter', 'dry orzo pasta', 'fresh thyme leaves, plus more for topping', 'low sodium vegetable broth', 'dry white wine such, as Pinot Grigio or Sauvignon Blanc', 'broccoli florets, roughly chopped', 'bay leaf', 'garlic powder', 'cayenne pepper', 'zest of 1/2 a lemon', 'whole milk or canned coconut milk', 'shredded sharp cheddar cheese', 'grated asiago or manchego cheese', 'fresh basil, for serving']
ingredients with measurement: {'extra virgin olive oil': '1', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'yellow onion, chopped': '1', 'roughly chopped mushrooms': '1', 'salted butter': '2', 'dry orzo pasta': '1', 'fresh thyme leaves, plus more for topping': '2', 'low sodium vegetable broth': '3', 'dry white wine such, as Pinot Grigio or Sauvignon Blanc': '1/2', 'broccoli florets, roughly chopped': '3', 'bay leaf': '1', 'garlic powder': '1/2', 'cayenne pepper': '1/2', 'zest of 1/2 a lemon': 'seasoning', 'whole milk or canned coconut milk': '1/2', 'shredded sharp cheddar cheese': '1', 'grated asiago or manchego cheese': '1/2', 'fresh basil, for serving': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 425 degrees F.', '2. Heat the olive oil in a large pot over medium heat. When the oil shimmers, add the onion and cook until fragrant, about 5 minutes. title: Easiest Herby Tomato Soup with Melted Brie Crostini
ingredients: ['medium tomatoes quartered', 'sweet onion quartered', 'garlic smashed', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'fresh thyme leaves', 'fresh sage leaves', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'canned coconut milk', 'shredded sharp cheddar cheese', 'fresh basil roughly, chopped', 'ciabatta bread', 'brie, sliced into 4 slices']
ingredients with measurement: {'medium tomatoes quartered': '6-8', 'sweet onion quartered': '1', 'garlic smashed': '4-6', 'extra virgin olive oil': '3', 'fresh thyme leaves': '2', 'fresh sage leaves': '8', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'canned coconut milk': '1', 'shredded sharp cheddar cheese': '1/4', 'fresh basil roughly, chopped': '1/2', 'ciabatta bread': '4', 'brie, sliced into 4 slices': '4'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 425 degrees F.', '2. In a large oven safe pot, combine the tomatoes, onion, garlic, thyme, 5 sage leaves, olive oil, red pepper flakes, and a pinch each of salt and pepper. Transfer to the oven and roast for 20-30 minutes or until the tomatoes begin to char and release their juices. Let cool slightly.', '3. Transfer the roasted tomato mix and their juices to a blender, puree until smooth. Return the soup to the pot and place over medium heat on the stove. Stir in the milk and cheddar cheese. Cook 5-10 minutes, until warmed. Stir in the basil and season the soup with salt and pepper.', '4. Meanwhile, make the crostini. Finely chop the remaining 3 sage leaves. Place the bread on a baking sheet and rub with olive oil. Transfer to the oven and cook 5 minutes. Flip the bread, sprinkle with sage, and add a slice of brie to each. Return to the oven and cook 5 more minutes or until the brie is melted.', '5. To serve, ladle the soup among bowls and top with fresh basil. Serve alongside the brie crostini. Enjoy!']

title: Cheddar Pierogies with Caramelized Onions and Bacon
ingredients: ['all-purpose flour', 'kosher salt', 'salted butter, melted', 'plain full fat greek yogurt, plus more for serving', 'large egg', 'Russet potatoes, peeled and quartered', 'salted butter, at room temperature', 'shredded sharp cheddar cheese. plus more for topping', 'cream cheese', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'thick cut slices bacon, chopped', 'salted butter', 'yellow onions, thinly sliced', 'apple cider vinegar', 'fresh thyme leaves']
ingredients with measurement: {'all-purpose flour': '2', 'kosher salt': '1', 'salted butter, melted': '2', 'plain full fat greek yogurt, plus more for serving': '1', 'large egg': '1', 'Russet potatoes, peeled and quartered': '4', 'salted butter, at room temperature': '2', 'shredded sharp cheddar cheese. plus more for topping': '2', 'cream cheese': '2', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'thick cut slices bacon, chopped': '4', 'salted butter': '4', 'yellow onions, thinly sliced': '2', 'apple cider vinegar': '3', 'fresh thyme leaves': '1'}
instructions: ['1. To make the dough. In a medium bowl, combine the flour, salt, butter, yogurt, and egg, and mix until combined. Knead the dough for 2-3 minutes. Cover and let sit 30 minutes.', '2. To make the filling.\xa0Bring the potatoes to a boil in a large pot of cold water. Salt the water and cook until the potatoes are tender, about 20 to 30 minutes.', '3. Drain the potatoes, return the potatoes to the pot and mash over low heat, adding the butter, cheddar cheese, and cream cheese. Season to taste with salt and pepper.', '4. Roll the dough out onto a floured surface to 1/8 inch thickness. Using a biscuit cutter, cut out 3-inch circles.\xa0Spoon 2 teaspoons of filling into the center of each round. Brush the edges with water and fold half of the dough over the filling to enclose it. Press down the edges to seal, pressing out all the air. Be sure to keep the dough covered as you work to prevent from drying out. At this point, the\xa0pierogi can be flash-frozen on a baking sheet for 30 minutes, then transferred to a freezer bag and frozen for up to 3 months.', '5. When ready to cook, bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Boil the pierogies in batches for 2-3 minutes, or until they float. Drain.', '6. To make the butter sauce, cook the bacon in a large skillet over medium heat until crisp. Drain onto a paper towel. Wipe the skillet clean, then set back over medium-high heat and melt 1 tablespoon butter. Add the onions and cook 5 minutes, until softened. Add the apple cider, season with salt and pepper and continue cooking another 5-8 minutes, until the cider has evaporated and the onions are golden and caramelized. Add the remaining butter and thyme and cook 2-3 minutes, until the butter is browned.\xa0Remove from the heat.', '7. Drop the pierogies into the sauce, gently tossing to combine. Spoon the pierogies and onions onto plates. Top with cheddar and bacon. EAT!']

title: Roasted Butternut Squash and Spinach Lasagna.
ingredients: ['cubed butternut squash (about 1 medium squash)', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'Vermont Creamery Cultured Butter', 'garlic, minced or grated', 'fresh sage leaves', 'fresh rosemary', 'all-purpose flour', 'whole milk', 'low sodium chicken or vegetable broth', 'fresh grated nutmeg', 'shredded gouda or fontina cheese', 'whole milk ricotta', 'shredded provolone', 'frozen spinach, thawed and drained or 4 cups fresh baby spinach', 'no-boil lasagna noodles', 'thinly sliced prosciutto, torn']
ingredients with measurement: {'cubed butternut squash (about 1 medium squash)': '6', 'extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'Vermont Creamery Cultured Butter': '6', 'garlic, minced or grated': '3', 'fresh sage leaves': '12', 'fresh rosemary': '2', 'all-purpose flour': '1/4', 'whole milk': '2', 'low sodium chicken or vegetable broth': '2', 'fresh grated nutmeg': '1/4', 'shredded gouda or fontina cheese': '1', 'whole milk ricotta': '2', 'shredded provolone': '2', 'frozen spinach, thawed and drained or 4 cups fresh baby spinach': '2', 'no-boil lasagna noodles': '1', 'thinly sliced prosciutto, torn': '3'}
instructions: ['1.\xa0Preheat oven to 375 degrees F.\xa0Lightly butter a 9×13 inch baking dish.', '2. On a baking sheet, toss together the butternut squash, olive oil, and a pinch each of salt and pepper. Transfer to the oven and roast for 25-30 minutes or until the squash is tender.', '3.\xa0Meanwhile, make the sauce. Heat the butter, garlic, sage, and rosemary, in a large skillet over medium heat and cook until the butter begins to brown, about 3-4 minutes.\xa0Remove the sage and rosemary from the skillet.\xa0Whisk in the flour and cook for about 1 minute. Slowly add the milk and broth, whisking until combined. Stir in the nutmeg and season with salt and pepper. Bring to a boil and stir for 3-4 minutes. Stir in the gouda or fontina cheese and the spinach. Stir until the cheese is melted. Remove from the heat.', '4. In a medium bowl, mash the roasted butternut squash until mostly smooth. Stir in the ricotta. Season with salt and pepper.', "5.\xa0Spread 1/4 of the cheese sauce in the bottom of the prepared baking dish. Top with 3-4 lasagna sheets. Spread with 1/2 the butternut squash mixture, and then another 1/4 of the cheese sauce, and a handful of provolone. Repeat the layering until all the squash and sauce have been used…don't stress about making it perfect. Arrange the prosciutto on top, if using. Bake uncovered for 45 minutes or until the top has bubbled up and browned a bit. Let stand 10 minutes before serving. Top with the reserved fried sage and rosemary. Enjoy!"]

title: Creamed Spaghetti Squash with Browned Butter Walnuts
ingredients: ['medium spaghetti squash, halved and seeds removed', 'salted butter', 'raw walnuts, roughly chopped', 'chopped fresh sage', 'garlic, minced or grated', 'whole milk, nut milk, or canned coconut milk', 'creamy goat cheese, crumbled', 'grated manchego cheese', 'basil pesto, homemade or store-bought', 'crushed red pepper flakes', 'kosher salt and black pepper']
ingredients with measurement: {'medium spaghetti squash, halved and seeds removed': '2', 'salted butter': '1', 'raw walnuts, roughly chopped': '1', 'chopped fresh sage': '1-2', 'garlic, minced or grated': '3', 'whole milk, nut milk, or canned coconut milk': '1', 'creamy goat cheese, crumbled': '3', 'grated manchego cheese': '1/3', 'basil pesto, homemade or store-bought': '3', 'crushed red pepper flakes': '1', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 425 degrees F.', '2. Place the squash on a plate and microwave 3 minutes. Let cool slightly, then cut in half lengthwise, scoop out the seeds and discard. Place the squash in a baking dish and season the cut sides with salt and pepper. Transfer to the oven and bake 30-35 minutes or until the squash is tender.', '3. Meanwhile, heat 6 tablespoons butter, the walnuts, sage, and a pinch of salt in a large skillet. Cook 5 minutes, stirring occasionally, until the butter is browned and the walnuts are toasted. Remove the nuts from the skillet to a plate.', '4. In the same skillet, melt the remaining 2 tablespoons butter with the garlic. Cook until the garlic is fragrant, about 2 minutes. Add the crushed red pepper flakes, milk, goat cheese, manchego, and pesto. Season with salt and pepper. Bring to a gentle simmer over medium heat, stirring constantly until smooth and creamy. Remove from the heat.', '4. When the squash is ready, use a fork to scrape the squash into strands, then toss the squash with the pesto cream sauce. Serve the squash warm, topped with buttery walnuts.']

title: Cranberry Cider Braised Beef Stew with Rosemary Polenta.
ingredients: ['beef chuck, trimmed and cubed', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'shallots, thinly sliced', 'carrots, chopped', 'apple cider', 'dry red wine, such as Cabernet Sauvignon', 'balsamic vinegar', 'tomato paste', 'brown sugar or honey', 'fresh thyme', 'dried bay leaves', 'fresh cranberries', 'fresh rosemary', 'garlic, smashed', 'dry instant polenta', 'salted butter']
ingredients with measurement: {'beef chuck, trimmed and cubed': '3', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'shallots, thinly sliced': '3', 'carrots, chopped': '6', 'apple cider': '2', 'dry red wine, such as Cabernet Sauvignon': '1', 'balsamic vinegar': '2', 'tomato paste': '2', 'brown sugar or honey': '1', 'fresh thyme': '4', 'dried bay leaves': '2', 'fresh cranberries': '2', 'fresh rosemary': '2', 'garlic, smashed': '2', 'dry instant polenta': '1 1/2', 'salted butter': '3'}
instructions: ['1. Season the beef with salt and pepper. Heat the olive oil in a large skillet, sear the beef on both sides. Remove the beef and transfer to the slow cooker.', '2. To the slow cooker, add the shallots and carrots. Add the cider, wine, balsamic vinegar, tomato paste, brown sugar (or honey), thyme, and bay leaves. Season with salt and pepper, gently stir to combine. Cover and cook on low for 6-8 hours. During the last 2 hours of cooking, add the cranberries.', '3. To make the polenta. Heat the butter, garlic, and rosemary in a medium saucepan over medium heat. Cook until the garlic is golden and the rosemary is crisp and "fried", about 3 minutes. Remove the rosemary and reserve. To the pan, add 4 cups water and bring to a boil. Slowly whisk in the polenta, stirring until the polenta is soft and thick, about 5 minutes. Season with salt and pepper. If the polenta thickens too much, thin with additional water or cream for an extra luscious polenta.', '4. To serve, remove the thyme and bay leaves from the stew. Serve the stew and gravy over the polenta. Top with crisped rosemary. Enjoy!']

title: Creamy Wild Rice Chicken Soup with Roasted Mushrooms.
ingredients: ['boneless, skinless chicken breasts', 'dry wild rice blend', 'carrots, chopped', 'stalks celery, chopped', 'medium shallots, chopped', 'low-sodium chicken broth', 'chopped fresh thyme or 2 teaspoons dried', 'chopped fresh sage or 1 teaspoon dried', 'crushed red pepper flakes', 'fresh baby spinach or kale', 'chopped fresh parsley', 'heavy cream or whole milk', 'grated parmesan, plus more for serving', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'salted butter, melted', 'mixed mushrooms, roughly torn', 'fresh rosemary', 'garlic, smashed', 'zest from 1 lemon']
ingredients with measurement: {'boneless, skinless chicken breasts': '1', 'dry wild rice blend': '1 1/2', 'carrots, chopped': '6', 'stalks celery, chopped': '3', 'medium shallots, chopped': '2', 'low-sodium chicken broth': '6', 'chopped fresh thyme or 2 teaspoons dried': '2', 'chopped fresh sage or 1 teaspoon dried': '1', 'crushed red pepper flakes': '1/2', 'fresh baby spinach or kale': '2', 'chopped fresh parsley': '2', 'heavy cream or whole milk': '1', 'grated parmesan, plus more for serving': '1/2', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'salted butter, melted': '6', 'mixed mushrooms, roughly torn': '2', 'fresh rosemary': '2', 'garlic, smashed': '4', 'zest from 1 lemon': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. In the bowl of your slow cooker, combine the rice, chicken, carrots, celery, shallots, broth, thyme, sage, crushed red pepper, and a pinch each of salt and pepper. Add 1/2 cup water. Cover and cook on low for 5-6  hours or on high for 2-3 hours.', '2. Shred the chicken with 2 forks. Stir in the cream, parmesan, and spinach. Cook until warmed through, about 30 minutes. Stir in the parsley. If the soup is thick, add an additional 1/2 cup water.', '3. To make the mushrooms. Preheat the oven to 425 degrees F.\xa0On a baking sheet, combine the butter, mushrooms, garlic, rosemary, lemon zest, and a pinch each of salt and pepper. Transfer to the oven and roast for 25-30 minutes, stirring halfway through cooking, until the mushrooms are golden and crisp', '4. Mash the garlic with a fork, then stir in the mushrooms, mashed garlic, and any butter left into the soup.', '5. Divide the soup among bowls and top with rosemary and additional parmesan.']

title: Cream of Mushroom Soup with Garlic Herb Breadcrumbs
ingredients: ['extra virgin olive oil', 'garlic, smashed', 'medium shallot, chopped', 'salted butter', 'wild mushrooms, sliced', 'cremini mushrooms, sliced', 'chopped fresh sage', 'fresh thyme leaves', 'balsamic vinegar', 'low sodium chicken or vegetable broth', 'heavy cream or canned coconut milk', 'grated manchego or parmesan cheese', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'roughly torn sourdough bread', 'fresh chopped oregano, or 2 teaspoons dried oregano', 'fresh thyme leaves, or 2 teaspoons dried thyme', 'garlic, smashed', 'kosher salt']
ingredients with measurement: {'extra virgin olive oil': '1/4', 'garlic, smashed': '2', 'medium shallot, chopped': '1', 'salted butter': '4', 'wild mushrooms, sliced': '6', 'cremini mushrooms, sliced': '3', 'chopped fresh sage': '2', 'fresh thyme leaves': '1', 'balsamic vinegar': '1', 'low sodium chicken or vegetable broth': '4-6', 'heavy cream or canned coconut milk': '1', 'grated manchego or parmesan cheese': '1/2', 'roughly torn sourdough bread': '2', 'fresh chopped oregano, or 2 teaspoons dried oregano': '2', 'fresh thyme leaves, or 2 teaspoons dried thyme': '2', 'kosher salt': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. Heat the olive oil in a large soup pot over medium heat. When the oil shimmers, add the shallots and garlic, cook until fragrant, about 2-3 minutes. Add the mushrooms, and season with salt and pepper. Cook undisturbed for 5 minutes or until golden, stir and continue cooking until the mushrooms have caramelized, 3-5 minutes. Reduce the heat to medium. Add the butter, sage, and thyme. Cook, stirring occasionally, until very fragrant, about 2-3 minutes. Stir in the balsamic vinegar. Spoon out a handful of the mushrooms for topping, if desired. Add the 4 cups broth, season with salt and pepper.', "2. Transfer about 3/4's of the soup to a blender and pulse until smooth and creamy. Return the soup to the pot with the remaining soup. Stir in the cream and cheese. Season the soup with salt and pepper. Simmer the soup for 5-10 minutes until warmed through, adding the addition 1-2 cups broth as need to thin the soup.", '3. Meanwhile, make the bread. Preheat the oven to 425 degrees F. On a baking sheet, toss together the bread, olive oil, oregano, thyme, garlic, and a pinch of salt. Transfer to the oven and bake for 10-15 minutes or until toasted.', '4. Ladle the soup into bowls. Top with garlic herb bread and reserved mushrooms.']

title: Brown Butter Brussels Sprout and Bacon Ravioli.
ingredients: ['cheese ravioli', 'thick cut slices bacon, chopped', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'Brussels sprouts, thinly sliced', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'medium shallot, thinly sliced', 'salted butter', 'toasted hazelnuts or pecans, roughly chopped', 'apple cider vinegar', 'fresh thyme leaves', 'zest of 1 lemon', 'crushed red pepper flakes', 'grated manchego or parmesan cheese']
ingredients with measurement: {'cheese ravioli': '1', 'thick cut slices bacon, chopped': '4', 'extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'Brussels sprouts, thinly sliced': '3/4', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'medium shallot, thinly sliced': '1', 'salted butter': '4', 'toasted hazelnuts or pecans, roughly chopped': '1/2', 'apple cider vinegar': '2', 'fresh thyme leaves': '1', 'zest of 1 lemon': 'seasoning', 'crushed red pepper flakes': '1', 'grated manchego or parmesan cheese': '1/2'}
instructions: ['1. Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Cook the ravioli according to package directions until al dente. Drain the ravioli.', "2. Meanwhile, cook the bacon in a large skillet over medium heat until crisp. Drain onto a paper towel. Wipe the skillet clean, then set back over medium-high heat. Add the olive oil. When the oil shimmers, add the Brussels sprouts and season with salt and pepper. Cook until the sprouts are crisping on the edges, 3 to 4 minutes.\xa0Add the shallots, cooking another 2-3 minutes, until caramelized. Remove the Brussels sprouts from the skillet to a plate. It's OK if some of the shallots are left behind in the skillet.", '3. To the same skillet, melt together the butter and nuts over medium heat, cooking until the butter begins to brown, about 3-4 minutes.\xa0Reduce the heat to low, add the apple cider, thyme, and lemon zest. Season with salt, pepper, and crushed red pepper flakes. Drop the ravioli into the sauce, gently tossing to combine.', '4. Divide the ravioli between plates and top with the crispy Brussels sprouts, bacon, and cheese.']

title: Broccoli Cheese Quesadilla with Chipotle Sauce
ingredients: ['extra virgin olive oil, plus more for cooking', 'head broccoli, cut into florets', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'medium zucchini, and or yellow summer squash, sliced into rounds', 'medium shallot, thinly sliced', 'fresh cilantro or basil, chopped', 'whole wheat or regular flour tortillas', 'shredded sharp cheddar cheese, and or Monterey Jack', 'plain greek yogurt, sliced avocado, and fresh limes, for serving', 'chipotle peppers in adobo, finely chopped, plus 2 tablespoons adobo sauce', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'apple cider vinegar', 'honey', 'toasted sesame seeds', 'kosher salt']
ingredients with measurement: {'extra virgin olive oil, plus more for cooking': '3', 'head broccoli, cut into florets': '1', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'medium zucchini, and or yellow summer squash, sliced into rounds': '1', 'medium shallot, thinly sliced': '1', 'fresh cilantro or basil, chopped': '1/2', 'whole wheat or regular flour tortillas': '4', 'shredded sharp cheddar cheese, and or Monterey Jack': '3/4', 'plain greek yogurt, sliced avocado, and fresh limes, for serving': 'seasoning', 'chipotle peppers in adobo, finely chopped, plus 2 tablespoons adobo sauce': '2', 'extra virgin olive oil': '3', 'apple cider vinegar': '1', 'honey': '1', 'toasted sesame seeds': '2', 'kosher salt': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. Heat the olive oil in a large skillet over high heat. When the oil shimmers, add the broccoli. Let cook, undisturbed, until the broccoli begins to char on the bottom, but is bright green on top, 4-5 minutes. Add the zucchini and shallots and cook another 3-4 minutes, until the zucchini begins to char. Remove from the heat and stir in the cilantro and/or basil.', '2. Meanwhile, make the chipotle sesame sauce by stirring together all ingredients in a glass jar.', '3. Lay the tortillas flat on a clean counter. On top of 2 tortillas, evenly layer the cheeses and broccoli/zucchini, drizzle with chipotle sauce, then place the remaining 2 tortillas on top.', '4. Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat. When the oil shimmers, place the quesadillas, one at a time, into the skillet and cook until golden on each side, about 4-5 minutes per side.', '5. Serve topped with avocado, yogurt, and chipotle sauce. Add plenty of lime. EAT.']

title: Better Than Takeout Sweet Thai Basil Chicken.
ingredients: ['sesame or peanut oil', 'ground chicken', 'black pepper', 'garlic, minced or grated', 'fresh ginger, grated', 'red or orange bell peppers, chopped', 'raw cashews', 'low sodium soy sauce or tamari', 'fish sauce', 'honey', 'chili paste', 'fresh basil, roughly torn', 'fresh mint, roughly torn', 'steamed white or brown rice, for serving', 'mango, thinly sliced or diced']
ingredients with measurement: {'sesame or peanut oil': '2', 'ground chicken': '1', 'black pepper': 'seasoning', 'garlic, minced or grated': '4', 'fresh ginger, grated': '1', 'red or orange bell peppers, chopped': '2', 'raw cashews': '1/2', 'low sodium soy sauce or tamari': '1/2', 'fish sauce': '2', 'honey': '1/4', 'chili paste': '2-3', 'fresh basil, roughly torn': '1', 'fresh mint, roughly torn': '1/4', 'steamed white or brown rice, for serving': 'seasoning', 'mango, thinly sliced or diced': '1'}
instructions: ['1. Heat the oil in a large skillet over medium heat. When the oil shimmers, add the chicken. Season with black pepper and brown all over, breaking the chicken up as it cooks, about 5 minutes. Add the garlic, ginger, peppers, and cashews, cook another 2-3 minutes, until the garlic is fragrant. Pour in the soy sauce, fish sauce, chili paste, and honey. Bring the sauce to a boil over medium-high heat and cook until the sauce coats the chicken, about 5-8 minutes.', '2. Remove from the heat and stir in the basil and mint.', '3. title: Summer Coconut Chickpea Curry with Rice and Fried Halloumi.
ingredients: ['extra virgin olive oil', 'chickpeas, drained', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'zucchini, or summer squash, diced', 'sweet corn, kernels removed from the cob', 'shallot, chopped', 'fresh ginger, grated', 'garlic, minced or grated', 'yellow curry powder', 'cayenne pepper, more or less to taste', 'coconut milk', 'tahini', 'juice and zest from 1/2 a lemon', 'fresh cilantro, roughly chopped', 'Halloumi cheese, sliced into 1/4 inch pieces', 'cooked basmati rice', 'sesame seeds, green onions, and Persian cucumbers, for serving']
ingredients with measurement: {'extra virgin olive oil': '1/4 cup + 4', 'chickpeas, drained': '1', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'zucchini, or summer squash, diced': '2', 'sweet corn, kernels removed from the cob': '2', 'shallot, chopped': '1', 'fresh ginger, grated': '1', 'garlic, minced or grated': '2', 'yellow curry powder': '1 1/2', 'cayenne pepper, more or less to taste': '1/2', 'coconut milk': '1', 'tahini': '2', 'juice and zest from 1/2 a lemon': 'seasoning', 'fresh cilantro, roughly chopped': '1/4', 'Halloumi cheese, sliced into 1/4 inch pieces': '8', 'cooked basmati rice': '2', 'sesame seeds, green onions, and Persian cucumbers, for serving': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. Heat 1/4 cup olive oil in a large pot over medium heat. When the oil shimmers, add the chickpeas and season with salt and pepper. Cook, stirring occasionally until the chickpeas begin to crisp, about 5 minutes. Carefully remove 1/2 cup of chickpeas and reserve for topping, only if desired.', '2. To the remaining chickpeas, add the\xa0zucchini, corn, shallot, garlic, and ginger. Season with salt and pepper. Cook the veggies another 5-10 minutes or until they just begin to soften.', '3. Stir in the curry powder and cayenne and cook until\xa0fragrant, about 1 minute. Add the coconut milk, 1/3-1/2 cup water, and the tahini. Stir to combine, bring the mixture to a simmer over medium heat, cook 5-10 minutes or until the sauce thickens slightly. If the sauce thickens too much, add additional water to thin. Remove from the heat and stir in the lemon juice and zest, and cilantro.', '4. Meanwhile, cook the halloumi. Heat 2 tablespoons olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat. When the oil shimmers, add the halloumi and cook until golden, about 3 minutes per side. Remove from skillet.', '5. To serve, divide the rice among bowls and spoon the curry overtop. Top with halloumi, the reserved chickpeas, and cucumbers. Enjoy!']

title: Spicy Chickpea and Cheese Stuffed Zucchini.
ingredients: ['zucchini or yellow summer squash, halved lengthwise', 'cherry tomatoes halved', 'extra virgin olive oil, plus more for serving', 'oregano leaves, roughly chopped', 'fresh thyme leaves', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'chickpeas, drained and rinsed', 'smoked paprika', 'crushed red pepper flakes', 'fennel seeds', 'Panko bread crumbs', 'shredded fontina cheese', 'grated pecorino cheese', 'fresh basil leaves, roughly chopped']
ingredients with measurement: {'zucchini or yellow summer squash, halved lengthwise': '4', 'cherry tomatoes halved': '2', 'extra virgin olive oil, plus more for serving': '4', 'oregano leaves, roughly chopped': '2', 'fresh thyme leaves': '2', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'chickpeas, drained and rinsed': '1', 'smoked paprika': '2', 'crushed red pepper flakes': '1-2', 'fennel seeds': '1', 'Panko bread crumbs': '1/4', 'shredded fontina cheese': '1/2', 'grated pecorino cheese': '1/4', 'fresh basil leaves, roughly chopped': '1/4'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F.', '2. Using a small spoon or melon baller, hollow out the center of the zucchini halves (reserve the flesh), leaving 1/2-inch thick shell on each half.', '2. On a baking sheet, toss the zucchini, the scooped out zucchini flesh, and the tomatoes with 2 tablespoons olive oil, oregano, thyme, and a pinch each of salt and pepper. Transfer to the oven and roast for 20 minutes or until the zucchini are beginning to char and the tomatoes burst.', '3. On a separate baking sheet, toss the chickpeas with the remaining 2 tablespoons olive oil, paprika, red pepper flakes, fennel, and a large pinch of salt. Add the Panko, and toss to coat. Arrange in an even layer and transfer to the oven. Roast for 20 minutes, or until crisp.', '5. Remove everything from the oven. Add the roasted zucchini flesh and the tomatoes to the chickpeas and toss to combine. Spoon half of the chickpea/tomato mix into the roasted zucchini halves. Sprinkle the cheeses evenly over each zucchini. Return the zucchini to the oven and cook another 10 minutes, until the cheese has melted.', '6. To serve, plate the zucchini and top with the reserved chickpeas and tomatoes. Top with fresh basil and a drizzle of olive oil. Enjoy!']

title: Chicken Souvlaki Bowls with Garlic Fries.
ingredients: ['boneless skinless chicken breasts, cut into bite-size chunks', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'smoked paprika', 'chopped fresh oregano', 'small shallot, chopped', 'garlic, minced or grated', 'zest and juice of 1 lemon', 'crushed red pepper flakes', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'zucchini, sliced into 1/4 inch slices', 'crumbled feta cheese', 'fresh pitas or naan bread, warmed', 'Tzatziki, store-bought or homemade', 'cherry tomatoes, halved', 'hummus and shredded lettuce, for serving', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'garlic cloves, minced or grated', 'chopped fresh oregano', 'kosher salt', 'medium russet potatoes, cut into ¼-inch-thick matchsticks']
ingredients with measurement: {'boneless skinless chicken breasts, cut into bite-size chunks': '2', 'extra virgin olive oil': '1/4', 'smoked paprika': '2', 'chopped fresh oregano': '3', 'small shallot, chopped': '1', 'garlic, minced or grated': '2', 'zest and juice of 1 lemon': 'seasoning', 'crushed red pepper flakes': '1', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'zucchini, sliced into 1/4 inch slices': '2', 'crumbled feta cheese': '1/2', 'fresh pitas or naan bread, warmed': '6', 'Tzatziki, store-bought or homemade': '1', 'cherry tomatoes, halved': '1', 'hummus and shredded lettuce, for serving': 'seasoning', 'garlic cloves, minced or grated': '2', 'kosher salt': 'seasoning', 'medium russet potatoes, cut into ¼-inch-thick matchsticks': '4'}
instructions: ['1. In a gallon-size zip-top bag or bowl, combine the chicken, olive oil, paprika, oregano, shallots, garlic, lemon juice, lemon zest, crushed red pepper, and a large pinch of salt. Marinate for 15 minutes or up to overnight in the fridge.', '2. Meanwhile, make the fries.\xa0Preheat the oven to 425 degrees F.', '3. In a small bowl, whisk together the olive oil, garlic, oregano, and salt. Place the potato matchsticks in a large bowl and pour half the garlic mixture over. Gently toss to coat. Arrange the fries in an even layer on a baking sheet. Bake for 15 to 20 minutes, then flip, reduce the oven temperature to 400 degrees F, and bake for 15 to 20 minutes more. Remove from the oven and toss with the remaining garlic oil.', '4. Set your grill, grill pan, or skillet to medium-high heat. Toss the zucchini with the remaining tablespoon olive oil and a pinch of salt and pepper. Take skewers and thread the chicken pieces on.\xa0Alternately, you can roast the chicken at 425 degrees for 15-20 minutes.', '5. Grill the skewers until lightly charred and cooked through, turning them occasionally throughout cooking, about 10 to 12 minutes total. During the same time, grill the zucchini until lightly charred, 3-4 minutes per side. Remove everything from the grill.', '6. To serve, spread the Tzatziki onto warmed naan. Add lettuce, tomatoes, zucchini, and feta. Top with fries and chicken. If desired, add a dollop of hummus. EAT!']

title: Basil Chicken Saltimbocca with Marinated Tomatoes and Burrata
ingredients: ['boneless, skinless chicken breasts, sliced in half horizontally', 'garlic, grated', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'fresh basil', 'prosciutto', 'large eggs, beaten', 'Panko bread crumbs', 'cherry tomatoes, halved', 'extra virgin olive oil, plus more for cooking', 'balsamic vinegar', 'fresh thyme leaves', 'zest of 1 lemon', 'burrata cheese, torn']
ingredients with measurement: {'boneless, skinless chicken breasts, sliced in half horizontally': '2', 'garlic, grated': '2', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'fresh basil': '1', 'prosciutto': '8', 'large eggs, beaten': '3', 'Panko bread crumbs': '2', 'cherry tomatoes, halved': '2', 'extra virgin olive oil, plus more for cooking': '1/4', 'balsamic vinegar': '2', 'fresh thyme leaves': '2', 'zest of 1 lemon': 'seasoning', 'burrata cheese, torn': '3'}

Working with 1 cutlet at a time, press 2 basil leaves on top of each cutlet. Wrap 2 pieces of prosciutto around each cutlet to secure the basil. Dredge both sides of the chicken through the egg and then through the Panko, pressing gently to adhere. Place the chicken on a plate.', '3. To make the marinated tomatoes. In a bowl, toss together the tomatoes, 3 tablespoons olive oil, the balsamic vinegar, 1/2 cup fresh basil, the thyme, lemon zest, and a pinch of salt.', '4. Carefully flip the chicken and cook until golden brown on the other side, about 3-4 minutes. Transfer to a plate and season with salt.', '5. Serve the chicken warm topped with torn burrata and marinated tomatoes. ENJOY!']

title: Thai Peanut Chicken Ramen Noodle Salad.
ingredients: ['brown rice ramen noodles, seasoning packet discarded', 'romaine lettuce, shredded', 'carrots, shredded', 'green onions, chopped', 'Persian cucumbers, thinly sliced', 'mango, diced', 'each fresh cilantro and basil, roughly chopped', 'cooked shredded chicken', 'avocado, sliced', 'roasted peanuts, chopped', 'sesame oil', 'rice vinegar', 'creamy peanut butter', 'low sodium soy sauce', 'honey', 'Thai red curry paste', 'juice of 1 lime', 'Jalapeño, chopped, and seeded, if desired']

title: Instant Pot Spicy White Bean, Beef, and Potato Stew

ingredients with measurement: {'beef chuck, fat trimmed and cubed': '2', 'sweet onion, diced': '1', 'garlic, minced or grated': '2', 'carrots, chopped': '4', 'mixed baby potatoes, halved': '1/2', 'hot chili peppers in oil roughly, chopped': '3-4', 'all-purpose flour or arrowroot powder': '2', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'low sodium beef broth': '2', 'red wine': '2', 'tomato paste': '1/3', 'sprigs fresh thyme': '4', 'bay leaves': '2', 'white beans, drained': '1', 'winter greens, such as char kale or spinach': '2'}
instructions: ['1. In the bowl of your instant pot, combine the beef, onion, garlic, carrots, potatoes, chili peppers, flour, and a large pinch of both salt and pepper. Toss to combine. Add the broth, wine, tomato paste, thyme, bay leaves, and season again with salt and pepper. Seal the instant pot and set to the meat/stew setting for 35 minutes.\xa0Preheat the broiler to high.', 'Preheat the broiler to high.', '2. Once the instant pot has finished cooking, Transfer the stew to an oven safe pot. Stir in the white beans and greens. Transfer to the oven and cook for 5-10 minutes, stirring 2-3 times throughout cooking, until the beef is browned and the sauce thickened. Remove from the oven. Remove the thyme and bay leaves. Divide the stew between bowls. Serve with bread. Enjoy!']

title: One Pan Chicken and Wild Rice Casserole
ingredients: ['butter', 'olive oil', 'sweet onions', 'sea salt', 'pepper', 'garlic, minced or grated', 'cremini mushrooms', 'wild mushrooms', 'Honeycrisp apple, thinly sliced', 'fresh chopped thyme, plus more for serving', 'low sodium chicken broth', 'white wine or more chicken broth', 'wild rice', 'boneless skinless chicken breasts', 'baby spinach', 'Gruyère cheese, shredded']
ingredients with measurement: {'butter': '2', 'olive oil': '1', 'sweet onions': '1/2', 'sea salt': 'seasoning', 'pepper': 'seasoning', 'garlic, minced or grated': '2', 'cremini mushrooms': '6', 'wild mushrooms': '2', 'Honeycrisp apple, thinly sliced': '1', 'fresh chopped thyme, plus more for serving': '2', 'low sodium chicken broth': '2 1/2', 'white wine or more chicken broth': '1/2', 'wild rice': '2', 'boneless skinless chicken breasts': '1/2-1', 'baby spinach': '2', 'Gruyère cheese, shredded': '1 1/2'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F.', '2. Melt the butter and olive oil in a large, oven safe skillet over medium heat. Add the onion and cook for 5-8 minutes, stirring often until the onion is soft. Season with salt and pepper. Add the garlic, the cremini mushrooms and the wild mushrooms, cook another 5 minutes or until the mushrooms are caramelized. Stir in the apples and thyme and cook another minute longer.', '3. Pour in the 2 cups chicken broth and the wine and bring to a boil over high heat. Stir in the rice and chicken, cover and reduce the heat to low. Simmer for 45-55 minutes or until the rice is cooked, if needed, add the remaining 1/2-1 cup broth if the rice feels a little hard still. Remove from the heat and stir in the spinach.', '4. Sprinkle the cheese over top the rice and transfer to the oven. Bake for 10-15 minutes or until the cheese has melted. Remove from the oven and serve with fresh thyme. Enjoy!']
